text: Sarah's expertise in the science of massage is awesome!  Her personality and disposition enhances the massage experience!

resp.text: We are so glad you enjoyed your massage

name: Lacy Nauck
text: The best massage I have ever had! Made me feel completely comfortable and relaxed. I was and to shut down for a bit and my body is extremely grateful. I would recommend 100%

name: Elizabeth Vargas Johnson
text: One of my best experiences! I expressed I wanted to feel relaxed and Sarah ensured of that. She took car of a muscle pain I had been experiencing and had a great restful sleep that night.

name: Hannah Lansdell
text: My husband loves Miraculous Massage and booked an appointment for me. Sarah was very sweet and welcoming.

resp.text: We're so glad you enjoyed your visit!

name: Karen Hazzah
text: I had a great experience with Sarah. She worked out the kinks in my neck and shoulders so I felt much better when I left; plus, price is good value;

name: Aaron Lussi
text: Best...massages...ever

name: Bobo8992
text: Sarah was great! She was very professional and made me feel very relaxed and comfortable. I highly recommend her services!

resp.text: Thank you so very much. Sarah is great isn't she? Thank you for you business. It is a pleasure and an honor to serve you.

name: Platinum Construction & Remodeling (Eric R. Michael)
text: That's because a different name was used.

resp.text:
Dear Platinum Construction and Remodeling,
Looking at our records we do not see any indication of your having been to our office. We strive for excellence in service and love earning great ratings from our wonderful clientele. It is unfortunate that you are not among them.

Unfortunately, Mr. Eric R Michael, the name provided also was not a customer.

name: Kim Dillon
text: Melaine is the only massage therapist I know that will tailor your massage specifically to what’s going on with your body. Plus, she is so therapeutic in her personality. It’s not just a massage; it’s for your health’s good and feels like therapy in all senses of the word in the beautiful surroundings  of her new office. Come see her & make a beautiful new friend.

resp.text:
Thank you Kim,
Each and every individual deserves individualized treatment. To be heard. We love solving even the most challenging issues with specific solutions.

name: Trameka Persaud
text: I had the 90 min massage with Melanie and I had a wonderful experience.  She hit all the right spots and could tell where my pain was coming from. I got off the table like a new refreshed person. Thank you and I will come again when I'm back in town!

resp.text:
Trameka,
So glad to know you had  wonderful experience. I look forward to outdoing it next time!

name: Melody Talks Marketing
text: Love every massage therapy session with the awesome Melanie! I highly recommend Miraculous Massages in Madison, Alabama!

resp.text: Thank you Melody! We love giving every massage!

name: Dave Swain
text: Brittany gives an AWESOME massage!!  You need to go!

text: Not impressed nor did I get an hr..

name: thomas dunnavant
text: I've been seeing Ms Emily for a couple months.  And, she has been helpful in providing me some new tools to deal with issues surrounding the death of my mother that knocked my train off the track.  While I cannot say that I am ready for the Cannon Ball Express, I am feeling so much better since i met her.  I have been treated with dignity and grace and recommend her without question.

name: Nisey
text: Ali is absolutely wonderful! He was very informative and professional during my massage it was very much needed. I definitely will be returning. The atmosphere is great 👍

resp.text: Thank you very much! Looking forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Robett Robinson
text: Great place to get relaxing therapy

resp.text: Thank you very much! Looking forward to seeing you again soon.

name: KENNEDY SPIVEY
text:
Love this place staff very friendly and professional!!!!! Best massage in Montgomery check it out !!!!!
Kerry p

resp.text: Thank you very much Kennedy Spivey! We are happy to hear about positive experience! We appreciate your business.

name: Beverly Garrett
text: Love Mind and Body Spa.  Great atmosphere.  I have referred several of my family, friends, and colleagues to them.  Personable and gives a great massage.  Ali has fixed my bricked up muscles several times.  211❤❤

resp.text: Awesome review Dr. Garrett. It's our purpose to help you feel your best and we can't wait for your next session. And as always we appreciate your business.

name: M N
text: Foad has been working with me for 2 years now after 2 shoulder surgeries. He deserves 10/10 stars and has been a godsend! Love his encouragement and focus.  Have recommended Mind and Body service to my  friends!

resp.text: We are so happy to hear this! Thank you very  much for the kind words and taking the time to leave us a review. We look forward to your next visit!

name: David Alexander
text: Great service,  their therapy keeps me working. I recommend highly.

resp.text: Thank you! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Jeff Welch
text: Foad provides the best deep tissue and myofacial therapy in Montgomery. I recommend to anyone with back issues or sports injuries.

name: John Smith
text:
Foad at a time when my circulation was in bad shape rescued me with a deep Tissue orthopedic medical massage and workout weekly. My Doctor recommended him and was decision I ever made.
Circulation is good and no more aches!

resp.text: I was pleased to welcome you to our practice. I look forward to seeing you again. And I appreciate your physician's confidence and trust.

name: Jorge Serafin
text: My experience here has been extraordinary! I have had many different types of massages throughout the world, but my experience here has been the best overall. Foad has been outstanding in his treatment and recommendations.

resp.text: Thank you Jorge! We are delighted to hear that you had a wonderful experience with us.

name: Revewer Smith
text: The massage therapist at this studio is VERY nice and personable, but his technique is not therapeuatic at all.  I left the massage session feeling worse.  His technique is just to massage and massage without regard to whether he is relieving tightness or not.  Unlike some of the other studios that have a technique, he doesn't really seem to have  a technique.

name: Jack Durham
text: Always a relaxing experience to visit Foad at Mind & Body. wish I could go more often. Very knowledgeable about a variety of health and healing regimens. Also a fun guy to chat with. Always leave with a smile.

name: Larry Chapman
text: Foad has been a faithful friend for 20 years. He is a good man and excellent at what he does. Countless times he has taken care of me and my family. Thank you Foad for running a first class business!!!

resp.text:
Good afternoon Larry
I wish to take this opportunity to thank you for your business for past 20 years.
You have paid me the nicest compliment possible. I appreciate your confidence and trust.

name: Mark McLendon
text: Great people and top notch service.   I started coming in tons of pain and not only did the massage help but the stretches and exercise homework got me back on the road to health.  Can not say enough good things about Foad and his team!

name: Aaron Esfahani
text:
Foad and the whole staff at Mind and Body are first class. Likewise, the massages that I have had here are far better than what I've experienced home in Atlanta. Additionally, they specialize in sports and therapeutic treatments that will have you coming back for more. As an honest reviewer, I would have to say that you must try this place!

AAE

name: Keith Blackwell
text: Experienced my first massage at Mind  and Body today.  I could not  have  been more pleased with the experience - it was the best massage I have ever received.

name: Carrie Yates
text:
I began going to see Foad at Mind & Body a little over a month ago, and already, I can see a marked improvement in my symptoms. For example, I was unable to turn my neck all the way to the right for about a month when I first saw him.  Foad repaired that in two sessions.

In addition, he makes it an extremely comfortable and easy assessment process. I never got the sense that I was next in line, or that I needed to be in a hurry. The atmosphere is quiet, relaxing, and tranquil. He makes all of his oils home made, and they are incredible. He gives feedback, suggestions, and has a wholistic approach--all without making you feel like you've done something wrong, or haven't done something you were supposed to to take better care of yourself.

Very reasonable priced, very effective, and very easy to do in the middle of a day.

resp.text: I wish to take this opportunity to thank you for your recent visits to my Wynlakes location. It was a sincere pleasure to be of service. I look forward to seeing you again.

name: Anne Mazyck
text: Great experience. It definitely helped the headache. Ali is very gentle and very good.

name: Customer Critique
text: HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE!!! I wouldn't recommend this place to my worst enemy. The therapist was late and I felt he rush through the massage trying to get himself back on schedule with no regard to me or my needs.  There was nothing relaxing or soothing about the massage.  I felt  exhausted and pretty beat up afterwards.  There was no balance or method to his technique.  Not worth the time or money.  DEFINITELY WILL NOT GO BACK!

name: L Skipper
text: Foad is an excellent therapist.

resp.text: We are so happy to hear this! Thank you for the kind words and taking the time to leave us a review. We look forward to your next visit!

name: Zsuzsa Rozgonyi
text: Foad gives a 5 star massage. I highly recommend Mind & Body. Great atmosphere, great treatments! Love, love, love this spa!

resp.text: Thank you 🙏

name: lens lens
text: Foad is an excellent massage therapist. He can pin point and treat areas that create problems for other areas. He is highly recommended.

name: Arpi Sekeryan
text: I have been getting massages regularly for years, and since I moved from Canada, I needed to find a massage therapist and fast...  Luckily, I found Mind & Body because Foad"s Thai massages,  are by far the best!!

name: Mary Allinder
text: I would recommend Foad and Ali to anyone searching for agreat place to destress and unwind . These two men have great skill in massage therapy and many more ways to get the best out of life! I highly recommend Mind and Body Holistic Spa!

name: Missy Mathis
text: Best Massage in town! I highly recommend!

name: Ryan Powers
text: Unbelievable! Not only did Foad relieve my lower back pain but he gave me specific stretches to help prevent lower back pain!

name: Susie White
text: Foad has been my go-to massage therapist for at least 5 years now.  I wouldn't trade him for anything!

name: Santana Mullins
text: Love this place! Inviting and staff is super nice. My son was very nervous, but they made him feel very comfortable and explained everything to us.

name: Timothy Clark
text: They do a great job and are very knowledgeable in what they do. I love the fact that they explain what they do and why they do it. I highly recommend!

resp.text: We really appreciate the recommendation Timothy! Thank you for the 5-star review.

name: BB's Healthfood Store
text: I’ve been a patient with Dr Justin pretty much since he has been in practice. Prior to discovering this gem of a man I worked for a chiropractor and have seen several others who I thought were really good. Dr Justin is without a doubt THE best! He is extremely knowledgeable and continues to educate himself so he can best serve and help his patience heal. He is honest, has a gentle quiet spirit and truly cares about his patience. He has recently helped me with a facet joint issue that is causing serve sciatica pain through my rear end and leg and his dry needling technique was spot on! I could go on and on about him and his remarkable team but I hate typing in my phone ☺️

resp.text: BB's Healthfood Store, thank you so much! We are so thankful for all the kind words! This truly means so much!

name: Shi Fu
text: Very friendly and professional staff. The doctors are knowledgeable and I look forward to each appointment!!

resp.text: Thank you, TJ, for the wonderful review!

name: Daniel Campbell
text: Both Stephanie and Justin have worked on my multitude of arthritic and pained areas. They both do an excellent job and spend a good amount of time to both learn about where I am hurting and treat the areas. They have a variety of modalities of treatment and have kept up with the latest technology available.

resp.text: Daniel, we are so glad to hear this! Thank you for taking the time to leave this incredible rating and review!

name: Noah Oliver
text: Dr. Justin & his staff have been treating me off and on for a number of years due to different issues and injuries.  His methods are effective, His concern for patients is genuine and everyone in his office are always professional and friendly!

resp.text: Thank you, Noah, for the kind words!

name: Ryan Robinson
text:
Best Experience Possible!
I used to think that chiropractic work was some sort of medieval practice but Eastern Shore Chiropractic has shown me that it really is advanced comprehensive medicine.

The knowledgeable and friendly staff take a comprehensive approach to treat the issue. They start with a thorough evaluation of the issue and all necessary x-rays, they then create a treatment plan that includes addressing all components of the issue at hand: treating muscles, fascia, and of course the skeletal structure.

Before being treated for my chronic and debilitating neck/spine pain I didn't think I would ever recover. Now, I have hope that I won't have to deal with this the rest of my life! They don't only treat the issue, they also really focus on creating a at-home physical therapy plan to also address what is creating the issue.

Do not consider anywhere else, Eastern Shore Chiropractic is by far the best option, no matter the issue.

resp.text: Ryan, we really appreciate your review! Thank you!

name: Valere Homes
text: I had a lower back/tailbone issue that was completely taken care of after about five visits.  It's been over a year and I'm still completely pain free.  The staff and facility are top-notch and I'd recommend Eastern Shore Chiropractic to any and everyone.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the wonderful review, Valere Homes!

name: Rebecca Brouillette
text: Dr. Stephanie is extremely knowledgeable and one of the friendliest doctors I have ever had! It’s easy to see that she truly cares about her patients and is one of the only docs around who is certified in a special technique for pregnant women, highly recommend!!

resp.text: Rebecca, thank you so much for the kind words, we will be sure to give Stephanie the praise she so much deserves.

name: Mike DeCuir
text:
I have been going to Chiropractors for over thirty years, primarily for regular maintenance. Dr Justin is the best ever, a real professional. He keeps my body tuned up.

None of the long waits that are typical of most Dr. Visits.

His wife Dr. Toby and staff of Cassandra and Glee are great also.

Mike DeCuir

resp.text: Thanks Mike, we appreciate these kind words. it is always a pleasure working with you. All of our staff has the same caring concerns about your health and well being.

name: Sandi Sadlock
text: Dr. Southall and his staff always go above and beyond. I’ve recommended them to several people! Beautiful clinic and great staff!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Sandi, for the excellent review!

name: Jodie Larson
text: Dr. Southall is very skilled and knowledgeable.  The staff is friendly and punctual.  His technique really gives me relief.  I have seen many chiropractors and physical therapists for my chronic back and neck issues, but none have been near as successful as this clinic.  HIGHLY recommend!

resp.text: Thanks Jodie, we are very happy we are able to help relief your pain. Our Number One Goal with all our patients is that they feel better after visiting with us and their health is improving.

name: Chase Blackmon
text: I was thoroughly impressed with my visit to Eastern Shore Chiropractics. This was the first time I have ever visited a chiropractor. It was also the first time that I've ever been to a medical office and feel that I got effective treatment, and that I got my money's worth. Highly Recommend!!!

resp.text: Chase, thank you for taking the time out to give us an outstanding review! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Liza Moskowitz
text: Dr. Stephanie is a FABULOUS chiropractor. I have been under chiropractic care for years and no one could relieve my chronic shoulder pain, until I met Dr. Stephanie. She is extremely knowledgeable about all things chiropractic and her passion shows through her everyday interactions with her patients. If you are in the Fairhope area, look no further- Dr. Stephanie is the chiropractor to go to!

resp.text: Liza, Thank you so much for the kind words! I will be sure to pass this along to Stephanie!

name: jacqueline dyer
text: Excellent services by Dr. Justin and his entire staff.  Have been going there for years, as needed, always with outstanding results.  Highly recommend Rolphing with Pam.

resp.text: Jacqueline, thank you so much for the great review!

name: Holly Johnson
text:
I injured myself a year ago while training to run a race. I was down and out for 7 weeks, unable to hardly walk let alone run.

I was told about Dr. Justin and Dr. Tobie by a friend who had been urging me to go see him. I finally decided I was getting no where on my own and scheduled an appointment. His staff is so friendly and helpful. They were able to work me in fairly quick. I was impressed with their office, their no wait policy and how friendly everyone was. He used ART on my hip, glutes and legs. It took about 4 weeks of visits, but he finally got me back to running. I learned a lot of useful stretches and ways to take care of myself when running.

I have recommended their office to many people and will continue to do so. They're professional, friendly and caring!

resp.text: Thanks Holly for this kind review. We are glad we could get you up and running again. And more importantly that we have shown you some helpful techniques that can help you keep your body's healthy while enjoying running. Please stay in touch.

name: Kay Harden
text: Best chiropractic doctor and his staff is awesome:). Be sure to talk with the Rolfer (Pam Reaves)....she truly has helped my physical disability too!!!

resp.text: Hi Kay, thank you for this review!

name: Barry West
text: Such professional and sincere care. My aches are disappearing thanks to the effective diagnosis and treatment of Dr. Justin and the talented crew! I'm so glad that I found you.

resp.text: We are so glad you found us as well! Thank you for the kind review, Barry!

name: Nancy Hall
text: I've only been once but I can tell you from previous experiences they are very professional, they have the latest technology, and was told if we dont see a improvement in a month they wouldn't string me along. They took exrays which all chiropractors should do but dont. Dont let a chiropractor work on you without first taking exrays. May be a little costly but exrays can detect problems your not aware of.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Nancy, for the wonderful review!

name: Sid Sexton
text:
I cannot say enough good things about Dr. Southall and his team. Everyone from the friend staff at the front desk to Chase the “Facia Guy” (still not sure what all that stuff means) are all great. It’s kind of a pleasure going in and seeing them even though I’m going because I’m in pain.

I have been to see them for two seperate injuries and they are very good about educating me about what the issue is, working with me on how to prevent it from happening again and ultimately getting me healthy and pain free as quickly as reasonably possible. These guys are the best and I’ve recommended them to many of my Crossfit and Jujitsu friends. If you are in pain, go see them.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Sid, for the delightful review!

name: Vanessa
text: The staff and location is the nicest I've ever been to!  Thanks for all that you do.

resp.text: Thank you Vanessa, for becoming a new patient!

name: Jonathan Hoffmann
text:
I have seen Dr. Justin for a few different issues over the past year.  After finding his contact information on the A.R.T. providers page, I decided to schedule an appointment.  I was initially hesitant, as I live in Pensacola and would need to drive almost an hour to get to Fairhope.  I can say that each and every trip I make down for an appointment is absolutely worth it.  Unlike other practitioners that I've seen, Dr. Justin took the time to listen to my concerns and give me feedback.  I didn't feel like another patient on the assembly line.

I was also impressed with his ability to provide me with some immediate relief.  Using A.R.T., Dr. Justin was able to help me alleviate some nagging hip flexor pain, and also give me more range of motion in my knee, in one visit.  While some follow-up visits are required to completely alleviate certain issues, I was impressed with how quickly I felt relief.  It was also helpful to know that Dr. Justin was involved in the same workout program as me, so he really understood the nature of my pain.  It's nice to be treated someone who appears to "practice what they preach" in terms of living a healthful life.

And lastly, the staff at Eastern Shore Chiropractic & Sports Clinic is outstanding.  I'm always greeted by friendly faces when I walk in the door and have never had an issue getting an appointment at a time that is convenient for me.  They are honest, and even notified me of a credit that I had on my account that I was unaware of.  I would whole-heartedly recommend Dr. Justin to my family and friends for any sort of sports-related pain issues.

resp.text: ThanksJonathan, we really appreciate this wonderful review. We pride ourselves on helping all our patients not only obtain pain relief but also helping them understand what is causing the pain. We feel that all of our patients are family and as family we want them to feel at home whenever they visit us. Thanks again and please stay in touch.

name: Michelle Murrill
text: Dr. Justin and his team are amazing working with athletes.  Thank you for all your help!

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful review, Michelle!

name: Paul Miller
text: My son went here and was very pleased with the outcome

resp.text: Thank you so much for the great review, Paul!

name: Jennifer Killgo LMT
text: Dr.'s Justin and Tobie Really know their stuff. I love the fact that even though they do not have a massage therapist on staff, they incorporate working with the muscles in with their chiropractic work which leads to NOTICEABLE results!

resp.text: Thanks Jennifer, our goal is to help all of our patients obtain results and feel better.

name: Kelly Farwell
text: Amazing team! I love every person that works there!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Kelly!

text: I can't say enough good things about these guys.  Justin and his staff have done so much to keep me on the weekend warrior trail.  Miracle workers! Thank you all so much!!

resp.text: Thank you Doug for your kind review!  We love helping people stay healthy and active.  Your comments mean a lot to us!

name: Gary F Moody
text:
Great massage experience with Melissa! My daughter is a dancer and has many knots in her back from lifting her team mates and general stiffness from the dancing activity. Melissa did a wonderful job of helping her feel relaxed and working the knots out.

The place is small, but professional and clean. Honestly, they are focused on the clients comfort and tension so not having some large elaborate office is putting the focus on the right place - on free customer. Well done ladies!

If you are vacationing and wish to treat yourself to a massage and don't know where to go and get your money's worth? Stop researching and call The Massage Office today. Get on their calendar before it is booked up. You have found your vacation massage team!

resp.text:
Gary

We hope to see you again when you get to Gulf Shores!

I picked this place because their website was extremely informative on what to expect for a first timer, and the other reviews were glowing. Melissa and Joyce were wonderful! They were very relaxing to be around, and Melissa did a wonderful job and made sure I was comfortable the entire way through. My boyfriend, who’s gotten quite a few massages before, was very happy with Joyce’s deep-tissue massage. I walked out of it feeling so relaxed, I almost couldn’t drive!

If you’re looking to really do some self-care right while you’re here, I definitely recommend coming to The Massage Office early in your trip. We’ll definitely be back next time we’re in town!

text: William and his team are all excellent in what they do. I recently had a stretch session with William and he helped release areas in my hips and shoulders that were giving me a great deal of discomfort. He was careful to make sure that I was feeling the stretch in that specific area. He communicated with me each stretch and what I was supposed to be feeling. I would highly recommend a stretch session for anyone that is experiencing tightness in any area of their body. Can’t say enough about this group and their knowledge and professionalism. I have been seeing them regularly for at least 3 years.

name: Kelly Lansden
text: I got a massage from Abbey Porte a few days ago for a chronic pain flare up and she did an amazing job! Last week I could barely function because I was in so much pain, but now I feel great! My pain dropped from a 7/10 to a 2/10. That’s major improvement! I highly recommend Abbey for pain management massage. She knows what she’s doing!

resp.text: We're so glad you enjoyed your visit!  And thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review.

name: Mary R
text: I’m so happy I found this place! I’ve struggled with back and neck pain since I was a teenager, among other things here and there, and now that I work in dentistry it’s been even harder on my back. I wanted to find a place that not only gave a relaxing massage, but could recognize and target my problem areas. William listened and explained what he would be doing and even gave me some at-home tips to get things loosened up. I’ve already booked my next appointment and can’t wait to see more results!

name: Tiffany Postell
text: Rob Ginwright did a great job focusing on my problem areas. He explained everything throughout the session and made sure I was informed about everything. He even gave me tips on things I can do at home, and I have continued to see improvement. Definitely looking forward to my next session.

text: I went to APM with chronic pain in one shoulder. Abbey carefully and persistently worked on every muscle knot until I had complete relief! Her knowledge of the body muscles was extremely impressive and she knew exactly where the problem was likely occurring and how to solve it. I will be a regular from this day forward!

text: Rob Ginwright has helped me so much. He was very proessional and carefully explained everything he was doing. I feel better than I have in years. I can't wait to go back.

text: William is an extremely skilled masseuse. He took the time to assess my unique situation, and worked to alleviate muscle pain, soreness and even some structural issues that I had mentioned to him.  I love working with people who are obviously passionate about what they do, and William exemplifies this through his skill and mastery of his craft.  I highly recommend that anyone who is looking for more than your typical "feel good" massage and who wants to get real therapeutic results should go and see him.  Totally worth the investment!!

name: Cindy L Bili
text: William worked on trigger points in my neck and shoulder.  I have not had pain since my first visit, which was 3 days ago and I have had chronic pain for years.  I am so excited to have found a massage therpist that I truly feel can help me with eliminating back pain!

name: Bob Berry
text: Jennifer's 30 minute deep tissue was just what I needed. I had several knots that she worked out and the massage results lasted a long time. I am sold on these folks and they are very convenient to I65 at Hwy 31 (in Hoover) and are very professional and accommodating. Great massage!

name: Julie Jefferson
text: I had a wonderful massage with Alex. She was very professional and thorough.  My back pain was greatly relieved.  I would definitely recommend her to others, and will be returning myself.

text: I've been here 3 or 4 times now.  They do a great job at catering to your specific issues.  For me, a massage every month is just what I needed. Friendly, professional, convenient and affordable would be how I describe them.

resp.text: We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with the services we provide. Thank you for your feedback.

name: Lauren Hughes
text: I've struggled with persistent muscle tension in my upper back, neck, and lower back for quite awhile. Physical therapy and dry needling have helped tremendously, but the muscle tension was still present all day every day. The tension makes it difficult to maintain proper posture and contributes to lordosis in my lower back. After one treatment from William last week, I can see a big improvement. Tension in my chest is greatly reduced, which makes maintaining proper posture much easier. Any headaches I've had since then are mild, and I've had less upper and lower back pain. I still have a long way to go, but I'm excited about the progress made in just one session!

name: Megan Therrien
text: I highly recommend Alternative Pain Management! About 6 months ago, I finally decided to go to a massage therapist on a regular basis to try and deal with recurring upper back problems, headaches, and TMJ issues. I have had massages all over the place (massage envy, spas, other therapists), and I don't think I have ever met a massage therapist as attentive and creative as William. Even though he is working on the same places, every appointment is a new experience and he ALWAYS manages to find little places I had no idea were even hurting! William is easy to talk to and work with, and I appreciate that he offers advice and tips to help manage my problems in between visits. I can't say enough good things about William and Alternative Pain Management!

name: Matt Butler
text: Went to see William at APM at the suggestion of my orthopedist because of a nagging muscle knot in my back. This was my first visit and William was pleasant and thorough with his explanations of what he was going to do and what I should expect. I have noticed some improvement with my back but he mentioned it could take a couple of sessions to help release everything. I go back in a week to continue the work on my issue and will look forward to continued relief.

name: Kathryn Groat
text: My husband and I have been going at least once a month for over 2 years now for therapeutic massages. Jennifer and William are both very knowledgeable and professional!

name: Brandy Wills
text: Jennifer and William are a great team! Jennifer has helped immensely with my pain management! I highly recommend!!!

name: Greg Mullinax
text: William at APM is very skilled in deep tissue massage. I've had 4 visits now and every time my condition has improved dramatically. He is treating me for multiple injuries and aches. I am very happy with the results. I highly recommend William.

name: Heather Batey
text: William is a knowledgeable and extremely skilled massage therapist. He uses a variety of techniques with different patients to achieve the best possible outcome. He is trained in myofascial release and neuromuscular therapy as well as the more popular Swedish and deep tissue techniques. The atmosphere is relaxed and inviting, and I always leave feeling so much better. Highly recommend!

name: Shane Nicholas
text: I've been going to Alternative Pain Management for about 6 months now and the results are incredible. I have had a dull pain at the base of my skull for a decade and within a few treatments it was completely gone. No more dull pain. No more headaches. William is amazing and didn't stop at treating the symptoms but worked until he found the source. As someone that dealt with recurring pain for years and thought there was no hope, I can't recommend Alternative Pain Management highly enough. Best in Bham!

name: Monika Croom
text: At first I wasn't sure what to expect as I have always gone to a spa type massage deal, but because this is for an injury/pain, this alternative management was the next step for me outside doctors and chiropractors.  Although walking in I was reluctant because the set up was not what I had expected, I found it to be very clean and comfortable.  William Henson is very professional and knowledgeable in this field.  He was very soft in his approach, but his hands were really strong to really get into my pain issues.  I have only had 1 treatment but I have made an appointment for another as I experienced a good bit of improvement off one treatment.  At the end of the session, he also took the time to show me exercises specific to my ailment.

resp.text:
Thanks Monika, I'm always  happy to help in any way that I can.
-William

To be honest, deep tissue massage is not a relaxing and soothing kind of therapy but it's specific to help relieve my very tight muscles and connective tissue. I instantly felt some relief and looking forward to my second session.

name: Brandon Thompson
text: If you yearn for the days of customer service, then LumaLife Therapy is the massage and wellness center for you.  Upon arrival I was greeted by courteous staff in a cozy atmosphere that promoted relaxation.  In addition to traditional massage therapy the clinic offers modern services such as cupping, wellness coaching, and tailored health services.  The prices are reasonable, so much that its easy to be a return customer.  A massage shouldn't have to mean it's a special occasion, and with LumaLife Therapy it doesn't have to be.

resp.text: THANK YOU!!!

name: Rebecca Johnson
text:
So unprofessional. I cannot believe this place has so many 5 star reviews. They did not gove me a pleasant experience and I did not even receive a massage. I scheduled an appointment for a Massage using Groupon on a Saturday in
March. Later I realized I had a scheduling conflict so I rescheduled for a different day. When I came in they had it scheduled for next month on the same day. I remember distinctly scheduling my appointment for this day this month because I TOOK THE DAY OFF for this appointment. I would not have scheduled an appointment incorrectly when I was specifically scheduling it for the day I asked off. So when I arrived they said that I could reschedule. So I tried to schedule it for a day I’m off so I don’t have to ask off again and apparently Saturday’s are only for members! How did I first schedule my appointment for a Saturday then? I’m not a member but I still had it scheduled! Please give me an explanation for this. However, Groupon helped me with my issue and allowed me to trade in my voucher. If I have any advice for anyone thinking about using this company. Don’t.

name: Joan Marie Stewart
text: The Massage Therapists at LumaLife are extremely well trained!  After my recent 90 minute massage, my neck and back had never felt looser!  I stood taller. The massages are truly therapeutic.  I was so relaxed that I wished someone could have driven me home!  The massage table is extremely comfortable - the bedding adds so much to your massage.  The spa is very private, super clean and relaxing.  If you want to really treat your body and mind with relaxation and rejuvenation, then you need to rely on LumaLife for your massages.  Simply a cut way above and I have had massages all over the world and at world class spas and hotels.  At LumaLife, you are relying on true professionals who care about your massage making a difference for your body and mind.

name: Paul M
text:
I was in a severe motorcycle accident in 2017. Broke my left shoulder and compression fractured ALL of the ribs in my back on the left. Never been the same since, and it is a constant pain. The worst is it will cramp up on that side, underneath the shoulder blade, which causes so much pain I cannot sleep or do any activity. Lily massage is my go to for relief on  those occasions. In an hour, the therapist has me loosened up, easily cutting 3 or 4 days off the time required to recover. She seeks out and finds the cramped tissues and works the cramp out. Her massage is like magic, she begins with bearable pressure, and slowly increases until she is deep into the tissue where the pain radiates from, and somehow always manages to give pronounced relief to this hard to manipulate area where my injury gives so much trouble. I go in unable to lift my left arm above my shoulders, and leave with range of motion restored and smooth. A little tender for a day or two, then normal (for me). Before finding Lily massage, those cramps would last 3 or 4 days, then another 3 to 5 days to move freely again.
With her skill at massage, instead of a week to 10 days, I am, able to feel better the same day, and a couple days later am back to normal. activities and can sleep at night.
I highly recommend this place for massage to anyone, especially those with nagging problems due to injury or strain. This woman is most excellent, I would say she is gifted as well as knowing how to properly perform beneficial massage therapy with the least discomfort when one is injured and in pain. Very professional, caring, and skilled. A five star establishment, always excellent results. I've used her 4 or 5 times, and always been well pleased with the results of her efforts. I would say this establishment is among the very best available in the area.
Most excellent service, listens to her customers and responds to individual needs of her clients.

resp.text: Thank you very much Paul for sharing your experience with everyone.  Thank you very much for your compliment to me.  Thank you for coming to Lily Massage.  I am glad that massage can help relieve your pain.  I am proud that my profession can help people.  I hope to help more people continue to study hard.  Thanks again to Paul for his trust and encouragement.  Hope to meet you soon😊

name: Ryan Sullivan
text:
It had been my many time back Lily Massage since covid and I was pleased and comforted to see that covid protocol was covered to the T. As usual even before this horrid pandemic the business was already clean and fresh from top to bottom. Temperatures are checked and a form with a series of question regarding symptoms have to be answered before starting your massage. Which gave me comfort knowing that each costumer has to be screened before moving forward. They have each customer wash their hands and escort them to their rooms. The beds and linens in each room smell fresh, are clean and sanitized. Workers constantly wear mask, use gloves and customers are asked to wear masks during their massage as well.

Lily was my masseuse and hands down she is AMAZING! She concentrated on areas that I had no idea I had issues with but she found them and worked a little longer in those areas(Shoulders and neck). Which I really appreciate. I have gone to many massage parlors like this one (Oriental traditional massage) and none of them compare. All the masseuses here are really good but, lily is my Fave.

text: I have a lot going on in my life and was extremely stressed.  I was carrying a lot of the stress in my neck and shoulders - it had gotten to where they hurt all the time! I realize I can't go so long without supporting my body, so am planning to get another massage soon to loosen up a bit more, then stay on a regular maintenance schedule so I don't get that bad again.  Massage can help so much with muscle tension and stress.  Take care of yourself - you need a good foundation to handle life's stress, and you're worth it!  Just Breathe is a GREAT place for massage - they have a very clean, comfortable, relaxing environment and Devon's massage work is top notch!  Highly recommend!

text: I had my first massage at Just Breathe yesterday and will be back for many more! I’m new to the area, so it was a tiny bit tricky to find the correct entrance (it’s in back, by the way!). I was tired and a bit sore following my appointment, but when I woke up the next day, I felt incredible! She addressed my ongoing sciatica pain, nerve issues in my neck, and carpal tunnel in both wrists. I purchased a gift card for my boyfriend and I can’t wait for the my next appointment! text: Be very Careful she takes your Credit Card before hand so she can charge your card if for ANY reason you have to cancel! Even if you have a family emergency. My grandson was rushed to the emergency room in the middle of the night with a appendicitis being rushed into surgery. She called me when I was suppose to be there, I tried calling her back with no reception couldn't get her on the phone. Had my person assistant try to reach right back out to her and called several other times leaving a voice mails with no response and she still changed  not just a cancellation fee but the entire massage!  She never returned any of my calls and finally when I had my next appointment says sorry I am sure you understand why I have policies in place! Yes I do understand however I also understand customer services and if one of my clients or customers who have a legitimate family emergency I would also NEVER charge fee.

resp.text: Loretta, I apologize for the inconvenience. I understand you’re upset however, I always make sure to take the appropriate steps to contact my clients before charging a cancellation fee for no shows per my cancellation fee policy. Please understand my time is valuable and it is not fair to other clients who get turned away from a potential appointment due to a no show. As discussed via text message earlier today, I am willing to apply 1/2 of the no show fee towards a future appointment.

name: Holly Lewitas
text: You couldn’t be in better hands than those of Dr. Buettner’s. I am over 70 years old and have been her patient for over 15 years. She has not only saved my back and my hips but also my sanity when I thought there could be no way to end my pain, but she did. She also solved things like my vertigo and taught me why it happened and what I could do to counteract it. There are times I felt like I might have to crawl to get there, but dang it I was going to get there! No, you do not always feel all fixed after one visit, and you do have to work with her and do what she says and yes, it can take more than 1 visit to reverse the damage you have waited too long to work on, but she never makes you come more times than your body needs. She is kind, realistic, honest, and professional. She will tell you the truth. You will definitely learn to respect the value of ice. Bottom line – you can trust her, and you will be so incredibly grateful that you found her and her skilled hands and problem-solving mind. She is the best!

text: I cannot say enough good things about the whole operation at Chiropractic Arts! I’ve struggled with back problems for years and doctors have never been able to properly “fix” me, but after only a few months with Dr. Barb, I am seeing massive improvement in my lower back- pain has been alleviated and range of motion is much better. I’m not “crooked” in the mornings anymore :) Plus she is so easy to get along with and you feel like you’ve just known her for years, even from the first session. I have also recently added in massage therapy with Robyn and she is extremely talented. She has such good pressure to make you really feel like you’ve been worked on (she’s done wonders on my neck in only 2 sessions!) but also has the ability to completely relax your mind and body. And Candace at the front desk just plain rocks- she’s very attentive and always great conversation. I highly recommend Chiropractic Arts not only for their services, but also for the atmosphere. You’ll always leave the office in much better shape than you arrived- feeling better, more positive, and uplifted. PS. Shout out to Tesla, the cutest canine office companion!

resp.text: I must say  I am shocked by this review as I haven't seen this client in months. He came in twice and didn't indicate in any fashion there was a problem. He complained about several therapists so maybe I shouldn't be shocked that he didn't address me directly. While I cannot say what the nature of his dissatisfaction was, I can say that he remained over 3 hours after his session discussing his life and I was not compensated for this time. He could have discussed whatever he was dissatisfied with at that time instead of waiting  months to leave an unhappy review. I cannot say what it was that he wanted and didn't receive only that I strive to address and care for any issues I am made aware of. I can only wish him the best in finding the therapist that is perfect for him.

The best  in the business

name: Violet Knight
text:
I have been for a 60 min. therapeutic massage with Melody now three times. Sessions started off great and have gotten even better! Melody is incredibly kind and patient, and she listens and takes me seriously when I mention any issues I'm having with my body. She has done an amazing job of tending to those areas based on what I report, and I have always felt comfortable with her and with my ability to let her know how the massage is feeling.

Speaking of which, I'm an Aspie-- I'm very shy and also very sensitive to sounds and smells, and the Over the Mountain Therapy office caters to sensitivities extremely well. The building their office is housed in is surprisingly modern and well-kept, the elevators seem very new and ride smoothly, and there are clean restrooms located close to the elevators on every floor, as far as I can tell. The actual office space you'll go into has its own door which leads into a cozy common space, so just push the handle with some force and walk in.

Inside, the atmosphere is very soothing and easy on people with sensitivities (or anyone who just wants to feel relaxed and spa-like!). The lighting is low and calming, and there are definitely scents, but none are overpowering or headache-inducing. Melody puts some aromatherapy oil near the headrest, and the peppermint has been perfect -- not too strong, even for someone like me.

The massage room we've used is also incredibly cozy and gentle. The lighting is still kept low, the furniture is cute, and the massage table is SO comfortable. There is a heating pad on it, which feels good and helps keep you warm, and the fabrics are all soft and pleasant to touch. There is nice, soft spa music in the massage room... the whole experience is just highly relaxing.

Definitely recommend!

name: Rashelle E
text: Over the Mountain Therapy is amazing!! Both Mary and Melody are terrific in making their clients feel at ease and relaxed. Thank you, Ladies!!!

text: I developed  upper back/shoulder pain several weeks before visiting my father in the Gulf Shores area. The pain was getting was not getting better, and I could feel the muscles knotted up in the area where the pain was radiating from. I was drawn to Joyce based on the outstanding reviews her clients had posted. I want to say she didn't disappoint! The initial visit made an immediate positive impact on my pain level, and I scheduled another visit the following week. The 2nd visit was more of the same, and within 2 or 3 days, my pain had disappeared and has not returned. Joyce was very professional, and easy to talk to. She was able to accommodate my visits well within an acceptable time, and at a great value! I will definitely be back when I return to the area next year. Thank you Joyce it was a pleasure meeting you, and kudo's to an outstanding experience!

text: With many experiences with massage therapists at all levels of development, Joyce has what it takes to be a healer.  She incorporates all types of massage techniques into a routine suited to each client for the specific areas of the body that need improvement. She is educated and intuitive, and "reads" the body's responses o learn what will give he client the most benefit, and begin the healing process.  I recommend Joyce to all my friends, and have even recommended her to strangers who are anyone looking for massage therapy.

name: Morgan Atwell
text: I had an amazing massage from Becca the other day. I have a few problem areas, and she listened and was very attentive to everything I needed. I have a bad shoulder from many years of strain, injury, and carrying heavy server trays and do not have full range of motion. After a personalized massage, lots of water, and a day of relaxing my muscles, I can finally move my arm freely, which I have not been able to do in over a year. I feel fantastic. With long term problems, you don’t always realize how much an area hurts until it doesn’t anymore. If I could rate more than five stars I would. In addition to the massage, I had a steam, parrafin dips, and a facial. I have sensitive skin, but they use good products and my skin feels great.

text: Since the Eastern Shore location of The Complete Skin Care Centre closed a while back, I have been looking for an alternative that was not too pricey and somewhere where I would not feel out of place. When I read an online review of Mountain Massage & Day Spa, I decided to give them a try and was beyond delighted with the experience! Nikki was wonderful, the experience was incredible and very affordable, and my skin looks and feels great! I will definitely be a repeat customer!

Experienced the best sports massage in March 2017 .   Using my gift certificates every year and giving myself certificates it like my stored gold mine :). Facials wonderful and soon hope to add

Kat did a
Hour facial 4/27  : ). and this week I'm still glowing . The neat part ,  I bought myself a gift certificate for the same exact pleasure ;wish I could go tomorrow but must wait a week or two !!!

name: Karen Miller
text: I had a wonderful massage given by Kim!  Her techniques were awesome and I left feeling like a new person!     Kim worked every muscle and really helped my neck and arm pain!  Thank you!!

name: Elizabeth Binion
text:
My husband and I made this our spa splurge on a recent trip to Point Clear/Grand Hotel.   I was offended by the staff at the Grand Hotel Spa and the outrageous prices helped me make the decision to search elsewhere for some relaxation.  We were the luckiest people to find Mountain Massage and Day Spa.  Nikki (the owner) was a delight to deal with for scheduling our afternoon.  The location is ideal and very easy to find.  The prices are very reasonable considering the service you receive.  Their menu has much to offer in massages and spa services.  .We signed up for several and were very pleased with each one!

We were greeted by Nikki and Reagan upon arrival.  They were very welcoming and friendly.  We instantly felt right at home! I had the Herbal Body Wrap, steam treatment and the Parrafin and Stone Facial. This was my first facial and body wrap.  Nikki explained each process to me b/c I'm a dork like that. She was very patient with me! My husband had the Morning Glow Face lift massage and the Mountain Glow package (full body massage and facial).   My husband and I both agree this was an unbelievable experience. Our total treatments lasted 3 hours and this was the best part of our weekend getaway! The products used were organic and smelled wonderful.  My husband said he felt 23 years old after leaving!

If you want to have a wonderful, personalized spa experience, with top notch staff,   and not the "get them in, get them out" feel as you would at a larger resort spa...don't hesitate to call Nikki at Mountain Massage & Day Spa! You will not regret it!

name: Shannon Millet
text: The massage was heavenly. Such professionalism with the staff. Mrs Berdos is the best.

text: Frances gives a great clinical massage. Because of her expertise,  I am able to keep from going to a pain clinic. text: Fran is a miracle worker. After weeks of back pain and a visit to the chiropracter, Fran was able to use multiple methods to get my back loosened up enough to finally self-adjust - pain gone. Fran is a talented therapist skilled in many forms of therapeutic massage.

resp.text: Thank you Ken.

text: I recently relocated to the Huntsville area from Portland, Oregon and was on the search for a new (routine) therapist. Fran exceeded all expectations; knowledgeable, experienced, progressive and SKILLED. This establishment is a hidden gem nestled right off the parkway. Huntsville's best kept (not for too long) secret. 10/10 would recommend.

resp.text: Thank you 😊.  It was very nice meeting you.  Your business is greatly appreciated 🙏.

name: Denise Laventure
text: Fran is a very gifted therapist. Best massage ever! I'll be returning often.

resp.text: Thank you and Denise 💕

name: Suzanne Tjarks
text:
I've been coming to Dr Wagner for 3 years. As a competitor, I beat my body up daily and at my age it gets hard to cope with sports  injuries the way I could when I was younger. Dr. Wagner is very knowledgeable on sports injuries. I trust his opinions and listen to his advice even when I want to be stubborn and think I am still 21!
When he adjusts me the pain is gone instantly
and I feel like a new person again. He shows concern and compassion for his patients.  His staff has always been very helpful and they know me  by name, that's always a special touch.
I love that he has combined the Growing Younger Spa with his Chiropractic Care...it makes it easy to come to one place now. The office is just beautiful!  I have sent several people to Dr Wagner for various reasons and they have all been very appreciative...he is a very good Dr.
Thank you Dr. Wagner!
Sincerely
Suzie Chitwood

name: Jeanna Wing
text: I suffer from a lovely bout of scoliosis and need regular chiropractic care. I have been seeing Dr. Wagner for the almost 15 years.  He is a great chiropractor (and I have had a few over the years!) and he LISTENS to you which is huge!  I would (and DO) recommend him to anyone in need of these type of services.

name: Chad Noles
text:
I have been having lower back pain and shooting pain down my right leg for over a year now. I went to the ER last year because it was hurting so bad. They gave me pain meds and muscle relaxers and sent me on my way. 2 visits to my family doctor and the same result.

I finally gave up and went to see Dr. Wagner a few weeks ago and I am so glad I did. The insurance and billing is so easy. They do not require an appointment either which makes for for convenient visits. Just walk in after your initial setup and enter your info on the computer and straight back you go.

Dr. Wagner did an in depth consulation, took some x-rays to see what the situation was and he put me on the path to feeling pain free again. He is the first chiropractor I have ever been to, but I am a believer now. I would highly recommend him to anyone. Coming from a previous skeptic, that is saying a lot!

name: Steven Seagraves
text: Dr. Wagner is top-knotch.  Great facility and treatment.  I started coming here after an auto accident and 3 years later I still come as needed, about once every other month or so...even though it is in the next town over and I pass at least a dozen other chiros on the way to his office.  Being a full-time desk-jockey with a stature of 6'3" and a previous neck injury, I encounter neck and back issues regardless of physical activity outside of work.  Dr. Wagner always lends an ear and knows how to put me back on the right track -- I always feel great and pain-free after an adjustment. His facility is state-of-the-art with the easiest, hassle-free insurance/billing I have EVER encountered.  I would recommend him to anyone, hands down!

name: Paxton Sanders
text: Quick and easy to deal with, plus immediate relief for my back.

text:
As a Personal Chef in Dothan AL specializing in Healthy food and Nutrition, my first yoga experience when I returned from Chicago was Nature Gallery and what a wonderful journey it has been.

Gretchen and her team is extremely knowledgeable, acceptable, kind and loving and help you no matter what level of expertise. They believe in giving back to the community and it shows! Their studio is warm and inviting and every class leaves you feeling uplifted and calm - ready to take on anything!

From fabulous massages by Jason to the numerous classes offered at Nature Gallery you will find a loving and accepting staff and classmates as you surround yourself in the beauty of art in this lovely atmosphere of warmth.

Namaste

name: Christy Carter
text: I have been doing vibration therapy on a regular basis for 3 months now and the cumulative effects are really noticeable.  A therapy session is relaxing and meditative.  Jason helps you find the perfect position for your session for comfort.  My sleep has improved, my overall mood, my outlook, pain in joints completely gone after a session.  If I am going through something tough I always book a session and it helps me through it.  I would recommend strongly you  try it for yourself.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Christy!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Stephanie!!!

text: I've consistently taken Yoga classes at The Nature Gallery for going on 2 years now.  I even participated in their first Peaceful Warrior Teaching Training Series, which was an incredible and life-changing experience that I recommend to everyone!  They offer a variety of classes for different yoga styles, and various class times to meet most anyone's schedule.  The teachers, and all the staff for that matter, are awesome!  I can't say enough good things about The Nature Gallery!

name: Nature Gallery
text:
Austin Prince ~
I'm truly sorry your experience wasn't up to your standards.  We are all human... we have good & not so good days.  I'm very sorry that one crummy experience rushed you to jump on your electronic device & write a not so nice review.  Your credit card was fully refunded and we offered nothing but sincere apologies.  You were overly nice on the phone with us, which was odd after reading your yucky review.  Your wife was very sweet, we enjoyed meeting her :)  Maybe you should give our YOGA classes a chance... I assure you, your money won't be wasted there ~ $10 per class with an awesome team of Instructors.  Congratulations on your new little bundle of Joy!!!  ~ Namaste ~

name: Hope Richardson
text: The atmosphere is serene.. I had a massage by Jason. I could not walk without pain when I went to him. Every muscle in my lower legs where locked up. Jason did myofascial methods on my legs and I felt and feel so much better. Thank you Jason.  Thank you for your passion.

name: Korie Peek
text: Best massage ever. Affordable and wonderful. Went in with burning painful numbness in arms and hands and horrible lower back pain and came back out with much diminished discomfort. Ms. Kathy can not weigh much more than 90 to 100 lbs, but she has been doing massage therapy over 20 years and knows where and how to apply the pressure needed to relieve your aches and pains. I have sent 3 people I know personally as well that were suffering from pinched nerves or wrenched muscle and all have been made into believers of massage therapy and they are now spreading the word about her. Two of them were grown men who were surprised she was able to do them any good due to her small stature. Small does not equal weak. I believe she can put all of her 95 lbs right on top of her knuckles when and where needed. Money well spent and I will continue to spread the word about Ms. Kathy and her little highly skilled healing hands.

text: Life changing experience! Wonderful! Deserves more than 5 stars! The levitation meditation is extremely healing. I plan on going once a month if not more! Thank you Bridget and Chris!

text: This review is extremely belated because I just haven’t known how to explain how awesome this place is. I’ve gone here for Craniosacral therapy, primal flow yoga, and most recently the Yoga Nidra Meditation class in aerial silks. Craniosacral therapy is my favorite- it’s a gentle session which relaxes my nervous system away from areas of chronic pain. Chris and Bridget provide a presence which allows me to do my own inner work. Their teamwork in the yoga nidra class make the room feel like an intentional family. Their respect for the work they do is demonstrated through the many tools they are willing to use for healing support. I know that I’m in good hands when I’m with them and I have no reservations referring others.

I can’t wait to see what the future holds for this place!

I have had massages by both Bridget and Chris and they are both fantastic and attentive. I suffer from carpal tunnel and also have some missing muscles and bones on one side that cause neck and shoulder pain. Being messagesd by them always gives me a lot of relief in both areas. Yesterday I went in for a massage and my ankle (that's 7 weeks into healing from a broken bone and sprain) was very swollen and throbbing. By the time I left the swelling and throbbing were both gone and I felt so much better.

They also have a fun and welcoming vibe and play lovely soothing music that is really relaxing. I love all of the colorful art too. Definitely check them out!

The massage from Brianna was thorough, and I really appreciated the gentle way that she worked through any knots! Afterwards, I didn't feel greasy like I have at other places in the past. From beginning to end, it was top notch and I will definitely be going back again.

I felt very comfortable there and they really made an effort to make sure I was enjoying myself. I will definitely be back and highly reccomend a massage from Brianna! Felt great and put me in a good mood for the rest of the week.

name: Kris Szeb
text: Great neuromuscular therapy session with Justin. Learned about new techniques while getting all my usual aches and pains worked out. Great location and easy to schedule...Five star experience all around!

text: This is one of the very best massage therapy clinics I visited anywhere in the world.  Highly knowledgeable and talented staff. Highly recommended.

text: Amazing, as always. Brianna is the best.

text: Conscious massage therapy that's a step above the rest. Check them out!

name: Adam LaScola
text: I wish I could leave Zero stars.  Just left there 5 minutes ago, 12/13/18.  Got a massage from woman claiming to be owner.  Massage was okay, not the best nor the worst I've ever received.  Left a $5 tip on the ticket.  Perhaps it was a poor tip, but I figured since she was the owner, she didn't have to split the cost of the massage with anyone.  The moment she saw me write $5 on the ticket she called me cheap.  I couldn't believe it.  I even asked for clarification just to make sure I didn't misunderstand her broken English.  Again she said "only $5, you cheap".  At this point I just walked out.  Halfway out the door I heard "DON'T COME BACK" in perfect English.  I will be sure not to.

resp.text: I’m sorry you had a bad experience.  The worker that claimed to be the owner is no longer with the company.  We always tell the employees to not ask for tips and that the customer may leave any amount they want.   Again, I apologize for your experience and hope you give us another chance.

name: Alisha Adelman
text: Saw this place while shopping and decided to try it out we tried to walk in but they were in session so we called and asked for a couples massage for 1 hour. They were able to get us in for 45 minutes later which was great. We walk in and they show us to the room and they say you are in here he is in there. I said we asked for a couples massage do you have a room with 2 tables. She says no we don't have anything like that the rooms are to small. We  both needed a massage so I went along with it. The massage was OK they did ask about pressure and what we wanted. Maybe it was the fact that they split me and my fiance up during the '' couples '' massage but I walked out of there more tense than when I walked in. Probably would be a good experience for someone who isn't wanting a couples massage but for the lack of communication on the fact that they don't do couples massage I am only giving 2 stars and the massage was not that impressive either.

text: I had a wonderful massage here in Rose Massage. It was very relaxing, really helped my back pain. Have booked a full session and looking forward to it. :)

name: Terrell Nixon
text:
My neck and back hurt so was looking to get it worked out.  Was a little skeptical after reading some of the reviews but thought would give it a try.

I was pleasantly surprised.  I called.to make a appt for a other day as it was late.  They said they had a table open so I went on in.  The place is in a small strip mall but most of them here in Huntsville are.  Once you get inside looks like most small massage places.  I have included a few pictures from their website as they are accurate of what you actually see.

The lady was very nice and very professional.  She gave me a very relaxing massage.  I would have like a little more work on my neck but I did say anything as I wanted to just see what was their normal.  Only other improvement I can think of is she did not do the front of my legs at all.  Since I do alot of lifting and crawling around that is always a sore spot.  But over all I left feeling very relaxed.

I did opt for the shower table as some recommended to get the oil off.  Again very professional and make sure "everything" that needed to be covered stayed covered.  Thought it might be awkward but the way she did it made it feel very professional so really did not even think about it.

The only real negative I can say is the same as of other peoples reviews.  They leave the door slightly open so anyone walking by can see in.  I understand from a security view but the walls are paper thin (like most every other place you get a massage) so you can hear everything so I do not really see that the pros outway the cons for doing this.  I could not really relax and although I really like this place it was the reason for 4 stars vs 5 stars.  It also would be the one thing that made me look somewhere else ☹.

Also one note since it came up in some of the other reviews.  No one pressured or even asked me for a tip.  I did give her one as she did a good job but she never asked.  The only thing they asked was if I would like a 4 hand massage (I only booked a 60 min) and when I said not tonight that was that.

Over all a great place and so far I recommend it for a great relaxing massage if you dont mind everyone that walks by your door seeing in 🧐.

Will update if I go back.

resp.text: Hello, Terrell. Thank you for giving us the opportunity and we are glad you like our services. We keep improving our management and services base on our customers' feedbacks. Thank you for your business and hope to see you soon.

name: andrew ausin
text: Always very nice and courteous, I always call ahead and can get in same day. I’ve gotten the standard massage every time and they always help my back feel a lot better!

name: Jack Smith
text: This was not a good experience at all. I thought I would give them a try. Opted for the 4 hand massage as it was supposed to be their best. The whole time door left open so one of the masseuse could go and deal with people coming in dealing with them at my door, and answer the phone. The 2 ladies talked the whole time to each other like gossiping, but couldn't understand them. The lady answering phone and stuff wasn't even in room half of the time. She finally just brought the phone in with us and just started answering it there. As I was leaving the girl giving the massage ask for tip. I thought well she did give pretty good massage herself and tipped her. Then she fussed saying it was 2 of them I needed to tip the other lady to! And kept insisting! I just left, $120 massage and $20 tip. Save your money and go elsewhere.

resp.text: Hello, Jack. Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate our customers' feedbacks because that’s how we can improve our management and services. We do have rules like no talking during massage sessions, no asking tip after services etc. We now have highly trained therapists and and we will prevent these happening again. Thank you. We try to create a relaxing and comfortable atmosphere for our customers. That’s how we gain so many loyal customers. Thank you.

name: Julie Hass
text: My 88 year old grandfather was experiencing numerous health issues, including muscle weakness and issues with balance which were limiting his mobility. He attended physical therapy sessions in the past, but did not see significant improvement. The lack of improvement was attributed to several reasons, one of which was his lack of commitment and consistency to  the program. The first day he walked into Renew, not only was the staff extremely knowledgeable... but they were engaging! They were friendly and fun and interacted with my grandfather in such a manner that he actually enjoyed going to his visits. In the past, it had been a chore getting him to attend on a regular basis... but after participating in a few sessions with Cary at Renew, he actually looked forward to his visits and wanted to attend. My grandfather had an excellent outcome because of his excellent experience. Cary is a great therapist and not only provides top notch treatment to his patients, but does so in a fun, interactive and engaging manner. My grandfather felt like he was a celebrity each time he walked in to an appointment because Cary and Tara were so engaging! I would highly recommend Renew Therapy. It is a top notch, where patients are treated in a one on one manner and the entire staff is truly invested in the care and treatment plan of the patient and the person as a whole.

resp.text:
Thank you so much, Julie, for taking the time to talk about your experience with us! We really do LOVE what we do!! We are always here for you guys if you need us again.
Please tell "pappy" that we said hello and that we miss him!

name: Susan mcilwain
text: I have known Cary for almost 21 yrs! He is by far the most professional,  ethical and best PT in the Mobile area. He will give you his undivided attention and establish the best plan of care based on your need. He has treated me a couple of times with the most optimal results. I highly recommend him.

resp.text: Thanks for your kind words, Susan!! We LOVE treating you!

text: What a great experience. Cary is so knowledgeable and the atmosphere there is unlike any other. They are so much fun while remaining professional. name: PMD Lover
text: When I came in for therapy for the first time I was not expecting much as I had been to therapy on numerous other occasions! I have multiple heath issues including DDD, severe osteoporosis over 30 bone spurs in my neck & a lower back spinal fusion!  Much to my surprise & shock after the first two visits I was feeling so much relief from the spasms & knots in my neck & back!  The stronger I become the better I feel! Someone is always with you so you don’t do incorrect exercises, & encouraging you all the way!!  This is the place where you go to actually get better!!  So come on y’all & let’s get back to living life again!!

resp.text:
We take great pride in what we do!!
Thank you so much for sharing your story!
