text: I got a massage today by Michelle I think her name was. She was so polite and friendly. She also made me feel extremely comfortable and the massage was amazing. I will absolutely be going there again.

name: Mr Ken
text: I visited Massage Shang after reading their reviews. I must say i wasn't disappointed. One of the best massage i have ever had. Lily is good and professional. I would recommend her!

name: joel lightner
text: My first ever full body massage did not disappoint! Excellent prices, super friendly staff, and left feeling like a million bucks.

name: Almosta Farm
text: This is our first couples body massage. They made us feel very comfortable, and accommodated us however we needed. Loved it!

name: Adrian Abshire
text: My visit was excellent - the masseuse was very good and friendly. She helped with all the sore spots and did not rush.  I feel great and reinvigorated.  The waiting room is nice and the rooms are clean and very comfortable.  Will recommend to my family and friends.

name: Mike Morris
text: Great massage! Very professional at what they do and an extremely clean environment.

name: Phyllis Gibbs
text: Was not impressed at all !!!! After you pay for your message they try to tell you how much to tip!!! Some of the things they said was very inappropriate!!! I will not go back there!!!!!!

name: Curt Bevington
text: Outstanding!  Service, professionalism, atmosphere and price are great but the staff, Michelle, Heidi and Mia make this my go-to place to fix the knots whether from work, traveling or just sitting on the couch too much. The quality is top notch and compared to most, they rank at the top of a long list of providers. I've walked in without appointment and called ahead and always the same great service. You will not be disappointed with Shàng or the Ladies who will leave you relaxed and revitalized. My thanks Ladies and I'll see you again soon.

name: Tanveer Zia
text: Amazing service every time, very professional staff, clean and tidy spa. Went for a couples massage twice now, once foot massage and once table massage. Heidi is amazing (wife’s favorite) and Mia is awesome too. You cannot go wrong at Massage Shàng!

name: MARGARET PENNY PTERNITIS
text: I went because I had purchased a Groupon for a 60 minute foot massage. Place is nice and clean. Michelle is AMAZING! I have diabetes and she made my feet feel so much better. Cannot say enough good things about them, will be back soon!

name: S A
text: The BEST and only massage spa I will go to in Huntsville Madison area. Nicest sweetest ladies work here, I always have a good time and feel like a new person walking out of Massage Shàng. They take care of you like real friends ❤️

name: Mike Williams
text: Amazing massage therapy by Mia. Nice, friendly and very professional. She has the gentle hands of a delicate woman but the strength of a strong man. Can cater to any level of intensity. Would definitely go back again.

name: Scott G.
text: Tried Massage Shang for the first time and have to say the massage I was received was outstanding.  Very clean and friendly establishment.  Prices are also unbelievably low over commercial massage establishments.  I will definitely be a repeat customer.

name: Aaron Hansen
text: Very good massage, will be back

name: Dewane Mills
text: Michelle is very nice !

name: Michael Williams
text:
Hands down (maybe pun intended??) this is the best massage I've ever had! I'm not a regular for massages but occasionally I need muscles relaxed since I work construction and its physical. I stumbled across this place today and spur of the moment..stopped since the sign said "massage". This was the most professional and deepest massage my back, and especially feet, have ever experienced! But let me assure you the therapy was literally from head to toe and great.
I'll definitely be back here when I pass through again. I hope its soon!!

name: Bubba Buford
text:
This is one of this best massage places in Birmingham.I Always go by when in town
.

name: Anthony Latney
text: I’ve been here 5 years. The masseuses here are professional and do a good job. My work causes muscle tension and the masseuses here have done a great job getting me back in shape to work another day. They are polite ,friendly and skilled.

resp.text: Thank you Mr.Anthony. We really appreciate for your business , you and your family are so kind, wonderful and warm-hearted

name: Tacion Boco
text: Best Massage Ever Do You Hear Me !! I’ll be here biweekly for sure

name: peter garrett
text: The massage was outstanding and I feel great now.   I had hurt my leg while working outside but it already feels better.   I’ll be back for sure

name: D P
text:
Hey ladies, if your man comes here, he’s coming for more than a massage. Unprofessional.

Update: I am not from a competitive shop. Writing this because my husband told me what he got during your “massages” on more than one occasion. I’d be happy to file a complaint with the licensing board for illegal activities here instead if you’re going to try to claim this review is inaccurate. Chances are if these types of reviews keep coming up, it’s because they’re true. Clean up your business and get rid of employees who are willing to do illegal things to make an extra tip if you are truly concerned with the integrity of your business.

resp.text: This review is totally BS.  We’ve been dealing with competetive shops for several years posting false information and are tired of it and are taking a stand against those liars.  Ladies, bring your man to our location and find out for yourself the quality of massage and relaxation that we can bring into your life.   Sorry for any drama from this review but other shop owners are just ignorant.

name: J Lisa
text: My neck and back were so sore before going in tonight .the lady did a great job focusing on the knots and I felt like a million bucks afterwards.Great job! Thank you so much!

resp.text: Thank you Ms Lisa . It’s so good to meet you sweet couple here, hope see you again when you visit Birmingham next time

name: michael F
text: Had a recent auto accident and neck was stiff . The attendant worked out the kinks and I feel great.good.strong hands and quiet setting

name: Eddy Hignite
text: I have recurring pain due to nerve damage but never seem to find time for a massage. I noticed this place while driving and was thankful they accepted walk-ins. Decent pricing, excellent massage. Worth it.

name: dani osadchy
text:
I was asking for one hour massage after 20 minutes I understand that’s really not professional place and I asked to stop because it’s really didn’t feel like massage I explained nicely that I wasn’t enjoy from the massage and I would like to pay only for 30 minutes ,
The manager over there was so rude and unprofessional she told me if I say one hour you pay for one hour I try to explain myself that I wasn’t enjoy and I’ll finish it earlier so I can pay the time I was there .. bucks of course she is not professional and she charge me for a full hour and she told me if you don’t want don’t come back ! Ridiculous place!!!!

resp.text:
Dani,  I understand that you are not happy with your experience but you reserved 1 hour of time which we booked for your massage and avoided other customers.  Your massage lasted 40 minutes, not the 20 that you indicated and you became irritated when you tried to remove the cover sheet and the therapist kept putting it back on over you.  You were being very unprofessional and rude to the employee.

We suggested that maybe another establishment allows this but we do not which obviously enticed you to write this untrue review.

name: Gregory Monroe
text: First time I tried this place I was a little nervous because I am not used to massages but my back needed help. The lady was very friendly and the massage was great I would recommend this place to all my friends and family for a massage. I will definitely be coming back to get another massage again.

name: Carlee Laurent
text: It’s the piss poor customer service and communication for me 💁🏼‍♀️💅🏻

resp.text: Sorry you are upset.  When we spoke on the phone, I tried to let you know that we did not have any available appointments for today and that we can take you tomorrow morning.  You hung up before I could clarify details for you.

name: Kelsey
text: I called desperate during COVID times. I was scheduled the same day I called. The massage was pretty great too. I'd go again. For now, call to schedule and wear your mask! Thank you!

name: Billy Howell
text: Really nice people.  I have only had two massages before, and this was far more in depth.  Massage, rocks, hot towels.  I was there for lower back pain (back spasms maybe?), and I gained a lot back with regard to functioning throughout the day even though the pain wasn't entirely gone.  It is getting me through the healing process a lot easier.  I fully recommend this place.

name: jessie hucks
text: The best in Alabama by far.Gina is the best I have ever had  I would give it10 stars

name: 916mm
text: I would not recommend anyone to come to this place. There’s better in the area. This was my first massage and it was painful and tough, it’ll more than likely be my last! Then after I left I sat in the parking lot for about 10 More minutes because I was on my phone and the lady was peaking out of the window until I crunk up and when I pulled off she literally moved to the door and watched until I was no longer close by.

resp.text:
I’m sorry that you had a negative experience.  The therapists are all certified and trained to vary their pressure based on customer request.  It is ok to ask for more or less pressure based on your needs as each customer is unique.

Not all customers speak out loud for a pressure change so sometimes the therapist has to guess.

Try another therapist next time and be vocal with your pressure needs.  It’s okay, they are used to it.

name: Don Smith
text: My wife and I have come here for the past two months and have really enjoyed the friendly staff and professional attitude.  I had a back injury that has gotten gradually better over time.   I HIGHLY recommend this place for couples or individuals looking for relaxation.

resp.text: Look forward to your next Appointment Don

text: Meh

text: I'm from out pf town. The massage was ok at best, I wasn't going to leave a tip but the girl got upset and insisted. So be prepared to tip no matter if you like the message or not!

resp.text: I'm sorry you had this experience.  We instruct the therapists to never ask for a tip.  We let that therapist go after hearing of this.

resp.text: Look forward to seeing you soon

text: I definitely highly recommend Nancy for relaxation and therapeutic massage.  She is attentive to my needs and helped me feel at ease.  She addressed my concerns and I left feeling greatly improved!

I went in expecting a regular deep tissue massage and she recommended a few other treatments in addition, the results are truly amazing. I highly recommend her professional massage therapy services.

name: Barbara Frazier
text:
It's been hard to find a really good massage therapist in this area.
I was in a lot of pain with my neck and back. Nancy was amazing!
I would highly recommend her!

name: Kristen Spencer
text: Nancy is hands down the best around. She can tell what you need just off a simple assessment. I went in for a southing massage, after 5 minutes she said she thought I needed the therapeutic massage to work all my knots out. I felt so much better after she was done. I was actually able to finally fully stretch without being in pain. She’s beyond amazing

name: Ashley Bracey
text: When I came to see Nancy I had a migraine since December.  I had tried pills, adjustments, multiple doctor appointments.  Nothing was working.  I walked into see Nancy and she immediately knew what was wrong.  During her consultation, she suggested a massage that would help give me relief.  She then told me I should get the therapeutic massage over the stone massage I booked.  I took her advice.  She is AMAZING! Nancy knew when something was hurting me as she was giving the massage.  For example:  My left arm has been hurting and as she was massaging she felt it and cupped it.  I waited a week to write my review because I want to know if my results would last after I left.  Nancy made my migraine go away.  I have not been in pain since leaving.  I will be going back and I recommend anyone that has chronic migraines to book an appointment.

name: West Graham
text: My Wife and I used Nancy and her friend (another Massage Therapist), Tracie during a couples therapeutic massage and WOW! They were amazing, professional, and I was so relaxed! Thank you for such an excellent experience!

name: Stacy Wilson
text: I am so glad I found Nancy!  She has helped relieve my plantar fasciitis and tight hamstrings - and I improved my 5K time by 7 minutes. Nancy’s therapeutic approach improves my range of motion and keeps inflammation down. My mobility has greatly increased since I began treatment. My back and shoulders feel great for the first time in years! I highly recommend her as a premier massage therapist!

name: Kelin Flis
text: After dealing with tightness and clicking through my jaw for quite a while, I went to Nancy to see if massage could help with my jaw problems.  The relief was immediate and amazing!  My jaw muscles relaxed and I had a significant increase in range of motion!  If you've been dealing with TMJ issues, go see her today!

name: gregory walters
text: Very knowledgeable Massage therapist! I always do the cupping to help relieve the tension in my muscle, she did an amazing job! I definitely recommend it!

name: Michelle Mullen
text: If you are hurting and are on the fence about massage therapy relief - book an appointment with Nancy.  You will not be sorry!  I have had carpal tunnel issues for years.  In the last year the pain has migrated to my elbow and shoulder.  The pain stopped me from doing activities I used to enjoy.  Nancy asked me to let her help me and because I trust her completely I said yes although I was skeptical.  The best decision ever!  I had weekly sessions for a month with Nancy that included massage and dry cupping on my upper back, shoulders and arms.  It worked!  My shoulder and elbow haven't bothered me since.  I plan on continuing as a preventative measure.  Book an appointment and let her help you too.

name: Brenda Denard
text: My first visit was great!  She worked on my problem areas.  I felt better after my session.  I will schedule my next treatment soon.

name: La Cosa Nostra
text: The ambience of this  place is very pleasant, calm, inviting, relaxing and soothing.

name: Mari Michael
text: I have adhesive capsulitis (frozen shoulder) syndrome, which causes stiffness, pain and range of motion loss in the shoulder.  I've been through physical therapy and continued the stretching exercises but still had issues. I visited Nancy to see if she could help relieve these symptoms.  Nancy recommended cupping therapy. Not only did cupping help relieve the pain, it also greatly improved my range of motion. I highly recommend Nancy the Massage Therapist!

text:
I was visiting family in Phenix City when my back locked up and I found myself in a desperate search for a massage ASAP. I found Nancy on Google, booked my appointment and was in her suite within a couple of hours.
The massage was wonderful. She was polite, professional, listened, and understood what my needs were.

Very clean
Very professional
Very friendly
I felt so relaxed and comfortable around her
Enjoyed our converse

text: Very talented professionals at CC'S Day Spa and Salon are always accommodating and most efficient. I recommend and refer my brides to them and have never had a complaint!!!!  Also, my husband and I use their services and are very happy with our results. The picture shows a bride whose hair and make up was done at CC'S.

name: Maple Goodwin
text: Relaxing, affordable and fantastic service.

name: Kati Roberson
text: They did my makeup for my wedding and WOW!!! Perfection! Airbrushed - I received SOO many compliments. It stayed on for 24 hours and looked amazing in photos. Highly recommend!!!!! So worth it!!!

name: Jessie Williams
text: I could not offer higher praise for CC's Salon & Day Spa! They took care of all my wedding day hair and nail needs for myself, my mom and all of my bridesmaids! Not only did we all look AMAZING, but we had such a fun, relaxing experience and thoroughly enjoyed our time here. We will be back!! Thanks so much CC's for your amazing service and skills!

name: Tina Cerne
text: Shannon did an amazing job with my hair. My hair was three different colors from a bad experience at another salon. She was professional, and recommended what we needed to do to fix my hair. I am incredibly happy with my new look. I look forward to my next visit, and trying out some of their other spa offers.

name: David Drennan
text: Good enough for a massage!

name: Jenna Stone
text: I had a therapeutic massage with Valerie on Saturday and it was the best massage I’ve ever had in my life!!  I get them regularly because I suffer from tension in my neck and shoulders causing tension headaches.   Valerie was very professional and listened to my concerns. I’ve never felt better leaving an appointment and I can’t wait to visit the area again so I can book another massage with her!  Valerie truly has miracle hands!!  The salon/spa was very welcoming and clean.  I enjoyed browsing the cute selection of clothes and jewelry while I waited.  I can’t wait to go back!!!  Thank you Valerie!!

name: Terri Paxton
text: Laura did an amazing job on my hair for my wedding. I was from out of town and selected the salon online. I was over the top pleased with the accommodations they made for me and of how beautiful my hair turned out. I highly recommend both the salon and Laura. Thank you so much for helping me pull off my special day.

name: Moonchild Jess
text: They were very nice upon arrival and pretended like they would squeeze us in at a later time. They waited for a whole hour then called and cancelled our reservation! It caused us to not have time to go anywhere else to get hair and nails done! That is the worst customer service I have ever experienced!

name: Harsh Gandhi
text: It is the best hair salon in the whole world... Employees are very talented and professional..!! And most importantly they care about their customers..!!

name: Lisa Fisher
text:
Laura did a great job on my hair for my wedding. I showed her a picture and it turned out perfect! Very friendly! Highly recommend!
Thank you Laura!

name: Cat Rude
text: I got an excellent one hour massage from Brenda! Lisa was kind and upbeat on the phone. She got three of us scheduled for a girls day within one day and called me back to confirm within an hour! They have a really cute salon that’s reasonably priced and has a really sweet, fun selection.

name: Shelli Anderson
text: These ladies were fantastic.  I brought my 79 year old mom for a day of pampering while on what is likely to be her last beach vacation.  Thank you so much for making us a special day with great memories.   My sister and Aunt totally are jealous and planning their day later this week too!  Highly recommend this salon and we had many services between Mom & I.  Waxing, massage therapist was one of the best, pedicures and a fantastic cut and color on Mom.  Thank you again ladies.  You are amazing!

name: Joan Burke
text: Was shocked at the price. I am originally from Atlanta and go back there regularly to visit my children and grandchildren. I usually have my hair done while I am there. However, one time I needed to have my roots touched up. I didn’t ask price beforehand (my bad) and was shocked when I checked out and the price was $80. I have never paid more than $55 at assorted salons in Atlanta. When the personnel at this salon came to our neighborhood (Peninsula) for an event, I was impressed and that is the reason I went there. However, I do not believe a simple root touch-up should cost this much. I won’t be back.

name: Shelia McKee
text: Very nice Experience. AJ you did a wonderful Facial. And you are so Sweet. Valerie I can say WOW to you The best massage I've ever had. Thank you Ladies

name: Shopgirl18
text: Looking for a great massage then call Valerie.  She is friendly and can work miracles with stressed necks and shoulders! Very nice facility and very clean .Easy to reach in the middle of Gulf Shores.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review we enjoyed your visit and hope to see you soon

name: Christian Henslee
text: This was my first time at a salon and I could really see a difference between the two! The staff was really tight knit and provided a great atmosphere. She was a saving grace regarding my hair for our family Thanksgiving pictures! She even kept my Charlie Brown style scar hidden just perfectly, which is no easy feat. I'd recommend this place to anyone who comes down here! Thank you again!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind words Christian! We are like family here at the salon and we want our costumers to feel the same, we try hard to provide a great experience for all :)

name: TONYA Medina
text: High class very expensive. They sell clothes shoes jewelry.  They also do massages. I was scared to ask how much. But Beth was nice and cut my hair.

name: Maison Pro Realty Lori Beth Caylor Broker-Owner
text:
This is the best salon in town!  Great prices. I always get the best service and everyone is so friendly.  Cindy always helps me and works around my schedule.  I never leave disappointed. Always get a compliment on color and cut.
The first salon that I use steadily and will always recommend - to everyone.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Julie Cottrell
text: These ladies are too shelf! My step daughter wanted electric lizard (lime green) hair. And they nailed it!! Nails were done, massage and facial.... best spa day

resp.text: Thank you so much we really appreciate your kindness and hope to see you again

name: Sandra Griffin
text: Got a GREAT facial from AJ,sooo relaxing!!! Then Shannon worked miracles with my hair and nails!! I highly recommend CCs,the ladies were so sweet and accommodating

name: Jess Stewart
text: Our family was on vacation and today my husband was treating me to a spa day for our anniversary. After a spa in Orange Beach booked me the wrong services and never called to inform me that they were unable to offer a service they personally confirmed two days prior, I was very disappointed, to say the least. This spa squeezed me in last minute and was so very kind and accommodating. Great Swedish massage! Thank you for a great experience!

resp.text: Thank you for your review Jess. We are so happy that we could turn your day around and give you exactly want you wanted. Hope to see you again!

name: Amber Treuting
text: My mom and I had the most relaxing and pleasant experience here. The staff is so welcoming and up to date on the latest trends. I had my first experience with dipped nails and they are amazing!!

name: Liz T
text: Hands down the BEST Hair Salon in Gulf Shores! Cindy was AWESOME! Extremely professional, AMAZING at what she does!  I have really thick, poofy, hard to deal with hair, and she thinned it, layered it, and gave me a haircut better than I've ever had in my LIFE!  Thought I've had good cuts before, buy now I know what a good cut is and feels like!  I will get my hair done here forever!  Thanks Cindy!  If I could give you 10 stars I would!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review! You are an amazing client and we appreciate you Liz.

name: Janet Plante
text: Great experience! Everyone was so kind and pleasant. Very clean and professional...reasonable pricing.Received a one hour swedish massage from Brenda...my first professional massage ever. I'm hooked!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the review we hope to see you again real soon.

name: Alisha Park
text: I got my hair and makeup done for my beach wedding. My hair was nothing like the pictures I showed for reference.  I had a hair piece that was supposed to be on like a headband and she put it on like a tiara. My hair wasn't smoothed out at all and was hairspray ed frizzy.  My makeup was so drastic and I felt like I was going to a pageant and not my wedding day. I actually wanted to cry when I saw myself in the mirror but did not have time to have anything redone. She didn't even let me pick my colors for my eye shadow. I wanted natural. I also paid extra to have the airbrush and I had so much makeup caked on that it showed lines on my face that I didn't even know I had. I would've been better off and felt more beautiful had I just done it myself and not wasted  $150. I went back and wiped half of my makeup off and tried to fix my hair the best I could.  I'm so disappointed because I only wanted to have the ceremony for the picutres and I won't even want to look at them.

name: Sylvia Howland
text: CiCi was very professional and the first hair stylist who knows how to cut & style hair in Foley. Orange Bch. Gulf Shores Al. I have gone to over 12 salon's. Have been living in this area for over 35 yrs., so I think I have been around. Everyone loves my hair. Thanks again CiCi. Hope to see you soon and bringing a new client.

name: Jamie Dickerson
text: Wonderful experience. The staff was so friendly and inviting. The massage therapist Victoria was amazing. Will definitely go back!

name: kelly maloney
text: I just got my hair done, nails and makeup done.  I want to thank @ccsalon_dayspa_boutique for doing a awesome job.  I look so beautiful at my best friend wedding!!

name: Jemmie Thomas
text:
On vacation, visited this spa.  We had everything from nails, facial, and massages.  Everyone was
very very pleased with services.  They were very friendly and very relaxed atmosphere.

name: Miranda Diel
text: Val is amazing!! Feel so much better! Definitely get the massage. :)

name: Brittany Dahlman-Bull
text: I got married on the beach and they did a fantastic job on my hair and makeup!! It was perfectly pinned so it wouldn't be messed up in the wind! Absolutely perfect! Thank you!

resp.text: Thank you we really try hard to make the brides day easier and keep her happy. we are thrilled that you had such a great time that you wrote a review thank you :)

name: Nicki Jenkins
text: Great service, these ladies got me right in last minute when I was in Gulf Shores on vacation. A massage and pedi were JUST what I needed to get vacation started right!

text: They have the best manicurists in town.

name: rebecca catalena

text: Fantastic place to get a wonderful massage. Three of us went in this morning and had massages. It was awesome!

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Ann, we strive to give everyone a pleasant experience like this. Our massage therapists are really the best. They are like family and we all bring each other up and everyone can feel that positivity. We hope to see you again!

CC’s is my salon of choice to refer my brides to for hair, makeup, mani/pedi, and massage!  They are always accommodating for them and ALWAYS give them great results!  I appreciate how wonderfully the owner and all the staff treat our brides and their friends and families. Thank youuuuu all !!!
Elaine
Gulf Shores Wedding Chapel
And
A Beach Wedding AL

name: Logan Moore
text:
Please note that this is under my sons name. Not sure why and can't get it to change. 🙁
We were visiting in GS for the week and called to see if there was an appt available on the day we called. We were simply told. NO. No offer to see if we were interested in another appt, simply NO. No the best business tactic. Just an opinion.

resp.text: We are so sorry that you did not get good customer service I the owner agree with you and we have taken care of the problem and I want to thank you for bringing it to my attention. CC Salon.

name: Linda Nantell
text: If you live or vacation in Gulf Shores, CC’s Salon and Day Spa is a must visit.. you won’t be disappointed! An excellent massage by Valorie Rossi, who took time prior to the massage to learn of my needs, and any medical or other issues that could be addressed to ensure the massage my needs were met. Following the massage, Shannon Ryck provided a great haircut, making certain to ask my specific wishes for the cut. I was most pleased with the entire experience.

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great review we enjoyed your visit and hope to see you soon

name: Karen Grant
text: Great experience from start to finish. Perfect bridal hair and makeup!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the great reviews

name: Keleigh Asbury
text: Laura was lovely, and the rest of the staff were very friendly. I’m picky about waxing but my brows look marvelous. A great find in AL!

name: Jacqueline Frame
text: I would give 0 stars if possible. We showed up 15 min before our appointment and filled out our paperwork. The ladies were talking around us about unprofessional subjects. Came time for our appointment and no body said anything. Finally 10 min after our appointment time I asked how much longer it was going to be as we had reservations to go to afterwards. With out apology they went to go check and came back saying they didn't know because one massage client made them late. 25 min past our appointment time we had to leave. They asked if we wanted to reschedule and I explained to them that this experience had left a bad taste in my mouth. They responded by saying these things happen. I do not suggest them as they are overpriced for the service they offer.

name: Chris Denson
text: Great medical massage this a.m. helped relieve ongoing pain....

name: Mamaking 777
text: Sweetest ppl ever!!! We traveled 12 hours to get to gulf shores for our 30th wedding Anniversary. We were running almost an hour late due to traffic, they were so kind and actually waited for us after hours. Kaitlin & Valarie gave us an hour-long couples massage and let me tell you, these girls were absolutely AMAZING. Valarie even got rid of my sciatica that I've had for weeks!! Thanks so much girls.... May God bless you!!

name: arlene meyer
text: \   what a wonderful place the staff is so helpful and pleasant to be with the service is impeccable

name: mason munoz
text: Great massage and get complements on my haircut all the time.

name: Crystal Fletcher
text: We booked a spa day for a group of 5. When I booked the day I was assured that no one would be sitting waiting on the others and that everyone would be receiving a service at the same time. Things started off fine but went south after the first round. One of our group sat for 1 hour waiting and we wound up waiting for the last lady for an additional hour. Really a matter of time management.  As far the services we were pleased. The massage was phenomenal.  We were asked where she needed to concentrate and she did a great job. Very relaxing!  The facial was wonderful as well. It was really one of the best I have received. The mani/pedi could have been better. Polish was sloppy and and cuticles were not trimmed on the pedi.  However, the ladies were friendly and it was overall and pleasant experience.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Crystal and for being so honest about your experience. The only way we can get better and always be growing and perfecting everyone's experience here is to have honest people like yourself. So far we have hired a receptionist so we will have better time management and we are practicing more on pedicures so we can be more comfortable getting the job done right. We would love to see you again next time you visit and maybe you can get another pedicure and let us know if we have gotten better. I'm glad you had an overall pleasant experience, That is our goal for everyone to have.

name: Therese Ann
text: I went in to have my hair professionally done and honestly...I could have done it myself as horrible as it turned out. I am embarrassed to say I paid $180 plus $30 tip (out of courtesy) to treat myself. It's very uneven and burndt. I have never had my hair turn out this color. I feel if you scew up someone's hair YOU SHOULDNT CHARGE THEM. I went in with healthy hair, left with burnt uneven hair. I'm disgusted. I GUESS YOU DON'T ALWAYS GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR. I WILL NEVER USE THEM AGAIN.

name: debbie Adams
text: Thank you Beth for my great color and cut

name: Denny Shirley Owens
text: Cindy has been my stylist for several years.  I’m always pleased with her work, and the professional, pleasant, and friendly atmosphere of her salon.

name: Mollie Cole
text: I chose this place because of the reviews on Google but I would NOT recommend this salon to anyone for their wedding or bridal party. I was told over the phone that they would not quote me prices because I had little girls getting their hair done so if it was simple it wouldn't cost as much. I also had to give them $100 deposit to hold the reservation (completely understandable until I arrived). One of the stylists was very nice but appeared to be more of an apprentice and had to keep asking for help to do the hair of the 2 younger girls. We were still charged full price for these styles ($75 for a 6 year old and 8 year old). One was a bun and did NOT look good and it didn't even resemble the picture we used. Again, she was very nice but the hair was not close to what we asked for. Two of the styles were supposed to be beachy waves and instead we left with weird curls and half done hair. Both charged $55 and took almost no time making it look even decent. They asked me to send pictures ahead of time for my hair and then clearly had not looked at them. I had to ask multiple times about fixing it (it was for my wedding after all) and while my stylist was nice enough to fix it she did seem VERY annoyed. I left with ok hair that I could live with (not exactly what I had in mind as a bride). And somehow I was charged the same price for mine as the 6 year old flower girl. The owner was pretty rude - she told my sister that she could put the little girls in a room and close the door while we waited. The same girls she charged full price updos for. I guess they were good enough to pay but not make noise in her salon? The last complaint was that the stylists kept stopping with our party to help a mom and bride that were also in the salon. Overall very bad hair and bad experience.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback we appreciate the negative review as well as the great reviews . We strive to help everyone have a pleasant experience. We have a great salon and lots of talent.it is unfortunate you didn't have that experience.moving forward we will take your comments and grow from them. C.C Salon

name: marissa rinaldi
text: Great little boutique with the cutest clothes at a wonderful price!!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for coming in we appreciate your business

name: Linda Chard
text: Perfect nails !

name: Ann McFadden
text: They are the best

name: Kathy Milano
text: Great place

name: Travis Jones
text: Worst experience I've ever had in a massage parlor. The woman made me pay upfront and even tried to tell me how much I should tip her before I even got the massage. Paid for a 1-hour massage (which was VERY sub-par) and she was rushing me out the door after 30 minutes because another customer walked in and she was the only one working. Never going back here again.

name: Darrell Jackson
text: This massage was a terrible experience for me. I normally get massages from elsewhere but I decided to try this spot for the 1st time.  The moment I went in I had to pay for service which was no problem. The lady asked did I want to add tip. I responded I haven't received service yet. She pushed the issue before invitinge back to massage area that I have to tip after service. I asked was that mandatory. She started actingike her English wasn't good. I proceed to go in to get massage only to feel her nails during a massage that's suppose to be relaxing. I didn't receive my full time once someone came in the door. My massage was done with the door open, it consisted of rubbing of baby oil for 45 mins instead of 60 mins.. just to think I started to get 90 mins 🤦🏿‍♂️

name: mary logan
text: There is no one I trust more than Hoover Automotive to work on my car. I honestly cannot say enough good do this place justice...no matter being major repairs or routine maintenance, my husband and I always choose HA for our car care services-THANK YOU KYLE AND JOSH, keep up the good work guys!

name: Jesse

resp.text: Thank you for the compliment! I enjoyed working with you.  I love what I do and love to help. See u soon!!

text: Love this place! have been looking for a nice clean and professional place for waxing, facials, and massages. I ran across Spa Elia by browsing the web and I did more research and went in for a consultation...let’s just say... they have gained a customer for years to come for sure!

name: Lisa Silver
text:
Spa Elia was such a wonderful experience. The atmosphere is so very relaxing. The staff was so kind and helpful. I was treated to a very good massage as a gift on my first visit. Brittany was very good. As a second gift from my wonderful sister, who lives in North Carolina, I was once again treated to a second treatment, a facial. Cornelia was wonderful and very sensitive to me and my experience while I was there. I cannot say enough about their attention to detail and customer service. I will definitely be scheduling my own service soon.

As a side note, unbeknownst to me all of this was arranged and coordinated by my sister remotely following a life changing and very fast move from out of state. From what I understand from my sister, the spa was very kind in working with her on every little detail. What a terrific experience for us all.

Thank you Spa Elia!

name: Marisol Visger
text: Love the Therapy massage ❤️ Super peaceful and cleaning atmosphere 🥰😁 Definitely recommend it to anyone!👍

name: Kristen Lind
text: Just came from a deep tissue couple's massage and it was amazing! Probably the best massages my husband and I have ever had. They found and worked out knots we didn't even know we had. Excellent experience all around. I highly recommend them!

name: Sachel Barber
text: I treated myself to a deep tissue massage and facial for my birthday. I been here before when I was pregnant and got a prenatal as well and they did not let me down. Lorrie was very attentive to my needs and even provided a robe and slippers for my trip to get my facial. There was a smooth transition. Michelle did my facial and Ive had a facial before, but not like this! She was very thorough and even took the time to massage my hands and feet as well. I will never go to another spa ever in Montgomery area other than Spa Elia. Pleased with the customer service. I even got to use my Spa Finder gift card. Best birthday gift.

name: A H
text: What a wonderful and relaxing experience. I'm just passing through Montgomery but definitely wish to be a repeat customer

The staff was very friendly.  I will definitely be back and will ask for Erline again.  If you're wanting to treat yourself to a relaxing massage, I highly recommend making an appointment with Erline Taylor at Spa Elia!  You'll be glad you did!

name: Anthony Ard
text: Awesome!!!!

name: tesla nichole
text:
One of the best massages I've ever had! The prices are very reasonable, everything was clean and the atmosphere was nice and calming. Masseuse paid special time and attention to my problem areas and made sure I was okay with pressure and techniques throughout. The hot stones at the end were awesome! I would definitely recommend JY Massage and I will be back soon!

*in response to a previous review: Tips should always be given for such awesome service like this place provides. They do not ask for tip when they run your card, so be prepared with cash for after your massage. No tip money? Put off the massage for when you have a little extra money to spare.

name: Mike Ennis
text: Mon 7-6 i set  appointment for 7-9. On 7-8 i was burned in face so 45 min drive to place was painful. I arrived and the 2 women there started to argue because neither one wanted to serve me kept asking if i was someone else because apparently they doubled booked, one stormed away and the other demanded money up front and in rude voice told me to follow her. Less then a min later she came back gave money back said no massage get out. That afternoon i received a phone call offering to make things right but i was still frustrated and turned them down. 2 days later i decided to give second chance i message them trying get a hold of woman i talked to because i won't go back till i know i will be treated right. the response was sorry for your file (whatever that means). Tried calling but woman on phone could not understand i was trying to talk to someone else to the woman that offered to make things right. I feel i am wasting my time with them they were rude and other then the woman Thursday afternoon everyone else as been unprofessional

name: Charles Dunn
text: Best massage I’ve ever had. First one I’ve ever gotten were they stand on your back and massage with their feet. Got hot rock and hot towel at the end. Paid for 30 minute back massage and got 45. Awesome, professional, clean and friendly. Also affordable I called around and checked prices. I will definitely go back. Highly recommended.

name: Severo Gallegos
text: Beautiful And peaceful place. The Best Asian massage I ever experienced. I will definitely come back for more  and enjoy their awesome customer service. Plus they have reasonable prices.

name: Elmo Adelmar
text: This is probably the best spa I have ever been. Their attitude is polite and very friendly as well as services. The decoration of this spa yis awesome too and so as atmosphere. I was a businessman and always be exhausted after my work. Therefore, I was looking for the places in nearby and I found out this one. I strongly recommend to anyone wants authentic massage please do not hesitate come here and get healed and relaxed

name: Valley Dale
text: Great deep tissue massage. A walk on my back really helped.  Highly recommend.

name: Lane Woods
text: If I could give no stars I would! Just had massage and was demanded then shamed for not giving tip. Paid for 30 mins then was demanded for a tip. I know I should’ve provided a tip but I honestly had no more cash on me.

text: Great experience! Will definitely be back soon. Jessica is best massage therapist ever!!!

name: tesla nichole
text: Katie is an awesome massage therapist. She is professional, kind and fun to talk with. The massage room was clean and had a nice ambiance. Katie's technique is amazing! She not only gave a great massage, she spent extra time focusing on some areas that were really bothering me. I felt really great after, btw! The studio is easy to locate and has a nice parking lot. It's open and welcoming, and both the studio and bathrooms were very clean. I definitely recommend A Living Touch Massage!

name: M C (Raven22)
text: I’m so glad I found A Living Touch. Amazing massage and I will for sure go again.

name: Amanda
text: She is the absolute best!

name: Kimberly Whitfield
text: Beautiful place! Mandy is exceptional. She was all about making sure my hair was exactly what I wanted.

name: Joanna Byers
text: First time to have my curly hair done. I was so nervous, but Rebecca was so professional, trained and talented and super friendly! I think I have found the BEST stylist I have ever had!

name: Victoria Sisco
text: My hair was cut and styled by Mandy Bassett, and I must say she did a absolutely wonderful job! She was super open and friendly, she made sure she and I were on the page of what I was looking for. She made sure I was comfortable and enjoyed my appointment there. 100% would recommend.

name: lane brooks
text: I am not from enterprise so was hesitant to go to an unfamiliar salon with an unfamiliar stylist. Mandy was my stylist and was so welcoming. She actually allowed me time to explain what I wanted as I am very particular. She was so patient with me and achieved the angled cut I described. Even afterwards she had so much patience as I asked her to trim a little more off. I definitely trust her and will be back to see her when I’m in enterprise again. It was evident she wanted me to leave happy with my hair!

name: Krystal Spires
text: Absolutely LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this place. Mandy was amazing, she made me feel like I was at home. She is a very sweet lady. If you're ever in need of any hair care definitely go see Mandy! Thank you for everything. ABSOLUTELY LOVE MY HAIR!!!

name: Diane Siniard
text: Britley Parker is awesome!

name: Kara Cave
text: Very lukewarm experience with this place. The stylist offered a 9 am appointment. She walked in at 9:05 and was ready for me at about 9:15. If she hadn’t planned on being there on time, why inconvenience the customer? The color looked really good, the haircut was not. My cut is pretty simple. At the end of the appointment, Ana Maria informs me that she does not accept credit cards. She did not tell me this when I made the appointment. No one told me this while I was waiting for her to arrive. Instead, I was instructed to go across the street to the ATM. She did have a vague sign posted that she accepted cash or that checks could be made out to her. She did not have any wiring transfer services set up. Those services can be set up in the same time I spent waiting for her to arrive. She seemed to be under the impression that I am here to make her life easier. For 125.00 for cut and color I hoped that she would have made a bit more effort. Maybe other stylists at the same facility would be better, but I was really disappointed.

name: Lindsay Stumpf
text: Went to hair n motion Saturday and saw Ana to get my hair cut and thinned out before my wedding in July, scheduled a shampoo cut and style. Didn't get a shampoo or a style at all. when I sat down, told her what I wanted, layered, and thinned out. She cut half my hair blunt across the bottom and when I corrected her she proceeded to layer the rest of my hair but didn't go back and layer what she had already cut. I have half layered hair that is also longer one one side than the other. And no time to fix it before my wedding without needed to cut off more of my hair than I wanted.  I've used them before, but the last few times have been sub par and disappointing. Definitely finding somewhere new.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback.  We are sorry you were not happy with the outcome. We have several other stylists to consider next time you need hair services.

name: Dana Mobley
text: Mandy is incredible! I've never had a stylist be so patient with me before. Today was my first visit to this salon, and I was nervous walking in to my appointment. I told Mandy my concerns with my hair and she instantly made me feel comfortable. She took the time to talk with me and understand what I wanted with my hair, and made sure I was happy with the planned cut before she even picked up her scissors. She gave me a wonderful cut, and I feel so confident and beautiful! I can't wait to visit again.

name: Cecilia Werder
text: I have only recently moved to the Enterprise area so I have no clue of where to go and who to trust with my hair. I had ask for recommendations but was not sure of them because not everyone can work well with thick course Hispanic hair. I have had a terrible hair experience in my past and because of that I am extremely picky about who I let cut and style or touch my hair. I decided to make a choice of my own and give this salon near my house a try and I am so glad I did.  Daniella did such an amazing job on my hair. She thinned it out, trimmed it and did some color touch up. She listened to what I wanted and gave me just that. I am sure I was her challenge for the day since I had gone without a haircut for quite some time again out of fear that my hair would be a mess. I was pleasantly surprised and will be back for sure. As a matter of fact my next appointment will be to try out a massage.

name: Cricket
text: My first time meeting Mandy. She did and excellent consultation on my cut and color, and  the results were exactly I wanted. Will be going back.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Kimberly Sisk
text: I had the best experience at this salon. I had to bring my baby and everyone was so sweet and helpful. Mandy is amazing! I showed her a picture of the cut and color I wanted and she nailed it.

name: Corina Ward, Realtor with Coldwell Banker Prestige
text: New to town and going for job interview... scary. Needed my hair done and got an appointment with Mandy Bassett. She came out and sat down next to me and talked for a good 5 minutes with me about what I needed. WOW! Then, she went above and beyond on covering my grays, the tone is perfect and the highlights are so professional looking! What a blessing she is! Mandy is heartfelt and really shaped my hair to accent my face in the best way. Sounds like I'm dishing here and she can't be real.... but believe me that she is real and awesome! Can't miss with this lady. Thank you Mandy!

name: Lillie Kelly
text: I love this place. Competent, experienced stylists with wonderful personalities! I use Briana and she is great! I highly recommend her!

name: Bella Nelson
text: It's been 1.5 years since I first had my hair cut and colored here.  After she pretty much stripped the color out; I ended up losing almost 60% of my hair, maybe more because at the worst I was starting to look like an orangutan.  It's now starting to grow back healthy.  All I wanted was her to remove the black undertone, cut and color.  WHAT A NIGHTMARE!!!   Stay away if you value your hair.

name: Crystal Haynie
text: Very disappointed I was not told ahead of time that my stylist only accepted cash payments, and no receipt was given. I didn't realize the damage that was done to my hair till after i left my ends were absolutely fried. I have to cut 4 inches of my hair because it is breaking off and almost feels like burnt plastic strings. It cost $230  I hate to say I will not come back.

name: KS
text: The staff is very nice and professional. Mandy is awesome at what she does my hair looks amazing! I live in FL but will definitely use Hair N Motion when Im visiting

name: Brianna Carr
text: AMAZING experience with stylist Mandy! She works magic and I’m very happy to say I’ll definitely be coming back again!

name: Charles Davis
text: Great salon with a wonderful staff. I absolutely love Mrs. Kelli and her staff. They are all so friendly and helpful. And for you ladies, there's a nice little boutique inside.

name: Jessica zeller
text: Anna was great. She did a great job on my hair. She was nice to chat with, very personable! I've had the same stylist for years but it's no longer possible to go to her. Anna seems to be a good fit for my hair!

text: I love this place! The ladies are always so friendly and welcoming, making you feel right at home as soon as you walk in. The lady cutting my hair was amazing and I'm looking forward to my 12 week touch up on my haircut next week! I've gotten more compliments on this new style than ever before and I have my stylist to thank! I gave her an idea of what I was looking for and she delivered wonderfully.

As soon as I walked in the lady at the front desk put me with Carla and she did a sit down with me and went over what I wanted done etc. and then she made me an appt for later that week.  I have been to almost every hairdresser/salon in enterprise and she was the best!  Go to Carla at Hair n Motion.

text: I had a terrible experience first she cut the bottom of my hair totally uneven and then I told her only and inch and she cuts 3 inches she didn't enteract with me at all no conversation at all but where I'm come from you  pay 20+ dollars for a cut and style but no I was left with dirty greaser hair than I came with , I normally go to a place where they cut wash and curl my hair for 30 but I decided to explore different Solons and I was charged $28 for this terrible experience and to top it off  she sprayed water in it so it was a poofy mess I would not recommend spending your money here.

name: Savannah Smith
text: DO NOT GO! WORST CUSTOmEr SErvICe!!!!! Went in today I went in to the salon today after making an appointment.have always put my kids first and haven't had my hair done professionally in years. I came in and was told that they'd be with me in a second. My hair dresser was late and then my name was called and i wasn't introduced. She just walked into the other room.(I wasn't told where to go.) I got to the chair and sat down. She took my purse out of my hands and out of my lap. I guessed she noticed my face when she did that and asked if that was ok. I said it was just never had someone take my purse out from me like that. She asked if I knew what I wanted to do with my hair. I told her I hadn't gone in 5 years and wanted to talk about what would be best health wise to do w my hair w color.she said "you didn't bring a picture? Or anything? Usually when I sit in a stylists chair I already know what I want to do." I said well I thought I could discuss it. I ended up saying blonde highlights. (I probably had an attitude at this point Bc of how she had been toward me.) she hair dried my hair roughly. Then left without saying a word for a couple minutes. Came back and tried ripping off the cape she had on me saying he wasn't doing my hair today. She want use to rude customers... I said she came off very ...she cut me off and said that she was done. I said she was the rude one and went to the receptionist by the door and told them what had happened and one women.(looked like the manager or whatever.) said sometimes ppl don't mesh well but that there were plenty of other salons I could go to. I said "no sorry?" ... I told her and the gossipy women around her that I was going to be writing reviews and I left...... Now I have worked in customer service for multiple years and have never been allowed to treat a customer (rude or difficult) in such a manner. I've never had a problem w any other place I've ever been too. Obviously if u want to be treated like you value don't go there. If u want to be greeted nicely or to have a consultation go somewhere else. Hair in motion has behavior and customer care problems.

text: Laura was great!  Really focused on the areas I told her I was having issues with and gave great tips for things to do going forward. The room was perfect and the professionalism was great!  Will definitely be back!

text: Laura is the best you wont get a better massage.  She knows what she is doing she can tell what is hurting without you telling her and she makes the pain fade away.  I have been seeing Laura for at least 2 years and I have a massage at least once a month more if I get the chance and it helps tremendously. text: Dr. Wheeler is great. I love the rolling tables you lay on before getting adjusted.

name: April Ray
text: Took my son who was 10 years old at the time about 2 years ago because we thought he had shin splints because he played basketball for Helena and he was having a hard time running because his legs were hurting. The doctor put him on a massage table and that was funny to watch because he loved every minute. She was so good with him. She worked the muscles and his back of his thighs and calves because he was a toewalker and his hamstrings were very tight even though we had been massaging them. She used the machine I guess that's like a massager to work them out and he did not have any problems the rest of the season. We were so glad it was not shin splints because that's just something that you'll have problems with in sports forever. I would definitely take him back next time he has any problems.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your kind review!

name: Treva Radford
text: She takes walk ins which is so helpful to me and there's never a long wait. She gets me and my daughter whipped back in shape and sends us on our merry way. And she doesn't brake the bank account.

text: This chiropractic has been a major help in my life. I have gone since I was very young and I have seen many benefits. I have not been sick since I was in the fifth grade and I have not had a headache or sinus problems in at least ten years. I am 19 years old now and I contribute my great health to the Dr. Denise Wheeler's chiropractic. She is very friendly and spends time with the patients and knows them by name. I would highly recommend this chiropractic.

text: Dr. Kay has been my chiropractor for 18 years. He and his staff — who are all capable, courteous, and reliable folks — have played a crucial role in my well-being since childhood. The adjustments and therapies I have received over the years have significantly ameliorated these problems, and they have had an immense impact on my health and quality of life overall. I strongly recommend Kay Chiropractic.

name: Tommy Fluker
text:
A Touch By An Angel Therapeutic Wellness has been a part of our family's wellness program for years. Though we can all use a massage on a more regular basis, we make sure to take full advantage of Tiffany's services when we make the time for ourselves. Her space is so welcoming and comfortable. I love the capsule-type feel of her room. As I am typing this, I am looking at my calendar to see when to make my next appointment...

As a wellness artist and Thai yoga practitioner, I would like to call Tiffany a Practitioner's practitioner. I and my wife have had wonderful experiences 100% of each visit, as she is a massage therapist as well.

My Deep Tissue Massage session was able to knock out a year's worth of tension in a 90-minute session, and for that, I am so grateful. The temperature was perfect, the sounds were very soothing, and her communications on the amounts of pressure were very timely.

I highly recommend A Touch By An Angel Therapeutic Wellness to anyone looking for an attentive, mindful, and intuitive therapist with experience in several areas of massage. I am looking forward to my return!

resp.text: Thank you very much Brother, I look forward to sharing space with you all again soon, as it is wonderfully rewarding for me as well to exchange energy with such Powerfully Artistic Healer! Namaste 🙏🏾

name: DeAquanita Lee
text:
I had a full Swedish massage and energy work done yesterday and let me just tell you in one word about my experience....."Amazing"!!!! I have not felt like myself in a very long time and could never put my finger on why and I immediately connected to Tiffany and she felt my anxiety and unrest as well. She worked my body and spirit so well that when it was over everything was so clear to me at that point that I was a bit dizzy.

I have always been a bit skeptical about Reiki but we are always skeptical of that which we don't understand and what better way to gain understanding than to put it into motion by trying it. I was pleased, comfortable and I can't wait to try it again! To Tiffany you are truly a LIGHT and I look forward to seeing you soon! Thanks again!!!

name: Quincy Woods
text: My wife got a three package Groupon for this place. Before I start, I would like to mention that my wife is a board certified pharmacist practicing in AL (license number 17856) Chandni Patel Woods- can verify on the Alabama board of pharmacy website. I am a nurse at Grandview medical. This is just to let you know we are professionals and not just some stupid people complaining. We both tip very well--usually over 20% at most places. At her first appt, she showed up to no one being there. So she called the number on her email confirmation and the lady didn't answer. She then called her back 15 more minutes later and told her how she had been trying to find her number "everywhere" and couldn't to tell her that she had car troubles and couldn't make it. My wife is way nicer than me so she was like sure no problem. She rescheduled. At her second appt Tiffany asked her if she could answer a NON EMERGENCY phone call and left my wife on the table naked for ten more minutes. The place is sketchy as hell and so you shouldn't be surprised at all that her table didn't have a table warmer and my wife is cold natured. My wife still wanted to tip her after the service and I told her no absolutely not. You could tell she was mad about it---which is why I'm guessing my wife just received an email stating that her next appt (since she purchased 3) was also cancelled but gave no reasoning. It doesn't matter anyways bc we're getting a refund from Groupon for it and I'm making sure I leave a bad review for her wherever I can. Most unprofessional inconsiderate service ever. I surprise my wife with spa days at nice salon/spa places so I don't know why she went and tried to find a cheaper Groupon for massages. I assure you we will be paying full price at a REAL place from now on. And just FYI--usually tip $20 or more per session.

resp.text: Thank you for the review. We truly appreciate it. For your inconvenience we’d like to offer you a free 60 min session to make up for your Bad experience with us, as well as 15$ off you next session at A Touch By An Angel, in hope that you’d give us another chance. Thank you for your business and your feedback! Peace and blessings!

text: We’ve been enjoying Dr. Aplin’s chiropractic care for over 20 years. The staff greets us and cares for us efficiently with smiling faces and sincere loving hearts. name: JoAnn Gill
text: Doctor Aplin is a great chiropractor. I don't know how he does it, but he knows how to adjust you by your stance. His adjustments are fast and accurate. I constantly ask him questions concerning health problems and his suggestions are very helpful.

resp.text: We're so happy you're so happy with InVision Chiropractic!! Thank you so much for sharing your experience, JoAnn!

name: Ken Priest
text:
I have been attended by several chiropractic services in this area and across the country. I find that the majority of chiropractors tend to stick with the methods taught by the particular schools they attended. This is not what I look for in a chiropractor or chiropractic services.
I look for forward thinking doctors who have expanded on and are not limited to what they were initially taught. In particular, I look for one who works with kinesiology,  one who is particularly focused on the relationship between the muscles not only with the bones, but with each other and the energy relationship with other factors in our bodies and in our minds and surroundings.
I find Dr. Richard Aplin to be an open minded doctor and practitioner who can learn and grow and think outside the box in order to visualize what is happening within our bodies and respond with corrective/directive measures.
I find him to be the most effective chiropractor for my needs in this geographic area.

resp.text: Thanks for your thorough review, Ken - we really appreciate it!!

name: Larry Masters
text: Dr. Aplin and his entire staff at InVision are all highly professional, knowledgeable, friendly and helpful. The results you receive are life changing.  It's amazing to see what a GOOD chiropractor can do for your well being. Problems I never considered could be delt with by chiropractic care vanished. My wife and I both love InVision.

resp.text: Larry - you are so kind. Providing life-changing results is truly why we are in business - we're so glad you have experienced our passion! Thank you for sharing.

text:
I was partially paralyze when I was 24, and have utilized many healing and body work modalities for the past 40 years to not only recover, but stay healthy and mostly pain free.
Of all the chiropractors I've worked with, Invision Chiropractic and the neurological chiropractics model they follow, has been BY FAR, the most effective approach I have been involved with....  I have broken through a 20 year "plateau" and am experiencing a new level of sustained healing and subsequent ease with less pain in my body.  Im so glad I found them!

name: Lorren Bailey
text:
This is a long review but worth the read.

Dr. Aplin is an amazing doctor! He takes chiropractor care to levels no one has ever heard of in this town. Let's be real for a moment, almost every who's had pain at some point in their life has gone to a chiropractor for help. The standard way of thinking is that if you could just get that elbow to pop back or to have a hip or shoulder reset then all your pain would go away. But it never works, you might find some mild relief but it's usually short lived by a couple of hours to maybe days and then you wake up and say, you slept wrong and it's out again.

Well the team at Invision chiropractic care will teach you how to do address the underlying problems so you can fix it yourself in the long run. Yes you will get adjusted, yes it will probably hurt (Dr. Aplin has a different approach to adjusting that I've ever seen) but I'm a walking, breathing, significantly less pain and overall stress less person than when I walked into his office 4 months ago.

I'll be honest, I have a long history of surgeries to pains and only walked in to this office cause I didn't want to have another surgery and my dear friend suggested Dr. Aplin. I went when I truly didn't believe he was helping. I went when the pain spread to a neighboring body part. I went even though my TOC doc said I needed surgery to fix my problem. 4 months and I never missed an appointment. I can say today that I don't need surgery, my pain is gone and the results of becoming less stressed and worry free was worth more to me than the pain getting better.

BrainTap. Google it. Dr. Aplin introduced me to it and has changed my life because of it. I feel like I have the answer to a life long question that I know so many of us ask "How do I feel better?" yes that's generic but let's be honest, everyone is stressing about something these days. But after 4 months of using the BrainTap and doing my homework from Dr. Aplin, I do feel better, lighter able to take on what the world throws at me. It just works!!

resp.text: Lorren - you're a ROCKSTAR! Thanks for being a great patient and showing what you can achieve through commitment and prioritizing your health. We're thankful for you!

name: Levi Harper
text: I have thoroughly enjoyed coming here. Dr. Aplin is very straightforward with what his intentions are and why he feels they are necessary. Any time I have had a "catch" or aching area he is able to relieve it and suggest preventive measures for it not to happen again. Also the staff is great and seem to genuinely care about the patients. I am done with treatments and I get phone calls asking (not pressing) if I would like to come in but also just to see how I am doing. Would recommend if you are looking for a Chiropractor.

text: Lisa is great! Went for the first time last year just for a relaxation massage. Fast forward a year later and I have somehow hurt my lower back. I’ve been in quite a lot of pain. name: Laurie Goode
text: Relax -therapeutic massage lives up to its name! A massage every two weeks has greatly reduced the stress & tension in my shoulders and neck. Faithful client for 4 years now! I was not one to take time for myself but with chronic pain I was convinced by my husband and a client of Relax to give massage a try. Now I can not live without them. I have learned that this is a way to take better care of myself. I highly recommend Relax and that you book your first appointment. I am so thankful I did! -Laurie

name: Cathy Carver
text: I have been using Relax for years.  Lisa has given me massages off and on and specifically through both of my pregnancies and it helped tremendously.  She runs an honest business and works hard.  I am a physical therapist and I know her techniques are skilled.  She gets to know your body and how you respond and gives the massage accordingly.  She wants to know what is too hard or not hard enough.  I think her prices are reasonable.  The facility is simple which is what I like.  If you want a Spa experience, you can pay for that somewhere else.  I just like a good massage and then go about my business.  The staff is nice and kind and they seem like family to each other.  If I have to leave a message she always calls back as soon as she can and has reasonable options for appointments.  I highly recommend Relax!

name: Amanda H Johnigan
text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this place and the people for 10 years now.  I buy their massage packages which are reasonably priced.  The staff is always so nice and friendly on the phone and they know me by name.  I have referred several friends to them and would recommend anyone to try them out.  It's NOT a chain and that is what I love about RELAX.  Lisa, the owner, is my therapist and has been for years.  If Lisa is on vacation, which is rare, I would not and do not hesitate to use any of the other therapists who are equally qualified.  You won't be disappointed.

Many people suffer with chronic pain due to dystonia, but regular massage has kept my pain under control without the need for pharmaceutical pain relievers. I am extremely thankful to have found Relax Therapeutic Massage.

text: Very professional staff and clean atmosphere . If you have pain they know how to take it away. Very reasonably priced. I highly recommend this place. The owner is wonderful she personally assisted me on father's day.

text: This has been an awful experience.  We booked a couples massage at a designated time. We received a call 20 minutes before our booked appointment that they needed to reschedule for the next hour. We agreed. Once we arrived we were told that they were too busy. There was only one other customer in the building. They sent us to another massage location. The second location they sent us to was located by other businesses with bars covering all of the windows and doors.  We chose to not enter this establishment based upon the location. The individuals running this business do not have any positive customer service.

name: Jon Florschutz
text: Too large of a language barrier. If you have prior conditions (athletic injuries, strains, etc) they will not understand you and your recovery may be delayed or injury worsened. The lady giving the massage was also pretty demanding of a tip. She at least understands how to say that.

name: brett garrick
text: This was my first experience getting a massage and I could not be more pleased. Professional comfortable polite and serene. I'll be returning.

name: Sherry Andress
text: This establishment was very unprofessional. I bought a package for a combo massage, hot stones, lavender facial wrap & detox tea, through Groupon. When I arrived, they did not take any medical information from me such as injuries, allergies, etc... The woman who gave me my massage did not speak English much. I noticed the bed only had a folded up sheet for me to cover myself with & there was only oil in the room. About 30 mins in, she was still on my back & not in a professional manner, it hurt. I asked her about the hot stones & she kept saying you have 1 hour. I mentioned the stones again & she left the room (with the door open) came back & rubbed the hot stones up & down my back 3 times. She asked me to turn over, then she began on my right foot. When there was 15 minutes  left & I asked her about the lavender eye wrap & if she will be getting to my hands because I have arthritis. She left the room again (with the door open) & brought in a man that spoke English. They spoke in their language & he took a bean bag looking eye mask & put it over my eyes & left the room. No lavender scent what so ever. She started on my left foot very rapidly & painfully to say the least, twisting & snapping on my toes. This morning when I woke up, I couldn’t put pressure on my left foot & it is still sore to walk. Not to mention my neck & shoulders are still hurting, in which that’s why I wanted to get the massage & my back is worse now. Worst experience ever!

name: Kasey Parker
text: Absolutely Awesome! Today was my first time. Definitely gonna be back.

name: tony chaney
text: Had a great massage today. The ladies were really professional. I will be returning!!

name: Summer King
text:
[Disclosure: I am a Massage Therapist myself, so my expectations are higher than most.]
I found the clinic / spa to be calming and inviting. The individual room of the therapist (Valerii) that I saw was peaceful. The table was quite comfortable! Unbelievably soft.
The massage was targeted to an area of my neck with strained muscles and she knew exactly how to work that area to bring some relief. Great mix of both therapeutic and relaxing touch.
I appreciated her use of heat during the session, as it really penetrated into the muscle bringing almost immediate relief. The hot towel traction at the end was so needed! Thank you!

Her technique is so good that I'm fairly certain I will cancel my membership elsewhere to see Valerii on a more regular basis going forward. I really liked that this wasn't a corporate operation, or nationwide chain. These are individual therapists who are all working very hard to bring exceptional service to their clients. And sometimes you don't always get that personal feeling at a chain.

resp.text: Summer, thank you so much for your kind review. I have started the memberships, so I hope to see you soon!

name: Katie Adams
text: Valerii is very knowledgeable and helpful! You can tell she really cares about her patients becoming pain free!

name: Trever Stearns
text:
Words can not explain how much care and attention she puts into your pain. A very wonderful experience.  As my son would say.
She is awesome!

name: Stacey Smith
text: Very amazing session 👌

I'm a Massage Therapist and was in search of a really caring, knowledgeable Massage Therapist for my Neck, Back & Shoulder pain, needless to say, I've found my Massage Therapist in Valerii De Loach😊🤗😉 Thank you so much Valerii!

name: Amber Hooks
text: I found Christina's Place online and was nervous because of the affordable price. I have had a ton of massages in my life and this was BY FAR one of the best I've experienced. I had a huge knot on my shoulder and was crying this morning because I could barely move my neck. I called at 11am and she was able to fit me in at 6pm. She asked me about my body and asked if there were any places she should concentrate on. She was AMAZING! I live 2 hours away (am in town the weekend) and am considering making a standing monthly appointment! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!

resp.text: Thank you very much Ma'am. I am so happy I can help----welcome back-----

name: Kary Nation
text: We heard Christina’s advertisement on the radio, and my husband and I decided to give her a try.  I have had many massages in my lifetime, but I can honestly say that the people at her establishment give the best massage I have ever had.  My husband agrees and he is more picky than me!  We enjoy the homey atmosphere, the relaxing music, and, personally, I love having my feet massaged while I relax in a plush recliner (part of the Tai Foot Massage).  If you are looking for a great massage at a very good price, look no further.

resp.text: Thank you very much. You make our day. We love to serve you ----

text: Very clean, relaxing and the table massage is Wonderful!  Valencia is the therapist I have used several times she is very thorough and professional.  If you need to get rid of some stress this is the place for you.

name: Christine Tate
text:
I found Heaven!
I now know what it is like to have a massage! And decided to treat myself to one twice a month.  I found Heaven! She also does swedish, deep tissue, shiatsu, foot and chair. Those are muscle massages. She's very knowledgeable, and will explain what she's doing and why it helps, and she's good about not pushing too hard on deep tissue. She said massage shouldn't be painful.

Try her out!

name: Savannah Hogan
text: So this might be a little long winded but I have to tell you about my experience here!  My daughter was the first of us to use Dr. Mann.  She came in for really bad neck pain and headaches.  Dr. Mann said it was related to what is now being called 'text neck.' In two weeks of treatment she was completely better! Not only that it's been months now and she feels great- and still playing on that phone! The second patient was my son.  We were told he needed tubes in his ears because he had chronic ear infections for months.  It broke my heart thinking about that so I was chatting with Dr. Mann on one of my daughters visits and he told Chiropractic can be successful in treating that without tubes. So we gave it a try (child adjustments are different and very gentle if you didn't know) and low and behold after months of ear infections they were COMPLETELY gone.  We were thrilled- not to mention we saved hundreds avoiding surgery.  The next patient was me!  I do pure Barre and I was having trouble with my low back and knee.  It turns out that I had mobility issues.  Couple weeks of work and my workout is now a breeze. And finally my husband.  He's had back issues before but not quite like this recent one.  He works at a computer all day.  This time the sciatica was going all the way to his foot.  He is currently finishing up his rehabilitation with Dr. Mann and is already pain free!  I am so glad we came here first! No pain, no drugs, we feel great, and at a fraction of the price of surgery. Make this your first stop!!!

resp.text: Mrs. Hogan we are so happy to have met you and your family.  Thank you for taking the time to leave this review!  We look forward to seeing you all again soon! Have a great day and have a great year!!!

name: mark mcalister
text:
I would stay away extremely overpriced. It was $235 for a new patient set up every visit after would be $99. The exam was minimal, no new x-rays and didn't even look at my old ones before slapping me with the bill. For chiropractic care this is egregious.
After this visit i went to another practice new patient was $30 which included x-rays and a much more thorough examination.

resp.text: Good Morning! $18 is our average patient copay!  If you have questions on what your price would be please call us at 2563518500 so we can give you correct quotes.  Also, our exam guidelines follow both that of the Journal of the American Medical Association and the Journal of Chiropractic Medicine ensuring we deliver complete and thorough examinations every time! X-rays should only be taken on an as needed basis. If a chiropractor is taking x-rays on all patients without medical necessity we urge you to report this to the State Board of Chiropractic as this is either based on greed or severely outdated research and considered below the current standard of care. In all honesty, we believe this to be a fake review left by a competing Decatur chiropractor as the information in your comment is misleading and inaccurate.

My other doctor just wanted me to take pills and then an orthopedic surgeon said I need an operation.  I didn't want any of that so I went here. The staff is very nice and the Dr. Mann is very professional.  He said even though I was in severe pain that he could still help me. Sure enough here I am now doing everything I need to without any pain. It has been 2 weeks since I have been.  I am   Thankful and grateful. Definitely recommend this office.
