text: Incredibly appreciative for all the help I received here.  I didn't make it here until after a month of muscle relaxers and an MRI.  I was scheduled for an appointment with my orthopedic doctor but my appointment was 6 weeks away.  I was really just looking for something to hold me over.  I took my report to Dr. Mann and I was told not only could help me he believed he could keep me from having any surgery and possibly no more meds.  I had my doubts, especially after he told me I had a disc in my lower back that was bulging.  To my delight, I began sleeping better each day.  After 2 weeks work wasn't so bad.  After 1 month I felt so much better I cancelled my orthopedic visit.  I don't know why the chiropractor isn't everyone's first recommendation when something hurts.

resp.text: We are so glad we could help you Mrs. Bradley!  We hope you are well and look forward to seeing you and your family in the future!!!

I sat for less than 5 minutes waiting the whole visit. Sat for about 30 at my MD.  I used Dr. Mann here.  He went over what was going on.  I recieved treatment that day. text: Dr. Mann and the staff are amazing! The best chiropractor I have been to. Dr. Mann worked with me for a couple of weeks and now I feel much better! I would highly recommend them to anyone. Also Kelsey and Heath are the best! Everyone is always in a great mood! I love it!

name: Jennifer Landry
text: Dr. Mann is a great chiropractor.  It looks like it's been said her a 100 times but I wanted to say why my treatments here allow me to say how much I mean that and miss being in Alabama!  I spend most of the year in Atlanta now because of work.  I have tried and tried to find a chiropractor here that was as good as Dr. Mann but I haven't been successful.  I called Dr. Mann before one of my appointments in Atlanta and asked if he would mind talking to my chiropractor (bless him for doing that) Even after an in depth conversation about the type of treatments I was receiving with Dr. Mann in Decatur I still wasn't getting the same level of relief from my Atlanta chiropractor that I was receiving at Advanced Chiropractic.  My neck is just not the same when I go to other places.  I only get to be adjusted a few times a year by Dr. Mann now because of the move and it's one of the worst things about not being home.  But every time  I am in town seeing Dr. Mann is on the list!  Another thing I always appreciated about Dr. Mann's office is there is always a plan.  He doesn't just say 'see ya' at the end of your appointment.  If I am working on an injury I always know when I need to be seen again.  If I am on wellness I know I need to be back monthly.  Other places I have been don't give any direction and it just seems less professional.  Be thankful for what you have here!!! He's the best! Thanks again Dr. Mann!

resp.text: Thank you so much Jennifer for leaving us a review! We always asked to be updated by your family when they come in for treatment about what you and yours are up to these days!  It sounds like the husband and kids are  adjusting to the move pretty well! We miss seeing you guys every month now that you've moved to Atlanta!  And yes anytime you are home give us a call and we will work your whole gang in.  Hope to see you soon!!!

name: nathanael west
text: This is a great place to get adjusted! They are friendly and make you feel welcome! I started going a couple months ago and I feel great! I suggest you give them a call!

resp.text: Thank you so much Mr. West for taking the time to leave a review!  We are thrilled to hear that you had such a positive experience with Advanced Chiropractic!  We look forward to seeing you in the future.  Have a great day!!!

name: Miles Blackwell
text: This is the chiropractor you've been looking for.  I'm a fan of all things wellness and am a believer that the chiropractor can save you from surgery. I am also very picky about the places I go for treatment and advice. I had just relocated to the area for work.  My supervisor had also just moved here and said I should give this place a try.  I called ahead and asked about the services provided and some questions about my new insurance.  I had my appointment that evening.  The office is more modern looking than some of the other places in town (past experience has taught me sometimes old building means outdated doctor). The staff and doctors are all nice people and I can without a doubt say that was the best treatment I have ever been given.  My last chiropractor was a good friend and great person but was a smaller build. Just guessing but I think that really was the difference in treatments and let me tell you it was significant. I come in about once a month and it keeps me doing everything I like (and some of the chores that I don't).

resp.text: Thanks for the review Miles!  We work hard to make sure we maintain a professional environment and stay up to date on the latest research on wellness and rehab treatments.  Thank you again for taking the time to leave us a review!!! See you soon!

name: Tiffany Nichole
text: I haven't felt this good in a long time! No more pain! No more headaches! Going to work isn't so painful anymore. I'm getting much better sleep at night. I can do just about anything I want to now. I'm not afraid to tackle a garden or the laundry! I'm so glad I gave this place a try. In the very first visit I could see the difference. After a few weeks I felt like a new person. I originally only came here because I had just moved to Decatur and driving to my old chiropractor was getting to be a hassle. On my first visit Dr. Mann discussed new treatment methods that he had seen some success with and I decided to give the rehab a try before just going to my regular Wellness treatments. Like I said in just a couple weeks I could see the changes. I used 2 feel tingling from my back almost weekly. I now haven't felt it in weeks. I used to have to avoid certain Hobbies that I enjoyed because I was afraid my back would go out. Thanks to Doctor Mann I now have no fear of my back going out on me. That in itself is huge for me! And yes this office is super convenient! Right on the Beltline across from publix!!!

resp.text: Thanks Tiffany! We are glad we were able to help you!

name: Keisha Talley
text: My son and I come here for chiropractic treatment.  The front desk is always stellar and I have great trust in Dr. Mann. We always come her first for any pains or injuries we might have.

resp.text: Thanks Keisha for leaving us a review!

name: Rachael Gardner
text: Wonderful and nice people and they helped my back significantly

resp.text: Thank you so much Rachael for taking the time to  leaving us a review.  We are so happy to hear that you were pleased with your results at Advanced Chiropractic!  See you next time!

name: Jamie Reynolds
text: Just finished my visit and I am very impressed. Office was very easy to find. It’s on the Beltline in Decatur. No long wait, very nice staff. My appointment with the doctor went well. Dr. Mann is very friendly and approachable. He answered all my questions and we were able to start my treatment today.  Looking forward to coming back tomorrow when he says we will go over my x-rays together.  My copay was only $20 with my insurance. Already feel a little better! Looking forward to getting a good night of sleep!

resp.text: So glad you had a good experience! Thank you Jamie for leaving us a review and thank you for choosing Advanced Chiropractic!

name: Blaine Roberts
text: I love going to Advanced Chiropractic the staff is extremely nice and very helpful. They are also quite knowledgeable about the products they offer. The atmosphere is very enjoyable and the massage therapist is excellent as well. One of the best chiropractic offices I’ve ever been too.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! We hope to see you soon Mr. Roberts! Have a great day!

name: Danny McGee
text:
I originally came here because of the office hours. I don't get off till 4:30.
My old chiropractors office wanted me there by 4:45 to be seen. Advanced Chiropractic is open till 6:00.
I must say I have been very pleased with the switch. I highly recommend Dr. Mann! When I first came here I was contemplating another back surgery. Dr Mann ,through adjustments and suggestions on exercises, has improved my quality of life.  My job can be physically demanding at times. Dr Mann keeps me going! I have never had a problem getting an appointment when I have had a bad day. His office staff are friendly and helpful. The massage therapist is great to.

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving us a review! It had been a pleasure having you join our office.

name: Jonathan Franks
text: I was pretty happy with my chiropractor back home so finding a new place was not the most exciting thing for me.  I had been using the same chiropractor that my parents introduced me to when I was was young so I wanted to find the right doctor for me and my family.  I moved to Alabama as part of the construction happening in Madison right now and will be here for at least a year.  I found this place on google and called to schedule a consultation.  The office was nice. Front desk was helpful. Dr. Mann was very  professional and gave me the same level of treatment I was used to getting in back in Tennessee.  He also had some new ideas that were actually very helpful at work.  The machinery I sometimes use put me in bad positions and could flare me up for days. I’m a golfer too and he is going to try and get me back on the course.  My swing has been causing some radiating back pain in to my leg.  This place also works out with my schedule. I don’t get off of work until 5 sometimes but can still make it to the office since they are opening until 6. I’ll Be trying the massage therapist soon too.

resp.text: We are happy you found Advanced Chiropractic too Mr. Franks!  We understand that seeing a doctor for the first time can be a little nerve-racking.  We do our best to ensure a thorough and pleasant first visit while answering any questions you may have to help put your mind at ease.  We see a lot of construction workers- both supervisors and laborers.  We keep the office open a little later just so you all commuting back in to town can be seen.  Better hurry with the massage our yearly Christmas Special ends today! See you soon!

name: CT Accounting
text:
Started here for my back issues.  I really thought I got it from my dad but Dr. Mann said a lot of it has to do with lifestyle as well.  I had great results here.  Instant relief, followed by weeks of improvement.  Visits never took that long- barely sat in the waiting room before me treatment begins and I was moved to the next parts of my treatment were with little to no wait.  At the end I did have a few question but Dr. Mann stayed with me to answer my questions.  Nothing beats being able to sleep, wake up, go through a demanding day, and still feel great every day.  I will most definitely keep using Dr. Mann and his clinic on a regular basis.

Update 12/23/19-  It has been months since I have had even the slightest pain! I am back to exercising 3 days a week and doing pretty much anything I want, pain free.  I honestly have had days that I forgot that I was ever in pain all the time.  My son's basketball season started up which means lots of driving and uncomfortable locations I must linger in for hours, multiple nights a week.  With the instructions Dr. Mann gave me my back has held up and I have not missed a second of a single game.  They were able to work me in this morning for an adjustment before I hit the road for the holidays.  Dr. Mann even came out to my car to help me setup me seat cushion to keep my back from acting up on the long drive we have to my wife's family gathering in North Carolina.  I cannot say enough about how happy I am that I found Dr. Mann's office.   Until next time! Thanks again you guys! Have a Merry Christmas!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving the review!  We are so glad you have had such great results!  Chiropractic is great for many things!  We believe in keeping the body pain free and healthy so you can keep doing the things you love to do!  If we wait until pain arises then new damage has occurred and some parts of the body just don't grow back like the original pieces!  We are trying to change the narrative of health care by not only fixing the problem but preventing it from coming back as well. See you next time at Advanced Chiropractic!

name: Hannah Criscoe
text: I feel so good, me and Kate never felt better

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review!

name: Daniel Jones
text: Yesterday I woke up and my back had reached a point that I just couldn’t handle anymore. I had been trying to work through it for weeks.  I work second shift so at 11 I began going down the list of chiropractors in Decatur.  I found out that a lot places were closed by lunch and some were taking more time off for the holidays.  When I called advanced chiropractic Dr. Mann said he would keep the office open for me. I arrived after 12 and noticed that the office actually closed at 12.  He still took me in, did my exam and took my xrays himself.  I’m a plant supervisor and I would not have survived the night without Dr. Mann’s help.  I look forward to next week and getting more relief. Thanks again doc

resp.text: Mr. Jones we are glad we were able to help you.  Our proudest moments are getting people back to living life- both work and play!  We look forward to seeing you again! Thank you for leaving us a review and have a good day!

name: Rhett Maples
text: This was my first time seeing a chiropractor. I’ve had back pain for months that would come and go but this time it was worse.  The aching and nerve pain were keeping me awake at night and bothering me throughout the day.  My doctor told me it was time to see a surgeon.  I asked around and was recommended Dr. Mann by multiple friends.  I decided to go in for a consultation.  After talking Dr. Mann said he felt he could keep me from having surgery. And he was right. After 2-3 weeks I started noticing the pain was decreasing. By the end of my rehab I was getting uninterrupted sleep and getting through the work week with no issues.  I feel confident in my back again. I saved thousands by avoiding surgery and didn’t have to worry about the risks of surgery.

resp.text: Thank you for the review! Glad we could help you!

name: Sydney Noel
text: I’m very health conscious so I needed to find someone who could conveniently meet all my needs. Chiropractor, massage, health questions things like that. I found this place about 2 years ago and I am thankful I did. Through headaches, back pain, and pregnancy Dr. Mann has helped me even more than I could have imagined. The office is also very easy to get to. My last visit was just for a wellness adjustment and some diet advice.  Dr. Mann always takes time to answer any questions which is really hard to find these days.  I recommend everyone see a chiropractor and use this place if you’re looking for the best office to meet all your health needs!!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review Sydney! We are proud to offer a variety of services and products to our patients. Our goal is to be the one place you need for all of your wellness and rehab needs. Thank you using us for so many years. Happy Holidays!

name: Kristina Warren
text: Recently moved to the area and was looking for a new chiropractor. I made the HUGE mistake of visiting Dr. Mann. Very unprofessional. Sort of “know it all”. He would not listen to any of my problems he just kept talking. Other than that I received my adjustment which was fine but then he wanted me to come back 3 times a week! I have a life. I don’t have time for that. The staff was very kind and attentive. Maybe I’ll just try a massage next time.

resp.text: We have no record of a 'Kristina Warren' ever being in this office.  This false review has been reported to the local authorities and Alabama Chiropractic Board.

name: Donald Priest
text: I use Advanced Chiropractic for my low back pain problems.  I see Dr. Mann regularly and he keeps me going.  I try to go once a month so I can keep working.  It has been several years since I have had any issues.  The entire staff is very friendly and I have sent him several of my friends and family for their health needs.  My wife uses their massage therapist regularly and is very pleased with her visits their too.  They have great hours and are very flexible.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review!  We are so glad you have had such great improvements over the years.  Dr. Mann enjoys seeing families come in!  We appreciate you spreading the word about Advanced Chiropractic! Have a great day!

name: Eric Flannigan
text: Highly reccomend for low back treatment.  Had lots of trouble with mine in the past. Dr. Mann was recommended to me by my boss.  They take blue cross blue shield so it was very convenient. Nice office and helpful staff. I also appreciate that Dr. Mann will answer any questions I ask. All around a great office that really sets the standard for Decatur.

resp.text: Thanks Mr. Flannigan for taking the time to review us! So glad we could help you!

name: Whitney Brown
text: My experience here has been nothing short of amazing. When i called to schedule my appointment, the receptionist was more than willing to get me in around my work schedule. When i first walked into the office, everyone was so friendly and welcoming. I cant say enough about Dr. Mann. He listened to everything i felt that i needed to tell him. He took his time explaining to me what he was doing and why. He recommended exercises to do between visits to help strengthen me back up. After he adjusted me, I felt so much relief. He eased pain that I have had for months. When I left, I felt like a new person. My only regret was not coming to see Dr. Mann sooner!!

name: State Farm Aspirant
text: Dr. Mann treated me quickly both visits and I only had to go twice before my pain cleared up. He gabe me some quick daily exercises/ movements to do to keep me from having to continue making visits. I feel like My pain was actually healed instead of made to feel better and just Going back again and again for relief. I have regained full mobility with no back/neck pain because of work OR when I get up in the morning. Super nice guy and probably the most helpful doctor I’ve ever been to.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review!

name: avery summerford
text: I just moved here for work from Tennessee.  Somehow during the move I hurt my back so badly that I couldn't move.  I had always had a chiropractor in Nashville but obviously that was no longer a choice.  So I got on my phone and began searching for a local one.  My chiropractor back home told me to find one that was 'up to date' and that it might be hard to find in a smaller city like Decatur.  I found advanced chiropractic and checked the website.  I found that they do a lot more than just heat and adjust their patients.  I called and scheduled an appointment the same day. The office is very modern looking and Dr. Mann may be even more knowledgeable than my last chiropractor.  I'm already feeling much better.  The receptionist is also very good with describing insurance coverage as mine was a mess.  Overall- great office. This will be my last chiropractor!

resp.text: Avery I'm glad you found us and thank you for your kind words!  It has been a pleasure getting to know you!  Yes- we see A LOT of back pain and we try our best to get patients in as soon as possible.  Again- thank you so much for taking the time to spread the word about what we do at Advanced Chiropractic.  We look forward to seeing you on your next visit!

name: Judy Letson
text: Had a very good first experience with chiropractic here. They accept insurance. My treatment for sciatica was a success. I will continue to use Dr. Mann in the future!

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Letson for leaving us a review and thank you for choosing Advanced Chiropractic!

name: Eli Mann
text: This place literally changed my life!! I’ve had HORRIBLE posture from gaming on my laptop and Dr. Mann fixed it! It took some time and effort, but he was there for every step. Such a kind and caring doctor unlike others around!

resp.text: Thanks for the review!

name: Katy Bevin
text: Today was my first visit and it went well.  The receptionist was very friendly and helpful.  The doctor is fantastic.  He took xrays, explained my causes of  pain and told me they would be able to help me.  It was my first adjustment so I think it went well with what I know so far. I'm looking forward to coming back and finishing my rehab. I reccomend this place to anyone with back pain.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review Katy!  We are glad that you enjoyed your experience in the office!  We look forward to seeing you again!

name: Greg Reily
text: I had a catch in my back for months.  Sometimes sharp and achy. Sometimes i would get tingling or numbness down the back of my leg. This place popped up on google with the highest and most ratings so I called and they scheduled me very quickly.  First visit was good. Little bit of paperwork but nothing bad compared to other doctors offices.  Dr. Mann is a nice guy.  Answered my questions and explained what was going on. Began treatment that day. I feel great now. It's been a month since I've felt anything at all. I definitely recommend to anyone looking to avoid pills and surgery in the Decatur area.

resp.text: Glad we could help you Mr. Reily!

name: Christy Burnham
text: The girls up front are amazing and so sweet and very informative.  I started out with a massage the first time and she did an amazing job. I came back to get adjusted and I walked out feeling like a brand new person. He went over different ways to help me!

resp.text: Thank you Christy!

name: Veronica Tiddle
text: I woke up one morning with excruciating pain in my lower back.  It hurt to move at all.  I found Advanced Chiropractic online and they were able to schedule me right away.  After my first visit my pain decreased some. 2 weeks later I was feeling a lot better.  They really go the extra mile here to help you.  Dr. Mann and the staff are kind, friendly, and understanding. I highly recommend this place!

resp.text: So glad we were able to help you!

name: Valerie Jones
text: I could barely walk when I came to Dr. Mann.  I had lifted something heavy, and the urgent care doctor said that I had bulging disc. I was in so much pain! But Dr. Mann was very gentle and kind and in a matter of a few days I was feeling better. It took a few weeks but I was completely pain free. I would highly recommend advance chiropractic to anyone suffering from back pain. The staff are very friendly and helpful. And the whole experience has been a good one.  They make you feel like family!

resp.text: Thank you Mrs. Jones! We are so glad we could get you back on your feet!

name: Linda Lawrimore
text: Having past experience with a chiropractic practice I can honestly say that Advanced Chiropractic Rehab and Wellness is superior in all aspects of their work.  Dr. Brian Mann is a knowledgeable, helpful and friendly chiropractic physician. He is concerned about your well being and teaches you how to help yourself at home during the course of your rehabilitation.  I have made enough progress on my neck (which was in really bad shape) and my back (ongoing history for years) that I am confident I will get to the improved point I need to be.  Relief of pain and discomfort is a blessing and so is Dr. Mann.  His staff is friendly, helpful and at your side at all times during your visit. They are a great asset to the doctor's practice.   I can think of no other place I would want to go for chiropractic treatment when I already have the best!

resp.text: Thank you so much Mrs. Lawrimore!

name: Verizon Wireless
text: Thanks for the help doc! The ergonomics presentation was great! Our necks are already feeling a lot better! We'll see you soon! We highly recommend Dr. Mann to anyone who works on screens all day!

name: Derron Smith
text: I've been coming to Advanced Chiropractic and seeing Doctor Mann now for about 2 years. I figured it was time that I gave him some acknowledgement. Honestly, I started coming here out of convenience.  It was right on my route home. I figured all chiropractors were pretty much the same. However the older doctor that I was seeing across town, turns out was very behind the times. Dr. Mann has updated treatment methods and a streamlined practice. I never really have terrible back pain but I never really knew how good I could feel until I started seeing Dr Mann. My visits are always fast- and I don't mean that they are rushed- just never any wasted time. So if you are deciding what you ahould do about your back or neck or any health needs you might have- you have found the right place.  They'll get you fixed up in no time.

resp.text: Thanks Derron! We appreciate your review!

name: Angie Thom
text: Dr. Mann and his staff are the best around! My back pain has improved dramatically in the short time I've been a patient, and I would highly recommend him to anyone seeking chiropractic care. I am always seen quickly with little to no waiting, and the staff is friendly and efficient.

resp.text: Thank you for the kind review Angie! We always enjoy seeing you!

name: Wendell Atkins
text: I used to see another chiropractor in town. I tried this place because they had massages too. My knees and hands usually always hurt and keeps me from fishin. When I left after one visit I already feel better. It was a great experience.  Will definitely be back

resp.text: It was a pleasure talking to you Mr. Atkins.  One of our goals here at Advanced Chiropractic is to keep everyone doing what they love.  We are happy to hear you gained back your pain free mobility and are able to get back on the water!  Have a good trip this weekend and let us know if we can do anything else for you!  We'll see you next time!

name: Jonathan Yodges
text: I highly recommend this office for neck and back pain. I flew to Alabama for a 4 week work trip.  When I arrived in Decatur I was in terrible pain from the long flight.  Several people at my company had great things to say about Advanced Chiropractic so I came here first.  Dr. Mann was very personable and answered all my questions.  After my exam, I immediately received treatment and was given exercises that I still use to keep my  back loose and strong.  I had great results and will continue to use this office for injuries and wellness whenever I am in this area.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review!

name: Amanda Elkins
text: Came in with neck pain due to 3 bulging disc (going on 8 months) and I’ve finally gotten relief by coming to see Dr. Mann for the past 3 weeks! I have tried physical therapy and medications and they didn’t do much for me. So glad my neurosurgeon recommended seeing a chiropractor! Best decision ever! You can’t beat Dr. Mann or his staff!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us a review Amanda!

name: Jerry Brown
text: Great front desk, very friendly. Like the atmosphere. I come to keep my back healthy and strong. Been coming for going on 2 years. I’ve also had my shoulders and wrists worked on. My sister comes here too!

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Brown for leaving us a review! We always enjoy seeing you and your sister at the office.  We will see the both of you soon!

name: Jessica Carlson
text: Look no further! you have found the best chiropractor in Decatur!  I have been seeing Dr. Mann for treatment for almost 2 years now. In the beginning, I came for my back pain. He sits at a desk all day and some days he had to come straight home and lay down. But now after his treatment he feels fantastic! Their location is super convenient too! Right on the beltline!!!

resp.text: Thank you so much Jessica for taking the time to review us!  We can’t believe it has been 2 years since we first met you.  It’s always a pleasure to see you and your family!  We look forward to your next visit! Thank you again to you and your family for making Advanced Chiropractic Rehab and Wellness your family chiropractor!!!

name: Chris Humphries
text: My wife and I use Dr. Mann and he has been wonderful! We always feel better leaving his office than when we walked in. The next day is even better! I would highly recommend him. We always have a professional experience and he knows what he is doing.

resp.text: Thanks Chris! We always enjoy seeing you and your family. Congrats on your success in priceville! We look forward to seeing you again! Tell everyone we said hello!

name: Township Mom
text: Dr Mann and his staff are completely amazing .. Great atomoshere! Dr Mann is knowledgeable and always available for any questions you have and cares about you're treatment. I'd recommend him to anyone who needs pain relief! I was in pain everyday for years! And now, I'm completely pain free!

resp.text: So glad we got you moving again!

name: Cj Mooney
text: I’m a construction worker and also travel a lot for work. Between work and driving I have lots of back and shoulder pain. I come here to keep me going. The front desk is friendly and fun. Give them a call today they’ll take care of you!

resp.text: CJ nothing makes me happier than keeping a hard working man going.  Not to mention you have some of the best stories from being on the road.  We are happy to have you as part of our Advanced Chiropractic family.  Keep that back straight and safe travels my friend! We'll see you next time!

name: Anthony Fleming
text: I had a wonderful experience with Dr. Mann and his staff. Not only was everyone in the office warm and friendly, but my lower back issue was addressed and resolved and is still feeling better today. I would highly recommend giving Dr. Mann a try if you are undecided on Chiropractors.

resp.text: Thanks Anthony! We appreciate the review!

name: Dwight and Lisa Lang
text: Office staff are friendly and helpful. I feel great after every visit. No more back pain

resp.text: Thanks Mr. Lang! We appreciate you taking the time to give us a review!

name: brittany strickland
text: Dr. Mann is an amazing chiropractor! Some clients leave their doctor feeling worse, but that is never the case with a visit at Dr. Mann's office. The staff is always so friendly which makes the visit welcoming each and every time.

text: Treated my wrist arm and elbow pain. Didn’t have to get medication or surgery. Now I’m taking my grandson to be treated for his chronic ear infections. They are able to get me in and out quick and reasonably affordable. Definitely recommend to everyone.

resp.text: Thank you for the review Ms. Jones!  We are so glad you had such great results with your wrist and elbow!!!  We can't wait until we get your grandson fixed up too!  We look forward to seeing you two! Have a great day!!!

name: Lori Mcalpin
text: I am 100% pain free now.  That's probably the biggest reason I can recommend you for going here. My neck pain was terrible before I came here. Doctor mann is a great chiropractor who is trained in many Specialties as well. He has helped me with nutrition and supplements and also with training my kids for their high school sports. I'm pretty sure he has fixed at least one part of everyone in my family! They have a massage therapist who is also great. No extra charge for deep tissue either! I want a massage from them on Facebook! They also sell essential oils now for those of you who are hunting them! Thanks for taking care of us Dr. Mann!!!

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us this review! We're so happy to have met your family. We look forward to seeing you again! Take care!

name: Lisa Whisenant
text:
I have used Dr. Mann since Dr. Fontes passed away and I really like him. He is always friendly and so is the staff. He will always tell you what he is going to do and when I leave I always feel better. I would recommend everyone to try him out.

Lisa

resp.text: Thank You Ms. Whisenant!

name: sheila gooch
text: I was recommended by my friend Wendell to come here for massage and chiropractic treatment. He said he had great results. I found out my insurance pays for my care 100 percent. resp.text: Mrs. Gooch thank you for taking the time to leave us a google review!  It really helps us get the word out about the success we are having here at Advanced Chiropractic. I fully expect you to see more improvement in all aspects of your life as we see each other at your future appointments.  Don't work too hard! See you soon!!!

name: Audrey Dawn Landry
text: I started using Dr. Mann after he took my previous chiropractor’s place when he passed away.Dr Mann and his staff are wonderful! I highly recommend Dr. Mann for all of your chiropractic needs!

resp.text: Thanks Audrey!

name: Charles Bacon
text: I was hanging sheet rock when my back went out. My pain went from my back to my hip. After my exam and xray I found out I had hurt a disc and had sciatica.  I was treated by Dr Mann and able to work the next day.  I am now completely pain free.

resp.text: Glad we could help!

name: Caleb Whitaker
text: Everyone here was absolutely amazing! I had been having lower back and hip problems for a while when someone recommended Dr. Mann! He worked wonders and I left feeling like a new person! HIGHLY recommended!

name: John Greene
text: My old lady is the one who got me here but I guess I'm glad she did.  Been laid up in the house for some time because too much excitement caused my old joints to flare up on me.  Can't say I was the best patient but after one visit I felt much better.  After about 2 weeks I felt 10 years younger.  Ive started to get out a little bit more and can walk a little each day. Im hoping to get back to a little golf here soon.

resp.text: Mr. Greene it was a pleasure to get you back to doing the things you love!

text: I started seeing Dr Mann after a friend referred me to the clinic.  He took x-rays and showed me what had happened to my back. I had disc damage and arthritis. resp.text: Nichole we love seeing you and the laughter you bring to the office! The whole office starts to smile when you arrive! Spread the word of your success for us!  Thank you again for choosing Advanced Chiropractic for your health and wellness needs!

name: Denise Kelly
text:
Both of my kids love Dr Mann and his staff.
He is very knowledgeable and friendly, he takes the time with you that you need to get on the right track to feeling better! I have nothing but positive things to say about him! Madelyn and Isaac both think he is fantastic!

name: Kris Small
text: Okay, So I've dealt with my back pain for many years I've seen chiropractors for many years and I am a licensed medical provider and I am honestly dismayed by this place, I told the D.C. what exactly was wrong and he ignored me. Attempted to realign a part of my body that didn't need it and when he was done after 6 minutes in the room with me he managed to not fix the issue at all now I'm out over $100.00 and absolutely  no relief for a simple pinched nerve, oh but he did set me up on the "maintenance plan" which is 3 visits a week at $65 per visit that's $780 a month! That's more then my mortgage for what every single other chiropractor has been able to fix and treat in one visit for under $50.00. Please be wise and heed this as a warning. I do not recommend this place for anyone. They may be a legal D.C. but it's as close to a scam ad you can get legally.

resp.text: Kris- you are being dishonest. Health expenses without insurance can be tough, but that is no excuse for your dishonesty in your review. Cameras show your time in the office was approximately 40 minutes; less than 5 minutes in the waiting room- standard for any first visit. Furthermore, we offer the lowest cash prices for new patients in town and also very flexible payment plans.  You were told the prices before you came in. Our cameras even show you were in high spirits until it was time to pay your bill.  And instead of talking to us and working out a payment plan we watched you go into your car and leave this angry review.  Also, what you tried to tell us was ‘wrong’ with you was actually incorrect and probably the main reason you’ve had to deal with your back pain for years instead of actullay being ‘fixed.’ While we have great respect for you and your field, you have to remember- you are not a doctor-  for instance a chiropractor in a car accident should heed the EMT’s instructions because that is what they have been trained to do.  You are also confusing your terminology- maintenance is for wellness patients- and is an optional once a month visit for those who have complete their ‘rehab’ plan to help stay ahead of injuries and reduce wear and tear on the body. Rehab plans are what you were trying to quote. Certain injuries take time to heal and a proper plan for recovery. You are absolutely right Kris- We do things different at Advanced Chiropractic.  We get so many patients who have seen chiropractors that take shortcuts to treat their injuries and the patient continues to deal with pain for years.  Our goal at Advanced Chiropractic is to HEAL the injury. We have found that if we simply make pain go away we are no different than a pain killer or opiate.  However, with our custom made rehabilitation plans you can escape that continued damage, year after year, which is so important as many parts of the body don’t grow back when you repeatedly injure them.

name: Robin Stacy

resp.text: Thanks Mrs. Stacy!  Always good to see you!  I hope you continue having success in your path to wellness!  You are right proper movement is the key to wellness not just going through the motions!  And YES questions are great! They empower the patient! Hope your family is doing well and we will see you next time!

Our office is filled with scents of peppermint, orange, lavender, and thieves (depending on the room).  Looking forward to seeing you again!!!

text: I was in an ugly car accident when I first came to see Dr. Mann.  I felt a little banged up right after the accident and then sore the next day. I saw the doctor quickly and had xrays taken that day. My soreness was from whiplash from my accident.  It took several weeks to get me back to 100 percent but I'm thankful I went here. I would recommend that anyone in a car accident go here ASAP for care you can trust.

resp.text: Thanks Greg for taking the time to leave this review!  Car accidents are a big deal! They wreck (no pun intended!) the body head to toe!  Even if you don't initially have any pain that doesn't mean there isn't any damage.  Being hit by a 1000lb object even at 5 mph does serious damage to the body.

name: Sarah Killian
text: I get really bad headaches. I’ve tried over the counter medicine and it did nothing. Went to a specialist and after several weeks still no significant results. Went to a holistic doctor- still nothing. I had been diagnosed with everything from migraines to fibromyalgia. A friend of mine told me to try her Chiropractor because she had great results for her low back. They take insurance (I didn’t know that at the time) so that was helpful. My first visit I Came in and the front desk was very helpful. I soon met Dr. Mann and after listening to my history he took some x-rays. He examined them and decided it was safe to begin treatment. Said what I actually had was a cervicogenic headache and that he was confident we could reduce the number of headaches I was having.  Within the week my headaches were almost totally gone. After two weeks of no headaches I am now down to just monthly visits to make sure they don’t come back. My only regret is that I didn’t go sooner. Thanks Dr. Mann!

resp.text: Thank you for choosing us for your healthcare needs Ms. Killian!  Headaches can be the biggest pain (no pun intended) .  I'm glad our team here at Advanced Chiropractic was able to get you sleeping and working like normal again.  We enjoy every visit with you!  Good luck with the new job and we'll see you soon!!!

I also keep doing my exercises that I was given to keep going pain free.  Tight shoulders are gone too!  I was skeptical at first because I had never been to a chiropractor before but the pain and even the numbness are completely gone now.  I really appreciate all the help! I'll probably try their massage therapist next! Highly recommend to anyone who tired of being achy and in pain!!!

text: DO NOT LET THIS MAN TOUCH YOU!!!! I've been going to chiropractor for 10 years have always felt much better afterwards. After leaving his office I've been in bed for days from pain. resp.text:
Hi Ashley, we believe you have mistakenly reviewed the wrong office- we have no record of an Ashley Smith ever being treated in our facility. At Advanced Chiropractic, our patients' x-rays are always reviewed with the doctor on the first visit before treatment begins to ensure a safe, quick recovery.  'First do no harm' is a rule we strictly adhere to- as should all doctors. We are so sorry you received a poor standard of care at another clinic. Please give us a call at (256)351-8500 and we will help you recover from the injury you have endured.
Also, when you retrieve the x-rays from the other office you visited we'll review them for no charge- just mention this post..

While waiting on my prescription, I said to myself that theses ladies deserve an online review... So here it is!

name: Jennifer Walthall
text: So grateful for this little drug store. They have filled prescriptions for life-saving meds for our dogs twice now when they were in back order everywhere else. Also they are friendly and quick!

name: Jamie Tash
text: This is BY FAR the BEST wellness provider in Madison County.  Sooo much more than medicine --  They can help you with any medical issue under the sun.  Simply AMAZING staff -- they all have a heart for your best health.

name: Jessica Tollefson
text: Absolutely WONDERFUL service. I would HIGHLY recommend this compounding pharmacy to anyone and everyone in the Huntsville/Madison area who needs compounding services. I recently received a prescription from my dermatologist and it was called in to Madison Drugs to be compounded. The inside of this pharmacy is immaculate! It's extremely clean and it's nicely decorated. The pharmacist that explained my prescription to me was such a doll. I wish I could remember her name (thank you if you're reading this!). About two weeks after I picked up my prescription, I received a very nice courtesy call to ask about my experience and the service I was provided. I had nothing but positive things to say! And if that wasn't enough, I received a 'thank you' postcard in the mail with a coupon should I need a refill on my RX. In my opinion, customer service with that level of professionalism is a rarity these days. I genuinely appreciate the kindness and the extra mile that the pharmacy staff goes through to ensure exceptional service. Thanks so much!!

name: Nicole Suddath
text: They were very helpful!  Great place for natural living advice, gifts, wholistic healing products.

name: Denise White
text: I really like this place...in addition to the pharmacy, they have a great selection of supplements and services.

name: E G
text: After suffering from reflux and shoulder joint pain for months, taking medicines that just made me feel worse, not sleeping well, and having surgery posed as an option for my shoulder, I was at my wits' end.  A friend had told me about Terry and how he had helped her for years.  Well, I am a believer!  No more stomach, throat, or shoulder pain and feel great.  My family has seen the change and are in awe.   Thank you!

name: Scott Seeley
text: Staff and Mr. Wingo are always helpful and of course eager to offer help. Great selection of health and wellness  products.

name: Kim Edmunds
text: Excellent Yoga classes! The Friday 9am is my favorite.

name: Kim Ziehlke
text: Compounding pharmacy, nice atmosphere, attentive customer service

name: Harold Cook
text: Best pharmacy in Huntsville by far

name: Steve Garner
text: Very clean

name: Caitlin Grimes
text: I can’t say enough good things here. I’ve suffered with a bad upper back/neck for years and Dalton is the first person who FINALLY gave me relief. I started going to him a few years ago and it is amazing the progress I’ve made and how he has been able to maintain everything (even with my terrible workplace posture). He is EXTREMELY knowledgeable about anatomy and physiology and truly understands the science behind his craft. I’m always very impressed. I cannot recommend him enough. You are in great hands!

resp.text: Thank you so much! I'm so glad that massage has helped you to live with less pain! Always great to work with you!

name: rb S
text: I cannot say enough positive things about this LMT. He is very professional, he knows what he is doing and targets all the right areas for maximum relief. He books quick, his prices are very affordable, and the ambiance cannot be beat. I have not stopped reccomending him since my 1st visit and I will coming back for regular sessions. He relieved an injury I have suffered with for over 10 years in 1 visit! Very knowledgeable and down-to-earth, he and his sessions are like a mini-vacay for your body, mind and soul.

resp.text: Thank you so much! I'm so glad I was able to help you! I've enjoyed working with you!

name: David Lewis
text: Hurt my back awhile ago...started seeing a Chiropractor...Dalton lives in the building my family does...in shirt passing we became friends...and then he gave me the option for a massage...it was the best thing that could've happened!!...intelligent and amazing!! EVERYONE needs to go see him!! Love you Dalton!!!

resp.text: Appreciate it fam! I'm happy I was able to help!

name: Dixon Nash
text: Dalton makes his massage room feel like a home away from home. I immediately felt welcomed and completely at ease. As a massage therapist, there is absolutely no one I would recommend before him. If you are in Birmingham, are in pain, and are seeking relief, go to Spradlin Massage in Homewood, it's as simple as that. As a satisfied customer, I shall be returning as often as possible can. Cannot recommend highly enough!

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming Dixon! I love that you loved my massage space! I'm also especially glad massage could ease your pain. I hope to see you return in the near future!

name: Kiery Westerfield
text: Literally the best massage I've ever received. I'm a full-time night nurse at St Vincent's and carry a lot of tension in my shoulders and neck from charting electronically along with in my legs, hips, and low back from being on my feet all night. Dalton is always able to get me in to his office in a timely manner and makes it clear that he's focused on you for whatever your appt duration may be. His office is so cozy and I love the table warmer under the sheets! I always feel way better not just right after a session, but in the days following as well. Definitely becoming a long term client.

resp.text: Thank you so much for leaving a review! I'm so happy that massage helps you stay at your best! It's so important for what you do. Keep up the lifesaving work! You are more appreciated than you know.

name: Chris Cox
text: Dalton is an excellent and attentive therapist. He is knowledgeable of the body and the potential imbalances that are often at play behind individual ailments and because of this you will rarely get the same treatment twice. As a fellow massage therapist there are certain people in our field that you will visit and respect because of their ability to help and understand the root causes your pain and Dalton is someone that I come to visit when the wear and tear of the business begins to appear. If you are looking to relax or get pain treatment I would not recommend anyone else.

resp.text: Thank you for taking to time to post a review. I'm so glad I can do something to help keep you going! You're awesome at what you do, and it is a privilege to work with you!

name: Juan Sanchez
text: For my first massage ever Dalton made me feel really safe and comfortable. I've never felt better.

resp.text: Thank you Juan! I'm really glad you enjoyed your massage and that I was able to help! I hope to see you again in the future!

name: Helsing 1997
text: Very professional, friendly, and compassionate. Highly recommend for routine massages, especially related to minor or moderate injury/wear.

resp.text: I'm glad I could help with the wear and tear! Thanks for coming!

name: Tessa Slota
text:
If you are looking for a massage therapist to feel comfortable around , a cozy environment,
And a great massage I highly recommend you see Jennifer Parker! I have had many massages over the years
however; Jennifer , by far,  is the best yet!!!!
My entire experience was AMAZING!!!  From the first step in the door ,to me leaving, she made sure I was completely satisfied!
I feel like a million bucks again! It will definitely be something I do a few times a month hands down!

name: David Muhlendorf
text: A totally off the charts fantastic massage experience.  Jennifer is an amazing therapist and her passion for her practice is very apparent.  She provides a clean  and comfortable location with perfect lighting and music.  More importantly she is very skilled in customizing the session to the needs of the client and making sure the experience exceeds your expectations. She would be a weekly visit for me if I only lived closer.

name: Sleep Deprived
text:
I have had many massages and was a massage therapist myself many years ago.
Jennifer is amazing. I have many injuries and am usually a little concerned, but I felt completely at ease and comfortable with Jennifer. It was like visiting an old friend I had know forever. She has an amazingly healing touch. She is very knowledgeable of many techniques and knew just exactly how much pressure to apply as well as a gift for homing in on those trouble spots that others I have tried just couldn't find. I left feeling great and it was like a "Time release" massage. Felt even more relaxed the next day. lol She has a rare gift and I recommend her highly.
Thank you Jennifer

name: Alisha Ohayon
text: Loved my massage!  I'm a former massage therapist so I'm so picky and Jennifer was super great... The space is lovely and smells perfect! Her communication is great as well.  I totally needed the heating pad and hot towel too...thanks so much Jennifer, I'll def be back!

name: Yula Indeyeva
text: If you are looking for a true therapeutic massage- Jennifer is the right choice!  She is very skilled in her practice- able to recognize the areas that require extra attention, and addressing them appropriately.  She also incorporates additional modalities to enhance the experience- hot stones, essential oils, etc.  Great experience all around!

name: Julie Bryars
text: WOW!! Jennifer was Awesome!! From her soothing environment to her massage. She performed an Ashiatsu massage that was so inviting. The release or opening up of my back to hips left my body tingling like a breath of fresh air.  I feel so relaxed and satisfied. Thank you so much Jennifer 👍

name: Monica schoen
text: I've been using Jennifer for years now! So glad she finally has her own practice! Asides from being completely AMAZING at what she does....she's professional, very knowledgeable, and she has a huge heart! I recently had a close friend pass from cancer. Before her passing a group of friends collected money for her first massage. Jennifer took it upon herself to get her number and numerous times visited her without my knowledge just to give an amazing woman comfort & relief during her very difficult fight. If I could give her 10 stars I would! Go visit Jennifer you won't regret it! 💜

name: Heather Whigham
text: LOVED my massage!  She used hot towels, hot stones AND Ashiatsu on me during the session and worked all the kinks out of my shoulders WITHOUT me being sore the next day.  Her massages are cool because instead of charging for specific services she charges for the time she spends (60 minutes or 90 minutes).  She uses whatever technique she needs to use to get the job done.  I WILL be back and i am telling all my Gulf Shores friends she's worth the trip to Foley.  Also, she is actually cheaper than everyone else around.  SO PROFESSIONAL.

name: Crystal Olsen
text: Jen is amazing!! You will NOT  be sorry you booked with her! Aside from how skilled she is at her profession, she's an incredible person and puts you right at ease!!

name: Jill Cramer
text: I discovered Jennifer in January, so far I've been there 4 times and plan on going back...often.  Truly an awesome experience...the best massages I've ever had.

name: Patrick Bryars
text: If you want to be relaxed this is a great place to get it! Always leave like I'm walking on a cloud!

name: L M
text:
(Translated by Google) Massive

(Original)
Masseg

name: Wes Whaley
text: Excellent staff and service!  I highly recommend giving Tammie the owner a call!!

name: Nathanael Killion
text: I felt wonderful after an hour deep tissue massage.

name: Amy Hancock
text: The massage was great but the noise got on my nerves. If I am getting a massage I want it to be quiet and relaxing.  The whole time I could hear a lady outside my door asking questions about the clothing they had there. It wasn't as relaxing as I would have liked it to be.

name: Rhonda McNutt
text: If you need a massage this is the place to go. I have lymphedema in one limb and over 6 months my leg has dropped 3 inches in diameter. Plus my Mother-In-Law who is 92 years young fell a few months back and she has been down with a pinch nerve in her back. She really did not want to go to a doctor for fear of having to have surgery so I recommended for her to have massage therapy. After just a 30 minute massage, she was pain free for three days. if you're looking for a massage therapist to help relieve your pain then Cullman Massage Therapy Clinic is the place to go.

name: Tony Sanford
text: It is wonderful to walk in all "kinked uo." And then walk out feeling relaxed and standing straight.

name: June Foster
text: Tammy helped me feel so much better.

name: Sharon Monteith
text: Great message by Deidre.

name: Deb Vaughn
text: Great message love it

name: Yolanda W.
text: Very nice and clean place. Employees were friendly and I had a good massage

name: Renee BOSWELL
text: It was very peaceful.I had an excellent massage therapist.

name: Kelly Suero
text: I had a deep tissue massage with Joseph and he was great! I felt very comfortable, relaxed, and he worked out my areas of concern. Thank you, Joseph! I'll definitely be back!

name: Chelsei Martin
text:
I can’t say enough positive things about Nikki and Peaceful Kneads. This was my first massage experience, and was only a last resort turn for spinal therapy prior to surgical intervention. I had the 1hr cupping massage and after a single visit my dexterity in my hands improved, my pain and pressure in my neck and spine went from a solid 7 to a zero, and my overall attitude improved.

Her professionalism, ability to make you feel comfortable, and address your unique needs is out of this world. Massages can some time hold an intimidating cost, for the price and quality of this experience you can feel confident knowing you are getting more than you pay for! Thank you guys!

name: Elizabeth
text: Very bad experience. Beforehand I took the time to read the requirements for COVID, and they said you needed to wait in your car to be called in, someone would meet you at your car to take your temp and that you needed to wear a mask while entering the facility. Well none of that happened except I wore my mask in the facility. After I entered the room and started to prepare for my massage I was told I would need to wear a mask while I was on my back! I was shocked at this info, because it was not stated anywhere that I took the time to read beforehand! So I simply told the lady I will just remain on my stomach for the whole massage. There is no way I would of taken the time off, paid a sitter and drove the 2 hours round trip for a massage if I had known I had to wear a mask! Well it just got worse! As I laid down on the table and put my face in the face holder, I felt like I could't breath and was being smothered in the sheet it was wrapped in...well I was! There was a small "bag" made out of the sheet wrapped around the head rest that you had to breath into! At this point I was very upset. I got dressed quickly and left. I had just waisted 3 hours, which includes driving 2 hours and paid a sitter for this!.....gets better. I was so upset that I forgot my initial diamond and white gold chain! I called immediately, and OF course....Nope, it was so where to be found! The lady said she looked everywhere, and I appreciate that. But what was supposed to be a relaxing afternoon turned out costing me over $1000. Very upset.

name: Deidra Clarke
text: Y’all I went in limping, came out skipping! I will most definitely be back! If you are second guessing please don’t, these are professionals who knows where to hit, what to hit, and how to hit it! Book Anne Folkes!!!! No lie! It is so worth it. It was even my one year anniversary and they had flowers and cider set up for us!!! 5 stars from cleanliness to professionalism to quality!!!!!

name: tony wratchford
text: Stephanie did a awesome job. I have never had a massage before,  I absolutely will be going back

resp.text: Thank you Tony! We look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: Natalie Unger
text: I got a massage today with Joseph. It was the best massage I've had in my entire life. Totally worth the money & really helped with the severe neck pain I've been experiencing the past couple of weeks.

resp.text: Thanks Natalie!

name: Scott Horror
text: Nikki is fabulous. I’m a dancer, so my legs always need attention, and when I leave after an appointment I feel soooo much better! I recommend her to everyone I know that needs a massage therapist. The interior design is very atmospheric, and the location is pretty easy to get to if you’ve been around Montgomery before. I’d rate 6/5 stars if it was possible.

name: Jenn Jones
text: Amazing staff, very clean, and professional.

resp.text: Thank you Jenn, we love what we do and we do our best every day. :)

name: Stephen Siler
text: I have seen multiple therapists in Montgomery over the years, but Nikki Roberts at Peaceful Kneads gives the best deep tissue sports massage I've ever had.  I also like that she'll work with you on appointment times and has online scheduling.  Her studio is super convenient just off of Vaughn & Taylor and exactly reflects its name: Peaceful.  You're simply not going to find a better studio or therapist in Montgomery.  This is the easiest 5 star review ever.

resp.text: Thank you, Steve! I'm glad you're enjoying the new space and thank you for allowing me to be your therapist for the past 9+ years!

name: Trinity Dicks
text: Amazing! Everyone is so kind! Great prices and wonderful services! You won’t go wrong!

resp.text: Thanks Trinity, we look forward to seeing you again!

name: Kristen Brown
text: I went in for a pre-natal massage with Nikki and it was absolutely AMAZING. Not just the massage, but the entire experience. From the moment I walked in the door, I was set at ease and that didn't change the entire time I was there. Nikki was very thorough and discussed everything I needed, along with what she would do before hand. I am very pregnant right now and she made sure my comfort level was perfect, checking with me occasionally. The massage room was wonderful. So calming, so soothing, and so peaceful. The sheets and pillows are probably some of the softest I have ever touched! Just a wonderfully peaceful environment altogether. I will definitely return!!

name: Ken Furman
text: As an almost 62 year old retiree (but very active one at that), the highlight (by far) of my wonderfully blissful life is my monthly appointment with Nikki!  I have moved 18 times in my life and traveled extensively in corporate America for 35 years; and I was blessed to be able to prioritize a monthly massage wherever I might live at the time. Needless to say, I have been cared for by a plethora of massage therapists but NEVER have I been as richly blessed by the quality of massage I receive monthly at Peaceful Kneads!!!  As noted above ... that 1 1/2 hours is consistently the best time segment of my month ... (and the twice annual gift to self of a 3 hour massage is the ultimate experience).   In summation:  Blessed...Blessed...Blessed by Nikki and Peaceful Kneads.

resp.text: Ken, you are such a Blessing to those around you..I feel so grateful to be able to work on you each month and to hear all the great things you do for the community. Thank you for the humbling review.

name: Mary Evelyn Baxter
text: I love Nikki and am extremely grateful for her talent. I am constantly on the go and running around. Cycling, running, swimming, lifting weights, scuba diving, and anything else I can get into. I put my body through the ringer and Nikki always makes it better. It doesn't matter how many knots I have Nikki works them out and I walk out feeling better than I did walking in.

resp.text: Super Woman needs therapy too! Thank you and I hope I can keep you moving through every new adventure you take.

name: Lifetime Bama Fan
text: Stephanie is very good at her job. She has helped me with issues that have been long-standing and difficult. I highly recommend her.

resp.text: Roll Tide!

name: T Mat
text: Loved it! I'm always a better person by the time I leave. Nikki is wonderful!

resp.text: It's our please T Mat

name: Leah Shuford
text: Excellent service! Lisa is a wonderful masseuse! I have been going to her for years because she's just that good. I always leave feeling less sore and more relaxed. Knowing I have an appointment with Lisa is the highlight of my week!

resp.text: Thanks Leah! I'm so glad I can help & look forward to seeing you soon!!!

name: Sue K
text: I have been going to Nikki and Peaceful Kneads for years.  The new studio is BEAUTIFUL and so peaceful.  She helps me with fibromyalgia and headache management.  I love that you are able to make an appointment online so that we don't have to play phone tag with each other.  I highly recommend going to see her to help with any chronic or acute pain you may have or just to take time for yourself to relax!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words..I'm glad you like the new space and I hope to see you again soon.

name: Dakota Jo Keevan
text: Peaceful Kneads is the best in town! I saw Fred this week and his technique was different but as good as a Chiropractor adjustment in my opinion.

name: Jessica Lee
text: Hands down, BEST massage I’ve EVER HAD!! You gotta add ‘cupping’!! Nikki is amazing! And she has a wonderful staff!!

name: Michael Ashworth
text: Excellent results as always! ! Feel 100% better!! No foofoo massage here it's all about fixing the problem!

resp.text: Thanks Michael! We always try to give you what your body kneads!

name: Kirk Simpson
text: My experience with Hilda was superb; thoroughly enjoyed it.

resp.text: We are so glad you enjoyed your session! Thank you and we hope to see you again soon!

name: betz sinep
text: I moved to AL two years ago from WA and had been looking for massage therapist who actually knew what they were doing. I've had multiple neck and back injuries. Last week I found my person. My boyfriend had bought me a gift certificate for Peaceful Kneads and I promptly made an appointment with Tabi. That girl has some magical healing hands!! She knows how to release muscles without causing pain or leaving bruises. She's one of those professionals who continues her education not because she has to, but to learn as much as she can to further help her patients. I will definitely be going back!!

resp.text: We are so lucky to have Tabitha at Peaceful Kneads now! She is the most passionate therapist I've met In a long time and she truly cares about her client's health. Thank you for your kind review and we look forward to seeing you soon! -Nikki

name: Marihaj Mitchell
text: Great atmosphere,very professional, and great service!!!! I had recently developed upper back pain due to improper sleeping and this pain went on for a few days. I finally decided to browse the internet and find a place to get a massage. I found many different places but I found that Peaceful Kneads Massage was the easiest to book online. OMG!!! Booking with Lisa was the best decision I made, she know exactly what she's doing. My back was hurting to the point where it hurt when I breathe. After she was done with my massage I instantly felt better then I did before I came. But the next morning, that next morning, I was back!!!! I don't have any back pain!!! So to Lisa at Peaceful Kneads Massage, Thankyou! Thank you! Thank you! ❤️

resp.text: Thank you Marihaj, as you've noted the benefits of massage are usually most notable on the following day or days afterward!

name: Isaac
text: Good massage, but not up to par for what it takes to really give a deep tissue massage for a person that weight lifts often.

resp.text: Issac, I'm sorry to hear the pressure wasn't sufficient for your needs! We strive to carefully listen to our clients during the scheduling process in order to match them with the therapist best suited to help them achieve their goals for their session and during the intake process to make sure we go over expectations right before the session begins. The therapist we scheduled you with is used to working with athletes and has sports massage and myofascial release technique training which both use Deep Tissue work, but sometimes this doesn't necessarily translate into what a client would call or expect as Deep Pressure. I would love to talk with you and set you up with myself or a different therapist to make things right and to see if we can meet your expectations. I'll contact you this week to see if we can do this. Thank you for your feedback! Peace, Nikki Roberts.

name: ckernel
text: While the facility was nice, I did not enjoy the massage.

name: Demarcus Sharpe
text: Love the vibe. Fred is the man

resp.text: Thank you Demarcus! We are so glad you enjoyed your session with Fred. We appreciate you!

name: Angela Stallworth
text: BEST MASSAGE I have had in a LONG time!!! Thank you Stephanie!!

resp.text: Stephanie is awesome! Thank you Angela! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Wes Tallon
text: Massage was OK but mechanical.  Therapist was watching the clock.

resp.text: Thank you for bringing this to our attention Wes.

name: amy Kim
text:
Facial massage ???
Never again.

resp.text: Amy,  I’m sorry you didn’t enjoy your session! We try to make each session relaxing and enjoyable. Let us know what we can do to make it a more enjoyable experience for you. I have emailed you about this matter and hope to make it right.

name: Alisa McLeod
text: Nikki is wonderful with cupping and massage.

resp.text: Thank you Alisa, cupping is one of our specialties! It is great for  pain, inflammation, blood flow, relaxation and well-being, and as a type of deep-tissue massage.

name: Michael Roberts
text: The new place at 8101 B Seaton Place is awesome...check it out.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: Reginia Knight
text: Will be going back again

resp.text: Thank you Regina, we hope that we can earn that fifth star when you come back, talk to us!

name: Judith Keegan
text: Stephanie,  iron woman and my massage therapist for years, has moved here!

resp.text: Stephanie is amazing! We are so happy to have her and her awesome, healing bodywork here at Peaceful Kneads. And, we are happy to have YOU here! Thank you Judith!

name: Gabs
text: I recommend Island Day Spa to everyone. Everyone that works there is the kindest most professional and talented people I have ever met. I looks forward to every appointment with them 💜

name: Annia Perez
text: Walk in to get a gift certificate. Place was very clean.. the lady was on the phone she told to give her a second very polite and she got to me in no time help me.

name: Brandi Jones
text: I love This place! This is one of my favorite salons. It’s always clean. The staff are professional, friendly, and cool . Annie, Cindy, Matthew, Love you guys .

name: Ariel Vail
text: I can not say enough good things about this place. My friend and I went there, our nails look amazing and we felt like pampered princesses! We will definitely be going back. Everyone was so nice and it was actually the best experience I've had in a nail salon. 100% recommend!

name: Audrey McLeod
text: I'm a regular here and my services always turn out great. Selena and her staff are awesome. Quiet place to relax unlike other nails spas, and they mean it when they say it.

name: Tanya Hall
text: Absolutely love this place. Matt and Annie are so awesome. Everyone is so friendly. Definitely would recommend to anyone.

name: Gabrielle Wallace
text: Mattew is my nail tech I love that he understands my vision for my nails and brings it to life in a professional way!!!! Matthew is awesome!!!!

name: Judith Dunning
text: Excellent customer service!!

name: Herminio Flecha
text: They must have downsized from what I remembered. It used to be much nicer and private. Now you just walk right into what looks like a nail place. I turned around and walked out. Advice: go elsewhere.

name: Quanyell
text: Nice environment & friendly staff. I'm very satisfied with the service there.

name: Sassha M
text:
I Love Matthew and the awesome service that he gives me each time that I visit!!! #SNSLife#
**Update**
I had to switch nail technicians to Cindy and she did my nails very well for two years. I don't go there anymore because she did my SNS and a week later it was lifting up and she wanted to fix it when it was convenient for her and not when it was convenient for me...the customer.

name: Veronica Corral
text:
I had SNS with Selena, she was rude, inattentive, messy, and rushed. My nails were unevenly filed and she flooded my nail with top coat without cleaning it up after. The entire staff seemed lost and overwhelmed with the amount of clientele in the shop. The entire place is small, cluttered and messy. Save your self the trip and look for the better rated nail salons out there. The only reason I came here was because the Royal Day Spa was booked. Never again.

Check out the Royal Day Spa; considerate, good, attentive and professional!

name: Shauna S
text: Very professional, clean. friendly,  & good full service spa.

name: Natasha Washington
text: Annie The best SNS work in Mobile polite professional and patient and Ann very detaile Quality Long lasting Great job every time. Worth my time and money.

name: Mandy Jenkins
text: I have had a massage, facial, and most recently my nails done and all have been great  experiences!!

name: Ashley Brasher
text: Walk-ins welcome, hardly any wait time for an eyebrow wax. The worker asked what I wanted and was able to give me exactly what I wanted with my eyebrow wax

name: Danielle M
text: Very inconsiderate. I Didn't cancel my appt in time, and they wouldn't reschedule or even give me a gift certificate without the full payment again after already being charged $140. They will never have my business again or a referral😠

name: Dionne Harris-Henderson
text: I love this spot!! So laid back and the staff is friendly 🤗

name: Dalila Piñón
text:
They don't know what they're doing here. It's a very drab place and all the employees were rude.

I got SNS done here because my usual place was booked. Even though Nina was a sweetheart and very deligent,  it still wasn't enough to look past my uneven nails. Their methods are dated, which I'm sure has to do with the dated staff.

If you're looking for a real spa/ salon experience this isn't the place to go. Listen to the bad reviews on here, even the ones from years ago; they seem to match my experience pretty well.

name: Nashundra Sargent
text: This will be my 1st time going to Island day spa my sister n law got me a gift certificate from here for my graduation and I hope ill enjoy it.

name: Kisha Rookard
text: Great for waxing!

name: Sharon Pugh
text: Real nice staff. Great pedicure

name: Patti Fagan
text: The best nail salon in Mobile, IMO. I could not ask for a friendlier or more professional staff. No need request a specific manicurist.

Clean and wash dishes and this is happening to every nail I am highly disappointed

name: Jirah Moon

I'm definitely a believer in chiropractic medicine now. Discover Chiropractic has since moved to a new location in Trussville, and has added a new doctor ("Dr. Pete") to the lineup. We are so pleased with the results from our visits with Dr Mix.

My infant daughter failed her newborn hearing screening at the hospital, and at her 2 mo check up. She was diagnosed with having excess fluid on and around the eardrum, a condition which causes hearing loss and typically causes ear infections. We had taken her to an ENT and pediatrician, and both recommended surgery to put tubes in to help drain the fluid off her eardrum.

After her diagnosis, we visited Dr Mix twice a week for adjustments at approx 2 months old. In only a months time, we have seen vast improvement.  Her last ENT visit was a couple of days ago. She finally passed her hearing exam for the very first time in both ears!!! There is still a small amount of fluid remaining, but our ENT detected a noticable reduction in the amount, and has postponed the need for tubes.

We will continue to seek weekly treatment with Dr Mix, and are so happy that his treatments allowed us a non-invasive approach to restore our  baby's hearing. Dr Mix has been wonderful to work with through such a difficult time. He has taken extra care to go over computer readings with us that have  conclusively shown the gradual improvement at each stage as well. My daughter  has smiled and cooed through every adjustment (no, they don't hurt AT ALL). As a side benefit, one of the computer screenings showed she also had a vertabrae out of alignment which can affect digestion as well. After her adjustments we have also seen improvement in this area also.

Parents, DO NOT HESITATE to schedule an appointment for your babies and children at this office. Both Dr Mix and Yvonne are wonderful to work with, and show genuine concern for us at each visit. The office is super clean, and has very up to date equipment too. We have never had long wait times, even when we have stopped by unexpectedly without an appointment, and the waiting room was full. I am so happy we "discovered" Discover Chiropractic.

text:
I got a same-day appointment in from out of town. The facility seemed like there was a lot of DIY work for upkeep - thick paint on cabinet doors so you could see the brush strokes, tiles with messy grout that looked dirty (and probably would no matter how you scrubbed), several different flooring styles as you walked through, visible command hooks used for hanging pictures. Finer finishes that made the salon look like it needed attention.

The haircut however was great. We had a consult where my stylist Tammy asked about my preferences, lifestyle, and schedule to make sure she could suggest appropriate styles that would look good at home. She was careful and thorough, and friendly but not overly talkative.

I will say, the services tab on google is not accurate for pricing, as a cut and style was more than listed on here. Still, it was a good service and I am satisfied with my results.

name: Mo Du
text:
Be ready for a lengthy review:
I was looking for a nail salon to become my regular spot.  Unfortunately, Olivia A. Salon is not the place for me.  I went in for an acrylic fill with gel on top and while everyone was friendly  I left unhappy with my nails.   The result was chunky, overly thick, and uneven.  It looked worse than press on nails glued and painted by a child.  The nail technician did NOT use a drimmel or motorized file but used a foam hand file to take off my existing and layer of acrylic.
At first this seemed nice but I was mistaken.  She was unable to file the smaller sectional of my nail bed and ended up filing skin which hurt.  My nails were embarrassing to look at as they appeared malformed and lumpy.  When she applied the gel she used 3 very thick coats of color that didn't dry under the light and were soft to the touch.  To be fair, I'm picky with my nails and when I saw the manicure going south I didn't say anything.  I should have.  Instead I left and went straight to another nail salon.  At the next salon they showed my Quasi-Modo nails around and laughed.
The salon itself is easy enough to find but the level of aesthetics is less than what I like.  They clearly want to be a high end salon but the quality is not quite there.  In addition, the prices were NOT worth it!  They charged $10 over what any other salon does.  The people were nice and they fit me in.  And I want to make it clear, I did not say anything to the lady.  But I'm not sure that she would have been able to fix them even if I had.

I only did a partial highlight and a trim which looked good blown out in her mirror. Then I got to my car and noticed that part of my eyebrow was bleached! She didn't use foils but some kind of paper and apparently when it was sitting on the front of my face it bleached through. Then the shampoo bowl had someone else's hair color left on the neck part of the bowl. Now that I have my hair pulled back I have parts that look like cheetah spots. I spent $150 for this! After the exam and x rays he talked to me about a treatment plan and he did my first adjustment, and I currently go about twice a week now and my only regret is that I did not go sooner! His office is cute and comfy and clean, and he is very prompt about returning phone calls personally, and he makes room for people who are in pain. HIGHLY RECOMMEND!
