name: Paul Filipowich
text: I wanted to leave another review for Tao Massage Parlor on HWY 280 Birmingham Al. I've been a client for several years and I have been extremely pleased with my services and the owner Mike, he is very sensitive to your massage needs and he will make sure someone will get you in one of his 3 different massage parlor's in Birmingham. Mike is very knowledgeable in massage therapy and with a pandemic going on with the cornavirus, I was very hesitant in going to get a massage but Mike reassured me and answered all my worries, the therapist take their own temperature and shows you their temperature,  they also take the clients temperature, hand washing, rooms and tables are sanitized along with mask being worn by both the therapist and the client. The Tao location is very clean with a comfortable atmosphere, they are all very professional. I can't say enough about Simon, he is one of the best massage therapist I've ever came in contact with,  he's very professional, covers your entire body head to toe, applies the right amount of pressure and will adjust according to your preference, he's very knowledgeable about the anatomy of the muscles and will apply the amount of pressure and hits all the pressure point's, their prices can't be beaten, I always get a 3 hour deep tissue massage and I'm never disappointed, the money is worth every penny. I work in the medical field and have herniated discs with sciatica, I'm always on my feet and Simon knows every spot to hit, his hands are magical and it de-stresses me.I recommend any of Mike's parlor' s if you get a chance to go ask for Simon he is awesome and you couldn't ask for anyone better than Simon. Mike has a great business, I don't think I've ever had to make an appointment they say come on in and they will get you seen by a therapist, Mike will always do his best to accommodate you and your schedule. 5 star service!!!

name: Ralph Leonard
text: I needed to loosen my back for my golf league last night. I walked in without an appointment and I was please to see the co-owner there, she was very accommodating and professional and she was able to get me a massage right away. Best massage I ever had and thanks to my great massage and stretching I was able to hit the golf ball an extra 15 yards.  I will be back and I am so pleased that the co-owner accommodated my urgent needs. She is phenomenal and an asset to her business.

name: Nancy Davis
text:
Mike,
After over a year of our pandemic mode, our daughter was able  to visit us and asked if we needed anything?  We had the most wonderful massage! Our time here was so special! A long awaited healing! Truly grateful for your professional massage therapist. Thank you,

name: Lori Cox
text: Massage was lacking. Tons of oil. Same stroke over and over. Obvious knots were ignored. Had a couples massage and my partner rated the same way. Very disappointed. Cost was reasonable for a massage and not an oil run down. Didn’t get a massage. Felt like I wasted money and 60 minutes of my life.

resp.text:
This is owner Mike.
I am so sorry what had  happened Lori.
we have  shorted people recently and get two people help temporarily. I thought they are  ok which  they are not. I diffidently will have this corrected. would you please give us second chance. I will give you 4 free one  hour massage to come back  to see  our  improvement.
I promise you will be happy.

Thank you again for your feed back.

name: REBECCA TAYLOR
text: I had a wonderful experience here. I had a great massage and the owner was extremely kind. I will definitively be returning.

resp.text: Thanks Rebecca. See you next time.

name: Crystal Davis
text: Ok

text: If you want to feel like a new person come here. They take their time and will focus on the areas you ask the most. I just tell them whole body but they can feel where you are most tense. I love this place. Prices are very reasonable. I’d take this over Massage Envy all day!

name: Michael Ball
text: I took the wife and treated us to a couples massage tonight and it was the best massage I have ever had.  I am sorry that I did not get the masseuse name as I plan to return again!  The wife was also very pleased!  I highly recommend this place!

text: Here is the best place to go and have a very professional massage! Highly recommended! Especially if you need to get a deep tissues or a sport massage.

name: Andrekia Forbes
text: My boyfriend and I went here after looking at the reviews online so we booked an appointment thinking that we were going to have a nice relaxing day, definitely didn’t turn out that way. The ppl were nice but the woman spoke very little English, the room we were in was SUPER small the ladies barely had enough room to work. But the worst part about the whole experience they don’t have a receptionist, so the  masseuse had to stop SEVERAL times to answer the phone and talk to walk in customers. And my back hurts worst now than before I went!! WILL NOT BE RETURNING!!!!!!

resp.text:
My name is Mike, Owner of Tao Massage.
I am so sorry what happened. And also thank you for the feed back.
we have made some changes and continue make changes after your feed back.
I am going to keep the receptionist in the front only answering the phones and receiving  customers. I am also increasing the size of the couple room soon.
would you please come back to see our improvements? I will offer your two couple massages for free. I would really appreciate it if you would give us a second chance and have the review removed.
Thank you.

name: Global Direct LLC
text: My therapist was fantastic and worked on my tight muscles due to traveling. The environment is serene yet friendly. I will be back.

name: Jennifer Yee
text: My husband and I were in town for the weekend and decided to get 1-hour massages. This was the first place listed on our Google search. I got a $60 shiatsu style (no oil) and my husband got a $70 deep tissue sports style. We were both really happy with our massages and the friendly service. Wish we had a place for this value back in Atlanta! Facilities are simple but clean and warm. Will definitely be coming back next time we're in town.

name: Darrell Garner
text: Great hands

name: Amanda
text: My husband and I have visited twice and absolutely LOVE the hospitality and relaxing massage therapy Mike and his staff offer. We are definitely going to be regulars! The services are very affordable and the therapists are great at listening to and caring for your needs, aches, and pains. Enjoy!

name: Kim
text: Awesome deep tissue massage, the best I've ever had, massage therapist dosen't speak much english, but reception does, low cost and accommodating. If you are looking for something romantic with a couple don't go there, there are no frills, but, if you are looking for a great massage, this is it, going back!

resp.text: Thanks Sylvester. Glad you enjoyed the massage. Looking  forward to see  you again.

text: Great experience! My wife and I have been going together - perfect opportunity for us to relax and let stress melt away. The staff has gone out of their way to be friendly and accommodating!

text: Coming from Atlanta this is one of the best massage I had in Birmingham. There was come communication issues at first. But when he started working. It was over. Worked out some of my most troubled spots

text: Have chronic headaches Mike did a accupressure massage and I also had Kim give me a full body, left feeling awesome and was treated great, going back this week.

name: My Business
text: My huband and I called and booked an appointment for 1:15. When we are arrived a little after 1 (We were early cause we for the first time in a long time did not have kids for the day so we were ready to treat ourselves) they told us they let walkin customers do a 90 minute massage and asked if we could COME BACK!!! And it wasn’t in a little while. They asked me to come back in 3 hours!!! My appointment was at 1:15 and they wanted me to come back at 4. When I told her I didn’t want to because I live 30 minutes away and that would be pointless she just kept saying I’m sorry come back at 4. She had no care in the world of what she did. The first time going there and it was so awful!! Never again. How can you just let a walk in go knowing you have an appointment scheduled. Simply unacceptable.

resp.text:
Kaitlyn, I am the owner. Please accept my apologies for the mix up that happened with your appointment. I have addressed this with the staff. I am sorry that this happened..

If you will allow us to make this right, I would like to offer you and your husband both two complimentary massage sessions. Please contact me and I will get it taken care of for you and again- please accept my apologies regarding your appointment. My number is 205-222-0124. Thank you.

text: Most unprofessional and inconsiderate doctor's office I have ever come in contact with in my life.  Made 1st appointment, drove an hour to get there and they had no record of my appointment (after giving me directions as to how to get there) once I arrived.  Made a 2nd appointment; they called and changed my time which I explained would push me to get there, was told if I were a few minutes late that it would be okay.  Called them on my way to tell them that there was a car accident on the interstate and that I would probably be 10 minutes late and was told that the doctor would not see me.  Another hour drive for nothing.  They were rude on the phone and actually hung up on me refusing to let me talk to the owner or the practicing doctor.  I will be reporting this place to the Better Business Bureau and will be reporting the doctor as well.  They are a joke!!!!

text: Fyzical is without a doubt the best place to go for your physical therapy needs! They are amazing at what they do. Every session is one-on-one and specialized to your needs. They go out of their way to treat you like family. They have worked with four people in my family and we would all HIGHLY recommend them! text: This is an amazing place that few people know about! I am going because of an onset of vertigo and this is the place to relearn balance and deal with issues of vertigo. It can help many people with different balance issues. They have safety harnesses that connect to tracks to make sure you will not fall while doing the therapy to get your balance back. If you have a loved one with balance issues this is the place to be.

text: This is the third time I have needed physical therapy but my first occasion to use Fyzical at Decatur, Alabama. I am so impressed with this facility and is by far the best. Unlike previous places I’ve been, the therapists treat their patients one on one. Therefore I have been able to actually progress and at a faster rate. I actually enjoy my therapy and look forward to it. The therapists I have used are Shawna, Jeff and others. They are consistent in their treatment and always ready to do anything to make sure I’m comfortable. I recommend Fyzical to anyone who needs any type of therapy. They are in the process of helping me wit my balance and are doing a great job!   Peggy Hughes

text: I am new to the area and was referred to this place from a local. I’m so glad that I went! Dr. Bell is very professional and very informative. I would definitely recommend this place to others.

name: ghostpepper
text:
Go to THE MED SPA DOTHAN instead!! MUCH better facility and staff! I’m just copy and pasting another review because it was exactly the same for me. There are tons of bad reviews. Never again will I step into that outdated, tacky, and unkept “spa.”

Does not even deserve one star.  Terrible experience, from the moment I walked in.  The staff (this includes Dr Bell-Muench) were unfriendly, rude, immature, and astonishingly enough, acted annoyed that I was there.  (It was my first time in and I had literally just walked in--I hadn't even had time to offend anyone yet lol!)  The place was empty except for one woman who left as I filled out new-client paperwork.  They treated her very poorly as well.  The look on her face...she was just so upset and hurt.  It was so sad!
Grounds and exterior of building unkempt, interior décor tacky, outdated, dusty.  Both parking lots are usually barren, save for the same few cars.
I would say this atrocious behavior was a one-off, maybe a bad day for the office or whatever, but I did go in a second time (gave them another chance) and was treated the same way, plus other reviews echo my sentiments.  It's too bad, because this place could be super-cute and much more successful, with some better attitudes and better customer service.

name: Karen Raines
text: Dr. Bell and her staff are amazing. Dr. Bell is super friendly and even hugs you before you leave. She treats everyone like family and truly cares and listens to your concerns. This place offers many different services and quality products. I recommend this place highly!

name: Gail Armstrong
text: I read a lot of these reviews, so wasn't sure what to expect, but I found Dr. Bell to be extremely professional. She didn't push anything on me and, in fact, suggested I wait on doing what I thought I needed and try a few other things first. The consultation was free, she listened to my concerns, and answered my questions. I think sometimes people confuse strong, professional women with being "mean" or "brusque." I found her to be both professional and kind. I'll be scheduling another appointment.

name: Sheila Tiner
text: They have great products.

name: Rolande DEAN
text: My experience at the spa was wonderful. I will be going back. Really nice staff.

She’s amazing and I wouldn’t trust anybody else with this procedure.

Does not even deserve one star.  Terrible experience, from the moment I walked in.  The staff (this includes Dr Bell-Muench) were unfriendly, rude, immature, and astonishingly enough, acted annoyed that I was there. name: claudia reis
text: Stay away from this place! The owner Amanda Bell does not know how to run a buisiness or how to treat her customers AT ALL. She couldn't care less about any of them! I can't even describe her as rude, it's much worse. My mother was going to be 5-10 minutes late to her appointment (we drove 40 miles to get there and hit traffic) she called and informed the office and they acted like that would be no problem. Well we got there and the owner told her "I'm not going to be able to do everything, you should have been on time." My mom then said she'd like to reschedule because she wanted to have it all done at once (she is getting married soon). That's when A. Bell totally lost her temper and made nasty comments to her as she was walking out the door and would not stop! Staring her down the whole time! I then went in to ask what her name was. At this point she is raging. she told me that this is her property and if I don't leave right now she's calling the police as she's walking closer to me cornering me to the door! (I am 19, by the way!) Also, my mom has gotten Botox there before multiple times and had droopy eyelids from It for weeks. I have read other reviews where this has happened to other clients. This lady does not know what she's doing and is the craziest person I have ever met. I left shaking and choked up because it was so creepy. Her business needs to be shut down and she lose her license. She doesn't even deserve one star!!

name: rhonda irvin
text: The staff was nice.

name: April Ingram
text: I've been coming here for years and I'm always pleased with Dr. Bell's work. She keeps me looking young!

name: Melissa A
text: This place has multiple cases of eyelid droop after injections. This is pure negligence on the treating physician, Ms. Bell. Hitting the nerve during injections rarely happens, and for it to happen multiple times by the same physician is very scary. I would highly recommend for people to avoid this spa, it is not worth permanent disfigurement!

name: Hayley Jarvis
text: Not happy. I have been coming for a while and like Dr. Bell. However, those that work up front are not friendly. Drove 2 hours for an appointment and was 5 minutes late. Called and let them know I was almost there (got stopped in a funeral procession). Got to the office and they told me she left and couldn’t do it today. I’m disappointed in the way it was handled.

resp.text: You should always arrive on time for appointments. If you arrive late, and the doctor has already left the building, it is certainly impossible to be seen by the doctor that day.

name: Mela Davis
text: I love it.. great massage. I would advices anybody

name: Brittany Welch
text: Ive been here a couple of times and every time I have been there or called the people running this place just seem like they really could care less about gaining business. First time I was there was a full day at the spa and it was nice until I got to the madi/pedi room. The girl doing my mani/pedi discussed her boyfriend problems with me the entire time! This was a gift for mothers day from my family...its something moms appreciate bc its the ONE time of the year its about US. Well... this person made my day about her. She cried most of the time. I don't know her I didn't know what to say! Its was very uncomfortable and ultimately ending my day in a negative way. EVERYTIME I call them, they have to "see" if someone can work when I need to come in. Keep in mind their hours say they are open until 7pm. I have called and wanted to pick up products and they act like they are doing me a favor by waiting until I can get there at 6. I call to asked for a massage around 4 or 5. The person I spoke to on the phone placed me on hold then returns back to the phone and actually said to me no one could work that late. Its like that EVRYTIME I have called. No real need for business I suppose. I wonder if the Dr that owns this spa is aware that the people running this place have a serious lack of wanting to WORK. You provide a service that you are ultimately making it difficult for people to support. I believe in 2nd and even 3rd chances (my reason for trying to use them over and over) but I am done trying to provide my business to people who actually make you feel like you are inconveniencing them.

name: Kevin Archambault
text:
For my 36th wedding anniversary, I got my wife a "day at the spa" package; I believe they called it a "decadent day at the spa" and boy, was it!  First of all, my wife happily reported that all the attendants were very nice.  The day started out at 10 sharp - "not!"  The first half of the day was dedicated to a massage and body scrub; something I thought would be a good experience.  The masseuse was a man, which in itself is kinda weird, but acceptable for a massage.  He was very professional my wife reported.  Next came "the body scrub!"  Now, I don't know about this stuff too much, but I would assume not too many men would take advantage of this service, thus leaving the target clientele women.  Another safe assumption that if your target audience are women, one would assume another women would be performing the services - WRONG!

Now picture this; a 50-ish woman married for 36 years (remember, this was suppose to be a nice experience), who is now attended to in a most intimate manner by a man - who was professional, but a man non-the-less!  To add insult to injury, Plush Medical Spa seemed to find it appropriate to hand my wife a couple of hand towels to cover "the girls upstairs" and the "lady parts" down below.  My wife is trim enough, but nobody in the 50's have the body of an 18 year old; "nuff said!!"  Can you imagine the absolute shock my wife had when the man straddled the table and explained to her how to get ready for the "scrub;" to put the HAND towel between her legs like a daiper, and further cover the "upper girls" somehow.

I'm starting to wonder "in just WHAT universe does this even seem appropriate??  My wife was extremely uncomfortable, but was "rolling" with it!  The indignation of it is beyond compare, and my wife was horrified.  After the "scrub" the same man has to wash my wife down, because they don't have a freaking shower in the place; "SERIOUSLY!!"  How can this even be possible?  Only at Plush Medical Spa apparently!!!!

Shortly after that, was the "included lunch" consisting of a salad from the next door eatery.  Now you would think that being a spa, there would be a nice area set-aside for a respite from the "pampering?"  NO, they handed her a take-out, styrofoam container, with plastic utensils, while sitting on a pedicure bench getting the "full treatment!"  You gotta be kidding me!!!!  I paid an awful lot of money for this "experience!!"

During the pedi and manicure, my wife questioned the sanitation of the equipment, at which the attendant stated "it was in barbasol; a sanitary solution!  My wife has several friends who own salons, and KNOWS that barbasol should be a deep-blue color.  Plush's barbasol resembled the feigning remains of a 30 day-automatic flush, toilet bowl cleaner, at day 45 after installation.  The blue color was almost non-existent!

After that was make-up.  The technician was about to apply it with "VERY" used brushes, at which my with questioned it.  The girl then said, "well we use disposable brushes around the eyes and mouth!"  My wife made sure of that!

For the price I paid, I was expecting a very nice experience for my wife.  But when she picked me up after work, I sensed something wrong, as I got into the car, I asked how it was, at which point she burst out crying, hugging me closely and thanking me for the gesture, but saying "it was a horrifying experience of my life!!"  I felt utterly and totally betrayed.  After several hours of sadness she seemed to regain a sense of normalcy, but the nice relaxed, and pampered experience leading into a lovely evening, "didn't happen!"  I am so sorry I ever thought it would be a good idea to "surprise" my wife.

You have been warned!!!!

name: MultiSonyag
text: well i heard their ad on the radio, but after reading these reviews it sounds like a typical Wiregrass business, unprofessional. afraid to try it, i have to rate it so give them average

name: Brenda Sullivan
text: I love Med Spa Therapeutic Massage Therapy and Sherry. I suffer from a fall and also from nerve damage from the shingles. I read where massage therapy is really good for both. Sherry is great. I tell her where I hurt and she is focused to help me. She has done amazing things for my conditions. I love her deep muscle massage with the hot stones. Her room is always very clean and sanitized and I feel completely safe in the premises. The ambience of the surroundings is wonderful.

name: Courtney Quarles
text: Therapeutic healing massage is absolutely amazing. Sherri is so sweet, professional, and great at what she  does. The massages are so very relaxing and the facials are done with medical grade products leaving your face looking airbrushed and healthy. It’s no wonder she stays booked up for months! Luckily, she sends out emails of last minute cancellations giving you an opportunity to book same day appointments. 10/10 recommend!

name: Kimberly Busenlehner
text: I absolutely love going to Sherri for my massages. I feel it is important to treat yourself once a month to a massage. It's therapeutic for your body and mind. I shopped around for the best place to go. Before my first visit, I stopped by to meet her and look at the atmosphere. The moment I walked in the door I loved everything about it. Sherri greeted me with a kind smile and was so friendly. As she listened to my needs, I felt her genuine compassion and love for her job. She was happy to show me around. Her place is super clean and beautifully inviting. The aroma is wonderful and calming. The music is so relaxing. I knew I has found my place. She offers a large variety of services. I have tried every type of massage. The Hot Stone is my favorite.  Sherri is the best masseuse I have ever used. With the warm bed, hot towels, lemongrass aroma, calm music, dim candle lighting - you will not want to leave. Trust me. Give Sherry a try. You will be amazed. Its nice to find someone who actually cares about the physical and mental well being of her clients.

name: Angie Reaves
text: Sherry is AMAZING!!  She provides a wonderful relaxing atmosphere and is very professional. She has so many services to offer!!  She truly cares about her clients well being! Go see her, you will not be disappointed!!

name: Marty Jackson
text:
From beginning to end of session, Sherry concentrates on making my massage exactly what my body needs to heal and relax. She asks and listens to determine any issues and uses the techniques most helpful to alleviate them.

I highly recommend her services!

name: Michelle Morgan
text: Sherry gives a great massage, her studio is beautiful, and she is so professional. Just a wonderful experience from start to finish! I try to go once a month and I miss it when I don’t.

She offers many services so as to find something that works for everyone. I’m always going back and booking my appointments immediately after I have one.

text: Sherry does an amazing job for a very reasonable price.

I thoroughly enjoyed my Swedish massage. You start relaxing once you walk through the door and take in the aroma. Best massage ever. Will be back and highly recommend.

She focused on the areas I had mentioned were giving me issues. The ambiance was extremely calming, soothing, and relaxing. It was a great experience all around. I will definitely be coming back here.

I have had many massages over the years. My massage was unlike any massage I have ever received. IT WAS AMAZING! And that does not even come close to how I would describe my massage.

If you want to feel better contact Abiding Hands Therapy now. Even a day after I still feel the tranquility.

Thank you Abiding Hands, thank you
-Leigh

name: Ladonna Allen
text: WOW, what an amazing session I had with Hailee! I have had many, many massages but never one that addressed and relieved so many of my issues. Not only did I leave completely relaxed, but I no longer had a headache and could move my neck and hips without cringing. If you are in need of a therapist that knows how to listen to you and provide the best deep tissue massage ever, then Hailee is your person. I live an hour away but it is certainly worth the trip and can’t wait to return.

name: April Jossey
text: I had the most wonderful massage with Hailee today. I went in with back pain & came out feeling so much better. She was a great listener when I told about my problem areas and she was able to easily find them and successfully work them out. I was so pleased with the experience that I’ve already scheduled my next appointment!

name: Kami Pearson
text: Hailee did a wonderful job! Very convenient location and very relaxing room! Best massage I’ve EVER had! I will definitely be back and I highly recommend it!

I can walk in and just tell her to “fix me” and I leave feeling so much better. She is very knowledgeable, kind and calming. I highly recommend her.

text: Michelle, thank you for an amazing and perfect massage. It was my first Ashiatsu but will not be the last, you have definitely mastered this technique. The ambience in your therapy room is beautiful and relaxing. I will definitely look forward to my next sessions on future visits to Huntsville.

text: Michelle is amazing! Best massage I've ever had in my life. She listens and follows through. I don't feel like I've been beaten up. I feel fresh and new and energized! I recommend you make an appointment right away!

text:
I've been seeing Michelle at Abiding Hands for a while now.  When I was playing soccer and dancing regularly my muscles would get really tight and sore.  Michelle worked with me and after a couple of sessions the pain stopped.

I've had massages at other places that hurt and I just figured "pain = tight muscles leaving the body."  But with Michelle, I was surprised at how much release I got with almost no discomfort at all.  I would definitely recommend you give them a visit.

text: I have been to the Spa a few times and its different every time. I actually had a someone fall asleep while massaging me, I also had one that kept stopping to text on her phone. name: Eric Hendrix
text:
$25 for a day pass.  The guy who checked me in was useless.  Collected my money and said ok, you can go back.  No tour, no explaining where everything was...nothing.  It’s rather small so I was able to figure out the lockers and get into my robe rather quickly and head straight for the steam room.

Surprise, the steam room is broken down.  That sucks, but I could still do the sauna and whirlpool.  Wrong, sauna is broken too.  So all you get for your $25 is a whirlpool, and a lounge that has cartoons blasting loudly on the TV for some reason.

I am usually one to just write off a bad experience and say lesson learned but I did go back out front and talk to the girl at the desk.  She was very apologetic and said they should have told me about the steam room, and she had no idea that the sauna was broken.  She refunded my money and I left.

It has potential but this place is terrible right now.

name: Ethan Rayhorn
text: I made an online appointment for the same day and it was confirmed within 5 minutes. I got a 90 minute deep tissue and hot stone massage and it was wonderful. You get a FULL 90 minutes. There was a variety of techniques that I hadn't experienced before and it worked amazingly well on my sore back and shoulders. I love that they are open late too, so I can come in after work. The prices are very fair, and I will not hesitate to come back! Most importantly, I felt like the facility was clean. They wore masks, cleaned the table and headrest with alcohol, changed the sheets and washed their hands. They ask you to wear a mask when face-up on the table. I would want a massage therapist to be clean any time, but especially with covid, it was nice to see that they were doing things right. They also had their alabama LMT licenses at the front counter which is always nice to see when going to a new place and wanting to make sure it is legitimate.

text: If you’re looking for the best massage ever, look no further than Peaceful Solutions!  LeAnne has the perfect touch to work out all the knots & kinks in my neck & back. I’ve been a client of hers for years & since the reopening, I tried the CBD isolate with my massage & I felt like a million bucks! I slept like a rock after the CBD massage & I always have trouble sleeping. The instruments she uses along with her “magic” hands are amazing!  LeAnne will not disappoint; book her once & you will be hooked!

name: Jeffrey Witcher
text: I am so grateful they are open once again.   I have missed my massage people.   I was very pleased to see and must admit very impressed with the measures they have taken to keep us safe in this trying time of covid-19.   They have thought of most everything from N-95 mask to hand sanitizer to ultra-violet lights, hands free soap and towels dispensers and increased cleaning between clients.   Thank you.

name: Sandy Morrison
text: Today was my first day back, after the pandemic. I've been seeing Leanne for three years, and was so very excited when Peaceful Solutions decided to open with step one, after the pandemic. This place is amazing, they have brought heppa filters, uv lighting, in which they wait an hour between each appointment so they can make sure each room is completely sanitary. Thank you Leanne for making me and others feel safe and secure while having our needs met. 💜

name: Brad Luce
text: I have been with PS for about 10 years. They offer services for all needs. During the Covid-19 crisis, you can feel completely safe with treatment. They have air purifiers in all rooms, hand sanitizer is everywhere, you have your own personal jar of massage cream, and both you and your massage therapist wear masks. Everything is sanitized during and between sessions. You won’t be disappointed—all of the ladies are great and you can specify who you want to see.

name: Elisabeth Newell
text: Pandemic, not a problem.  After careful and detailed research Peaceful Solutions has added many touchless products, like soap dispenser, paper towels, air purifiers in every room and sheets are covering everything.  I was not at all hesitant to have a massage in the pandemic, With LeAnne she eased all the uncertainties before I even came.  I have had her for over 5 years and she never ceases to be detailed and current with the times and especially proactive!!!  Thank you LeAnne, my body missed you!!

resp.text: Thank you Elisabeth! We have really put our time into making sure you can relax at Peaceful Solutions!

text: Leanne is very good. Always feel relaxed and my muscles feel like putty after the session.

resp.text: Thank you Jessie, between the UVC lights, HEPA filters and hydrogen peroxide based cleaners we try hard!

name: Walter Overby
text: One of the best massages ever!

name: Ja'Nika Phipps
text: **DO NOT PURCHASE GROUPON**  My boyfriend purchased a groupon for services with LeAnne Owen back in May 2017.  I was going came in town to visit for a month after traveling for 3 months straight.  He thought this would be a good idea for me to relax.  When I received the groupon via email,  I called to schedule an appointment (as suggested on the voucher) but I just got the voicemail.  I called a few times over the next couple days because I actually wanted to talk to a person.  But after no response, I followed the instructions from the voicemail, which was to go online to check availability.  Only to find out that the next available day was in September 2017 (4 months later).  I immediately tried to call groupon to get a refund, because I definitely didn't want to wait 4 months for a massage.  However, Groupon was not able to refund me because it was day 4 since he purchased the Groupon.  They have a policy of a 3 day return.  They were not understanding and didn't care to hear my story.  I decided to try calling LeAnne again, but of course there was no answer.  I left numerous messages and she finally called my back 3 days later.  When she called, my intent was to explain my story to her and advise her I would be there for the next month to see if she could squeeze me in anytime within the next few weeks.  She said rudely said she couldn't and advise me to tell my boyfriend to give the groupon to someone else to use.  I made a suggestion to her to possibly disable her Groupon option until she's caught up, because I'm sure I am not the only potential long term customer with the issue.  She proceeded to rudely yell and tell me that she's backed up because of Mother's day and she doesn't need anyone telling her how to run her business.  Ironically this is the same place I purchased a Groupon for my boyfriend (with a different person) and he had a great experience.  Which is why he decided to do the same for me.  At the end of the day I will never give this place my money again and I will tell everyone I can the same.  My boyfriend basically, gave away money.

resp.text: I am sorry that this person feels this way. I do stay booked out anywhere from 10-14 weeks in general for new clients.  I called the person back as soon as she left a voicemail. I explained to her that if she calls and doesn't leave a voicemail that we don't know someone has called. The client wanted to know about how much money I make and I did tell her it was none of her business as it was also none of her business my relationship with Groupon which stands at 4.7 stars out of 5. I am sorry she feels this is rude, but I find it extremely rude for a stranger to try and tell me how to run my business. As a self employed person not having an opening 2-3 months out  means that I am employed, and that is a good thing. Groupon helps bring new clients in that I hope will become regular clients. I stay booked and I can't fit someone in because they are only going to be in town for a short time that just is what it is. That wouldn't be fair to all the people who wait the standard time for the great deal that Groupon is and I have done over 1500 Groupon massages in the last 3+ years. The person  begins the complaint by saying she was only going to be in town for a month and then talks about how she wouldn't be coming back. If she is only visiting for a short time it sounds like she wouldn't be coming back anyway. I find that most people who leave bad reviews it is because they couldn't bully their way into getting their way and try and get me breaking tmy best practices and rules. The fine print of the Groupn says by availability only. My schedule is online for the whole world to see. The lady wanted me to give her a refund and I told her no bc she didn't buy anything from me she bought a product from Groupon and I do not get all the money from the product. The woman then started asking how much I make  and that was when I told her it was none of her business which it wasn't. Being a therapist who is booked out means I am good at what I do. Groupon is to bring in new clients, not for your next day massage. I tried to help her and offer suggestions but she just wanted to be mad.

name: Johnathan Fail
text: Had a wonderful experience here!

name: Elle M
text:
If you value good customer service in addition to great massages, I would not recommend booking a massage with LeAnne. I bought a Groupon deal for two hour long massages. The first one was great but the second one never happened because LeAnne decided to "leave and go run errands" because I was 10 minutes late. Even though I called the business and left a message saying I was on my way, LeAnne informed me it is her normal practice to immediately leave the building and run errands if a client is not on time. She then told me I should have called her cell phone (which is not listed on the website or business door) instead of the business number.

I have never heard of such! If I have ever been late for a massage anywhere else, the therapist would simply subtract that time away from my appointment. I had taken off work to make this appointment, since this location doesn't offer hours that are convenient to people who work a 9-5 job. It's clear that customer service is not valued here so I will not spend my money at this place again.

resp.text: I wish to state that this client was a repeat client. She had been told upon her first visit to Peaceful Solutions that the office phone was just used to collect voicemails and given a business card with the cell phone number on it. The day in question I waited on the client for 20 minutes including calling the number given. The client did not show up. When a client is 20, not 10 minutes late it is my policy to consider them a no show. This was the second of a 2 massage Groupon deal, and the client states she got a great massage the first time. To give me 1 star because I upheld the company policy of not giving away free massages when people do not follow instructions is her prerogative, but she is the one missing out on great massages, and as for our hours of operation, I am a massage therapist of 20 years experience so no I don't work late or on the weekend, I work 9-5 like most working people because I too have a family to take care of. Namaste

text:

I got an appointment and felt some immediately relief of the discomfort on the first visit ... after a few visit the tension we sometimes describe as a crick in my neck was gone. Dr Kris explained the discomfort was coming from my C5 area being out of alignment and after a few adjustments I could tell a real difference. Honestly the first visit and hearing my neck crack was a little scary sounding but it didn’t hurt... thanks for helping me to feel better! If I hadn’t had the experience I am not sure I would have believed it helped but now I am a witness it does! Telayo Standfield

text: AMAZING Chiropractor!!!!!!!!!  I highly recommend Dr. Kristoffer Johnson. I was having some back problems,  just thought I was getting older. I didn't know how much damage had been done to my back over time. But I know now, and I am getting Back on Track. Even if you are young you need, in my opinion, to know how your body is! I wished someone had told me what my back looked like. This damage was done 20 yrs or so ago. I have been to another Chiropractor and they didn't tell me. Also, He has also helped my son, daughter in-law, grandson, and even my 6 month old granddaughter. The staff is very friendly, flexible with scheduling, helpful. My daughter in law contacted the office for me, for my first appointment, and they responsed promptly. I am so Glad Laura suggested him to me. 😀

name: David Welch
text: With much delight and confidence I can share my continual health progression under the care of Back on Track Chiropractic Downtown.  The last time I can remember going to a chiropractor was in 2004 and I honestly never had a bad experience, however, I also never had an experience that  benefited me enough to continue the care.  I became skeptical of chiropractors, skeptical of orthopedic practices, and skeptical of the health industry in some respects.  After unsuccessfully managing my pain due to a shoulder injury, arthritis, and degenerative issues, which all became more acute within the last 15 months, I decided to seek out an alternative to surgery and medications.  Chiropractic care resurfaced as a suggestion to me by a co-worker and I begin to search the local area for a destination to try to combat my persistent and nagging pain and discomfort.   I chose to meet Dr. Kristoffer Johnson based on the hundreds of successful reviews, his experience, and the overwhelming positive welcoming by team members, Bethany and Amy.    They are truly a team that works in unison.  They are truly invested into their patients health improvements and well-being.  They are truly honest, caring people that serve and make a difference in many, many lives.   Another MOST wonderful experience with Back on Track is that a planned number or subscription of visits was not prescribed to me like so many outlets build their potential success around.  "Let's get you better."   I can tell you Dr. Johnson, Bethany, and Amy, more than once, have iterated this as their focus and I am truly blessed and thankful to report that my health has improved.   The combination of therapy services and adjustments is not only beneficial to my physical well-being, it is mentally enabling as well!   On top of that,  I enjoy reading the blog posts on the website and educating myself with what Dr. Johnson's shares through his many years of experience.   After the first week of therapy and adjustments the agony of my discomfort started to go in a different direction.  Halleluiah!   Several weeks of consistent therapy and adjustments is proving to be the best thing I could have invested in for my overall health.   I am confident and positive that I am now "Back on Track!"   Thank you Dr. Johnson, Bethany, and Amy!!   I am very much encouraged and looking forward to continuing this health building relationship!  Many Blessings!

The adjustments and advice resulted in almost immediate relief and restful sleep for the first time in years.  I couldn't be more pleased with entire process.

text: Great service and location.  Staff is very accommodating for schedule.  I have scheduled and canceled appointments on short notice without issue. text: Love this place outstanding service.

name: 205Party Rentals
text: Dr. Kris is awesome.  He has been a blessing to our family. Thank you!!!!!

name: Cynthia Smith
text:
I'd first start by saying that I'm so glad I decided to give them a try.  The location is perfect and within minutes from my job.  I contacted them via email and got a response and appointment very promptly.  When I arrived for my first visit, I was in so much pain and couldn't turn my head to the left side. The staff (Amy and Beth) always greets you with a smile, warm conversations and pleasantries making you feel super special... they are absolutely outstanding professionals.. Also the atmosphere is pleasant, friendly and welcoming...almost heavenly.  Dr. Kris Johnson is an awesome guy!! The fact that you're not waiting around all day to be seen..  He takes time to explains your conditions/situations/issues and recommends a plan of action as to how he will work to get you some relief and feeling better.  See, I took a nasty fall down my basement stairs that resulted in several vertebrae out of alignment. By my third visit, the pain was down 2 scales (from 10 to 8) and now, after my 8th visit, I'm down to 5 more scales with some occasionally shoulder pain but no more numbness in arm or tingling in left hand.  I'm able to turn my head all the way to the left side with no pain and move my neck up and down freely. On top that, I'm  not having to pop pain pills...icing the area once or twice a day does the trick. I didn't intend to write such long review but I am reminded that the Word of God tells us to give honor where honor is due.  I 100% believe Dr. Johnson and his staff really deserve such worthy praises and recognition for what they're doing not only in my life but others everyday.  My prayer is that God continues to bless and prosper them and this wonderful Chiropractic office for many, many years to come.

Thank you,

Cindi Smith

name: Barb Latham
text: Thankful for the staff and Doctor! Kindness and mercy go a long way in this world today. Will be a regular patient.

I still go and see him about once a month to maintain the alignment in my back.   Also, the office staff is  wonderful.  Amy is very quick to get you started on therapy and Bethany (also Dr. Kris' wife) is very friendly and helpful when it comes to scheduling future appointments, handling the insurance and your visit.  I strongly recommend Dr Kris as a chiropractor.

Urban Cowgill

Whether you workout or lift people as I do daily, Kristoffer always gets that nagging place between my shoulder blades, fixing that pinched nerve in the same spot, and relieves my sciatica. I was referred to Doc Johnson and have referred many of my firefighter coworkers along with friends. It is a Christian based and family atmophere. Keep up the good work Doc, I owe you another hug and I will keep referring people your way so long as they are willing to listen. God bless!

No surgery was needed; just spinal decompression, along with physical therapy, and I was good-to-go!!  Bethany always greets you with a warm smile and Amy cares for you as if you're one of the family.  Wouldn't want to go anywhere else for chiropractic care!!

name: Precious Precious
text: WOW, what a great experience!  I'm a 30-year old, active female that had never experienced back pain! I had been experiencing a sudden onset of sharp pain in my lower back that became debilitating (a few hours after moving my Christmas tree, or so I thought). I'm a RN, so i knew to do the basics of applying ice/heat, resting, numbing creams, OTC pain meds, massage, etc. Although these methods provided some relief, it was temporarily. I was regaining some mobility, but nowhere near my baseline! I was having pain upon bending, walking, lying on my stomach and back, and even sitting. My coworker recommended that I come to Dr.Johnson at Back on Track. I decided to give it a try because my methods were not working. What a great decision! The customer service i received  was EXCELLENT and the atmosphere in the office was very inviting and calming!  I received my services with little to no wait time, which is very rare for visiting a doctor's office. The ENTIRE staff was friendly, knowledgeable, and encouraging! I received a tour of the facility and how each product/machine worked, education on what to expect, what to do to assist with my treatment upon leaving, and most importantly a remarkable service. I literally went from requiring assistance because of extreme pain and discomfort when sitting up to sitting up without assistance, IN MINUTES!!! Although I do have to return to the office for continued therapy, I immediately felt the benefits of my visit. I'm so thankful I decided to come to this office. Dr. Johnson and his staff literally got me "Back on Track!"

text: I had an excellent experience with my massage. Ian is very professional and knowledgeable in his massage techniques. I had very recently completed chemo treatments and he was very attentive to the restrictions and concerns I have. I will most certainly be visiting him again.

name: Stephan Onisick
text:
I went to Ian for a Sciatica Nerve Problem. I didn't listen to my wife and lugged too many boxes on our last move. Ian evaluated me and put my hip and back through a range of motions. He advised me that I might need to seek the services of a physician and physical therapist if I still had discomfort tomorrow.

This meant to me that he had the proper perspective of what he could and could not do. I probably need to connect to a physical therapist to get a good stretching routine to prevent these occurrences.

The massage was at the level I requested. It was thorough.
I like that I paid online and didn't have to worry about payment details. One note is that I'd rather payers were connected to PayPal--but there's probably a cost for the small shops.

I would recommend Ian.

One other note is that the office door wasn't immediately obvious and the signage wasn't great. It's on the side not facing the road on the bottom floor. Since I schedule for Sunday 10 am, there was not anyone to ask--but I found the door and he answered.

He emailed me afterward and invited me to reschedule. I told him that unless he gave guitar lessons, it might be a little while.

My sciatica pain has at least temporarily abated. He did a good job.

text: It is very good. Peaceful. Relaxing. Professional. Clean.

text:
I have been here a handful of times before over the years; it’s what you would expect for the price point.

I will not be going again after my last experience. After my massage, they had raised their prices unknown to me, which was totally fine. I still have them my regular 15% tip amount, which they made me feel bad about and all but forced me to give more and do a 20% tip. I was in a hurry and not in the mood to argue but they ended up taking over a 25% tip. Very distasteful business practice in my opinion.

resp.text: Dear customer, the employee you mentioned no longer works here. Thank you for your feedback.

name: A Stone
text: I had my first massage at Zen Garden yesterday. I had started a new job and my whole body was basically screaming in pain. I was eating Tylenol like candy and would spend nearly all day at home in bed so I could withstand an entireshift standing and bending. I knew I had a problem whenI went to Target and spent  $46 on different muscle rubs. So I made the call and scheduled my massage appointment.                           I came to Zen Massage and was immediately put at ease once I came inside to wait for my appointment. There was very soothing music playing and the business was very dim and relaxing. I wish I knew what kind of essential oils  they were using, it was a combination of different ones and smelled divine. I opted to do the 60 minute full body massage becauseI knew I had a lot of stiff problem areas. I decided that if I liked liked the results, I would come  back  to have my feet worked on, my main issue was my lower back. I was apprehensive because I had never had a full body massage where I neededto remove my pants and shirt before. I covered myself with a sheet and Marie went to work, starting on my back. At first, I was tense, but I gradually relaxed because I am overweight and insecure.  Marie used the perfect amount of pressure, not too soft nor too rough. She kneaded out all the knots in my upper back I was not aware I had. What was crazy was Marie cracked my neck by not touching my neck at all. She was working on the left lower hip when I heard my neck crack twice. Now that is talent! Marie used her knees and forearms to knead out everything in my body that hot baths, store bought muscle rubs, and over the counter pain medication  could not alleviate. She is a true professional and knowledgeable about body mechanics. I was in agony every single day before I visited and now I feel wonerful . My body feels 19 years old again and limber. Marie used some kind of rub or oil that had a slight heat and pleasant smell, much better then the Ben Gay I had been using. She also used some strangle technique where she pressed on certain points in my ankle and I felt a release of numbness in my feet with instant relief. Amazing! I recommend anyone wanting to feel physically better immediately check Zen Massage out.

name: Lorren West
text: Awesome, professional, great massage. The attendants listen to my needs. I frequent here often. I am 58- woman. I always feel very comfortable here. Easy to make same day appointment here too.

name: Melissa Sigman
text:
Amazing!
Hopefully this review will help people understand what to expect. It was not at all what I expected but it was much better! I’m used to traditional American style massages. When you go in it’s got a doctor office kind of feel. You have to fill out a form explaining the pain and symptoms you have. Marie was my massage lady. The first 15 minutes I wasn’t so sure if I was loving it. Probably because I was so tense it felt like it would never get to the feel good part. I have fibromyalgia, which makes everything hurt. Once she loosened me all up she really focused on my sore spots. She didn’t talk unless I talked to her which was great because I like it quiet. I was surprised that she was on the table too for most of the massage. The last 15 minutes she spent stretching me all out, which was great. She used something like icy hot on my back and used hot towels after to wipe it all off. Here’s a slight warning for anyone not knowing how it will be... it’s not for people who are physically shy! I was just in underwear and a few of the stretches involved her moving me into odd positions. Ladies, be prepared to have your top half exposed a bit. It was very professional though and I feel about a million times better now. I’ll be back on a regular basis.

name: Desmene Statum
text: I have enjoyed 2 massages here. Very quiet and peaceful, very nice guest services. Will return.

name: Corey Williams
text: Decided to just walk in on a Sunday. I was serviced immediately. I was very surprised by the quality. The deep tissue massage was actually deep. I have paid more for massages that were way worse .I will be a returning client.

text: They made me feel like a new person!!!! I got the deep tissue massage and oh my!!!! Every ache and pain was gone and i try to come often to Zen whenever I'm in town.... Trust me!!!!  you won't regret it and the prices are reasonable..! 💕💜❤

name: Daniel Turner
text: I honestly hate to leave a bad review. I called 2 days in advance for a 30 minute massage for 2. My girlfriend and myself her first one.  Got there and hardly any communication. Made sure to clarify 30 minute massage her swedish and deep tissue for myself . But they looked confused like they didn't understand.  Should have made sure. My fault. Didn't ask what we were looking for in the experience , expecting, what hurt ,or to clarify what we wanted. They talked so much between themselves we couldn't relax. Or even talk to eachother . every time we tried to communicate they would just ask if we were ok. And that's it. Even when we talked to eachother they would interrupt and just say you ok ? It seemed like it took longer than 30 min. But I didn't see or have a clock to keep up. Got done and realized it took an hour. So I asked about it. And they told me that it was what I wanted. But i took blame and paid for it. Then they demanded a tip. Even before I could pay for just the massage.  Even got beligerant to a point. And it had to be 10 apiece.  Kept saying 10 for her 10 for me. Not to mention they left repeatedly and even left the door open one time with my girlfriend exposed. Went by reviews for this place. I hope others have a better experience..

resp.text: Daniel, thank you for your detailed input. I have taken corrective actions and spoke to my employees. I'm deeply sorry about your experience.

As advertised, Marie is really good.  Saw the reviews and decided to take a chance. Very glad I did.

I have struggled with back problems for over a decade and have gone through surgery, physical therapy and I have seen several different chiropractors. After my first adjustment I had less pain and could finally sleep at night. I went weekly throughout my pregnancy and continued my visits after delivering my son in February.

Dr. Jessica has helped my baby as well. He has been getting adjustments since he was approximately 8 weeks old. Adjustments have helped him sleep through the night and rest comfortably in his car seat. After adjustments with Dr. Jessica, he is relaxed and happy. My husband and 7 year old also see Dr. Jessica.

Dr. Jessica and her staff consistently go above and beyond for me. They are like family. As a nurse myself, I recommend Dr. Jessica to all my patients, co-workers, friends and family!!

name: Andrea Belrose
text: Millar Jones Valley is convenient, knowledgeable and ethical.  They also took me when I was in severe pain and other chiropractors were telling me they didn’t take new patients for four more weeks.  Dr Jessica was right on with everything she did and said.  She sent me for X-rays before she or her staff touched me to make sure she knew exactly what she was dealing with.  She also told me to drink a lot of water which  I credit for helping me to heal so quickly.  We went from me being in tremendous pain, barely able to move, to the adjustment table within 3 days.  Amazing!

resp.text: Thank You

name: Eula Pugh
text: I have been going to Dr. Dana for about a month.  I've had great improvements with my body.  One of the ways is being able to sleep through the night without any pain.  He is thoroughly, I could not have found a better chiropractor.  Also, the staff is wonderful.

name: Will Taylor
text:
Young doctor. Very kind and very knowledgeable. I was sent here  by one of the Millar sister clinics...because she specializes in activator adjustments and in joint pain and i have very bad pain in one ankle due to a congenital birth defect. She has helped my pain go down where it had plateaued but still was very bad at the end of the day. I sleep better now from seeing her 2x a month for stretching, extremity adjustments, and for daily exercise program she makes for me to do at-home. Really helping.

She wont put on long treatment plans or waste your time.

Excellent staff. In & Out quick despite high volume of patients.

resp.text: Thank You

name: Ryan Gott
text: Dr. Jessica is fantastic! She is very knowledgeable, friendly, and kind. The staff creates a very welcoming environment and really care about each patient that comes in. I have felt comfortable there since my first day, and I have been coming back for two years now. Dr. Jessica has kept me healthy and feeling good!

name: Rebecca Ward
text: I am a Pennsylvania resident who recently was in Alabama visiting with my daughter and grandson.  My grandson is a patient of Dr. Dana and I had the privilege of being with  him on several of his visits with Dr. Dana.  I am overwhelmed by his caring demeanor and willingness to do what's best for my grandson.  He explains the reasoning before each movement that he makes and has mentioned several times that he consults with other physicians and associates about my grandson's well being.  I am very thankful that Dr. Dana is in the Huntsville area and able to work with my grandson to aid in his recovery.

resp.text: Thank You for the kind words. Dr Dana

text: Both my four year old son and myself go for regular adjustments at the Jones Valley office. The staff is so friendly and welcoming each time we go! We love the results we have had from regular chiropractic care with Dr Jessica Davis! In addition to great care and a friendly staff, they are very accommodating and easy to work with for scheduling.

resp.text: Thank You for the kind words. Dr Dana

Absolutely love Dr. Dana and the whole staff!! Dr. Dana is an awesome doctor who not only wants to take care of your  aches and pains, but also enjoys sharing his knowledge along the way. I have sat in on his spinal class, and learned a lot.

Dr. Dana wants to make sure you are taking care of yourself outside of the his clinic, because he knows that good nutrition and exercise and stretching goes hand in hand with chiropractic care.

I highly recommend Dr. Dana and his staff at Millar Chiropractic in Jones Valley.

Daphene Cooke

text: Dr Dana is amazing!  I have been to chiropractors all my life and he is very cautious and finds all the sore spots and fixes the "cause". Just love his practice and all the wonderful ladies that work in the office.  Always feels like I've known them forever and that I'm a part of their awesome family!

text: Dr. Jess and her staff are amazing. I came here for help with my herniated discs in my lower back in April. name: Nathan Wienhoff
text: I am extremely pleased with the care/treatment that I've received from Dr. Jessica Koelker-Davis at Millar Chiropractic in Jones Valley.  She is very thorough and she listens to what is hurting you, then she comes up with a treatment plan to address your pain.  Being a fibromyalgia patient, I am extremely sensitive to even the lightest of touches on my tender points during a flare up.  Dr. Koelker-Davis is always very gentle with me and takes extra precaution not to press too hard on my tender points when she is adjusting me.  She does not use harsh adjustment procedures on me either but rather uses a tool to do gentle adjustments.  If you're a Fibromyalgia patient with back pain or any other type of chronic pain for that matter, I cant highly recommend her enough! I'm FINALLY getting some relief from my pain!

resp.text: Thank You

text: Growing younger is such a great medi spa! The atmosphere when I walk in is great and the staff is so nice and helpful. They have the best prices around and offer a wide variety of services. Definitely recommend!

text:
This place is amazing. Always clean and smells good. Staff is extra sweet, usually do not have to wait long, they have free coffee and water. Very nicely decorated. My sister and I travel together over two hours to go there. They always remember our names no matter how long it’s been since we have been there. The doctor is very nice and professional. My sister has had fillers and she looks 10 years younger. I have had laser treatment on my inner thighs and love handles and it really made a difference. We both get weight loss medication, adipex. It WORKS!! I can’t say enough good things about them.
You should come try them yourself!! :):):)

text: This place is the worst I had my laser treatment and did not get a result the also burnt my hand and the satisfaction for me was horrible if there were neagitive star I would give many negative stars never go to this place you will not be satisfied and when I went to get my money back the reaseptionist guy was very rude D NOT GO TO THIS PlACE ever!!!!!!!!!!

name: Amanda Valdez
text:
Amazing group of professionals! They are up to date on the latest beauty trends while also taking the time to continue to educate themselves on the ever changing technology and skin care. Not only can you schedule a visit for cosmetic enhancements and maintenance to LOOK younger, their massage therapists and esthetician can pamper you and make you FEEL younger. Do you hate shaving? If you’re up for the challenge, go see Lydia for Laser hair removal! It’s worth every penny!

They offer great monthly deals to make sure everyone has an opportunity to look and feel their best!

The staff, environment, and affordability easily makes this the best Medical Spa in Madison/Huntsville!

name: Jesse Lyons Live
text: I could not have had a better experience at Growing Younger Clinic! I was treated like royalty from the moment I walked in the door. The facility is laid out well, the decor is tasteful and warm, and most importantly the place is very clean. I knew I was in good hands from the moment I walked up to the front desk. Their prices on procedures are incredible comparatively to other med spas. I had Miradry performed, and paid literally half of what all the spas and doctors offices in my area charge. Dr. Jamey performed my anesthesia and made sure I was comfortable and well numbed. Lydia was the technician who performed the procedure and she was thorough at explaining and was very warm and friendly. I also had cool sculpting done, and Emory checked on me multiple times throughout the procedure to make sure I was doing fine. World class staff!! I was blown away. I'll be back to get more work done. It's worth the 7.5 hour drive!

name: C
text:
I scheduled an appointment for a facial, a month ago. Called the day before about the possibility of canceling.  She told me if I canceled then there is a 25.00 fee. I decided that I will take off work and go. I get there at 9:45  was told they couldn't  find my name and it was canceled anyway. Front desk staff on the phone and in office was rude and knew nothing about the lady working the afternoon before.  Had to reschedule and the next appointment is a month away. Might just have to pass and go somewhere else.
Edit to add that Tonya called me immediately to squeeze me in the next day. I couldn't get out of work again soo .

text: I have been going here for for laser hair removal and the results are great. The hair grows back much thinner and at a much slower rate. Even when the hair is somewhat visible, you can't feel it. It feels bare like baby skin. The staff are nice and I really like the woman that does my treatments.

name: Jonas B.
text: Kiss them wrinkles goodbye.  At a good price.

text: I got 6 laser treatments in my bikini area and within 3 months my hair is back. It did NOTHING. I also got coolslimming and they said it takes 4 months to see results and it didn’t work AT ALL. I will not spend a dime there ever again.

text: Have been here for a massage twice now and they have both been great.

text: I initially went there for 8 i-lipo treatments manly for skin tightened in my abdomen area; and the young lady encourage me to get CoolSculpting done instead very polite staff great atmosphere the only thing that I didn't care for is after the CoolSculpting procedure she did not massage the area where the CoolSculpting was
