text: I went to get a microdermabrasion treatment there last week, mind you I have had several before but just moved to Huntsville and was hoping to find a place I could go and have one every few months... the woman who did mine was beyond RUDE ! She spoke maybe 5 words to me and I’ve never had such a harsh treatment the towels they use are not soft and she rubs your face like she’s scrubbing clothes! I will never return to this spa if you can call it that .. don’t expect anything nice if you go!! If I could rat them a 0 I would... AWFUL experience ! Go anywhere else but here!!!!!

name: Laura Gummel
text: Upscale facility, friendly staff and highly recommend. Will return for another massage.

name: MyLifeAsMycah
text: I've been going to Growing Younger for the last 7 months. I stumbled upon them on Groupon and took up an offer for laser hair removal. As an AA woman, I can attest that this place provides wonderful results. Amanda is my laser specialist and she is amazing. Definitely give them a try!

name: Christy Tallant
text: I absolutely love the services that I have received at Growing Younger. I am going on my second week of services with them. Since I have been going I have seen a dramatic change in my appearance. Their staff is well trained and is willing to answer any questions you have. I love the fact that when you walk into the building they welcome you with a smile and a hello. Darlicia always has a smile on her face. She is very knowledgeable and helpful during my procedures. I would recommend Growing Younger to all my friends.

name: Angela Drensek
text: I have been going to Growing Younger for just over a year now.  I have had Microderm Abrasions, Facials, skin tag removal, and laser hair removal.  My face texture is completely different than it was a year ago.  Their trained staff teaches you how to take care of your skin offering advice and wonderful products.  My makeup goes on better, and sometimes I don't even wear any makeup - the change has been that dramatic.  I have micros and facials once a month and have been doing so for the past year.  I have also undergone laser hair removal and after 6 appointments I have great results.  Being dark headed this is a life changing improvement.  I had my legs and underarms done - it is great not to have to shave.  I highly recommend Growing Younger.

name: Nilda Rivera
text: The staff  needs to ask more info on the phone prior to your appointment.  When you get there they tell you the doctors only there Thursday .

name: Kristin Barnett
text: I had a microdermabrasion facial. It was awesome. They had me in right on time and the girl was very nice and professional. My skin felt wonderful!!! I also had the B12 shots and was able to walk in and out with virtually no wait time.

name: Terri Thompson
text: Was badly burned by esthetician and received permanent damage during laser hair removal in 2015. No remedial action was taken on the clinic's part so I had to file complaints with BBB, Alabama Board of Cosmetology and because the owner is a chiropractor, had to file a complaint with the Alabama Board of Chiropractic Examiners. He was put on 5 years probation and fined several thousand dollars for unprofessional conduct and for performing services outside the scope of a chiropractic license--if the fine isn't paid by the deadline, his license will be suspended for that period of time. Do not recommend this clinic for laser services. None of my expenses (doctor, cosmetics, or even the botched laser service) were reimbursed by the clinic.

name: Ciearra Jackson
text: Enjoyed the staff and the service! Everyone was so friendly and efficient. The environment is so inviting. I didn't have just tremendous results with iLipo, but then again I did not increase my physical activity. However, the staff was great during the process, and I felt very informed about the procedure. I have a message waiting, and I can't wait to have some time away from work to use it. I definitely recommend Growing Younger to anyone in the Huntsville area.

name: Nyla Blakley
text:
Staff so friendly and reassuring. Everyone is so professional and I highly recommend.
Anything from weight loss, facial, massage, chiropractic and great advice on health products.

name: Malinda Powers
text: Hot flashes and night sweats are gone!  Easy treatment.  I can't believe that I struggled with them for 3 years when this was so easy.

name: Kanetha Jackson
text: Always have amazing results after Botox treatments!

name: Sandra Wilson
text:
Had a special running.
I had originally wanted an anti aging facial.
Tech talked me out of it, because of my skin condition. Opted for microdermabrasion.
She paid more attention to my forehead..didnt go near my folds around my nose.
Be prepared to fill out your medical life on paper, and then have them not look at it.
We did not do a full hour, which was the time that was suppose to be allotted.
As soon as the tech was tipped, she be lined to the employees office.
Certainly didnt feel very welcome or appreciated for my patronage.

name: Olivia Colvin
text:
I love this place! Think I stumbled upon this gem from Groupon originally. The staff is friendly, the place is impeccably clean every visit (I’ve been here about 6-7 times now.) Thus far I have only used their b-12 shots spartically for managing my anemia, but I love that I can get in and out every time, no appointment and longest I’ve ever waited was maaaybe five minutes! They offer unique monthly specials for a wide variety of services (massages, shots, facial treatments, non invasive body contouring) and never ever try to upsell me anything. I wish they offered more vitamin injection options, but that’s just me.

For the record, I am pretty sure that I have brought anywhere from one to three children with me at any given time and never once has the staff been rude or unwelcoming in the least (or maybe I just have that “Don’t even think about it” look down better than I thought!) I appreciate that as a mother I don’t get annoyed looks from the staff just for walking in the door.

Definitely looking forward to continuing my visits here for b12 and thinking about trying other treatments/services with this place in the future!

name: Amber Litteken
text: Everyone is very professional. Lazer hair removal is 100% worth it.

name: A. Zachery
text: I called to see if I could reschedule my appointment because I didn't want to be late, but I couldn't. The Groupon had already been redeemed by the business and there was a 24 hour cancellation policy. I understand the policy but why was my Groupon redeemed before services were rendered. When I finally got there through traffic, they said that I would only have 20 minutes for a massage.  I politely said ,"Thats okay, it's been a long week and my birthday is tomorrow. Dont worry about it."  So I left and I was a little hurt by the customer service I had received at this point and I went back in to ask if they were apart of the BBB, because at this point I saw where this was going.  The young lady at the front was really rude toward me and so was the man who is a massage therapists. I have scoliosis and I was looking for some relief for my birthday. I'm African American and I am just wondering if I wasn't, if it would've made a difference at all. I called to ask about the policy because I want to be treated fairly. The phone disconnected while I was asking and when I called back it went to voicemail. I called back from a different number and the phone was answered then it was passed to a man works there and he was even more rude than the young lady working at the front. I was in shock how fast he got annoyed with me and I wasn't being disrespectful at all. He then said that if I called back he would file harassment charges against me, then hung up me in my face. As a first time customer, I felt like I was treated really badly. I will not be going back to this business EVER AGAIN and I pray that justice is served for how I was treated.

name: Cassandra Henry
text: I have truly enjoyed Growing Younger for several services. I recommend Growing Younger to ALL my colleagues and friends.  Darlicia and Trista and just simply amazing. They made me feel so comfortable.  My husband comments every day that he notices the results of the ilipo ultra!!  I cannot express enough how much I value the experience I've had at Growing Younger.

name: Daphne Tabis
text: I visited Growing Younger a few times for i-Lipo treatments. I was very impressed by the friendly staff; they were professional, knowledgeable, and willing to answer all of my questions. I appreciated the appearance/ decor and cleanliness of the facilities. I look forward to future visits.

name: cecilia uselton
text: Trista is AWESOME!  I've had facial treatments at Growing Younger and it is a GREAT place to go.  Staff is nice and helpful.

name: Kaitlyn Gregg
text: I got the microdermabrasion. I found a Groupon and it was only $26 so I decided to give it a try. Overall, as this being my first facial I was not impressed and probably won't be back. A lady named Tonia did my facial. She wasn't knowledgeable about the products she was using. When I asked her questions, I got very blunt answers. After she cleansed my face, she dried it with what felt like a paper towel, and I don't know about y'all but a paper towel being scraped across your face after you just had a "vacuum" scrape it, is not comfortable. The microdermabrasion part itself was fine. But the before and after how she cleansed and dried my face was not ideal. I feel like they used very low quality moisturizers and lotions. I was surprised they didn't use any serums.

name: Jennifer Chesser
text: I have recieved B12 shots at Growing Younger and I couldn't be happier.  I have noticed I have been more energized.  The staff is wonderful and friendly.  I definitely recommend Growing Younger.

name: Pamela Hideko
text: Ashley is awesome. She microbladed my brows today & they look amazing!!

name: Sylvia Ortega
text: I had some I lipo treatments done there and every time I went the staff was friendly and beyond helpful! Growing younger is always up to date with the lastest treatments, etc and the facilities are always well maintained! I know they always have amazing promotions going on and I definitely will be back to try some of their other services!

name: Alicia Chambers
text: Growing younger has become my favorite place to visit. I've received peels, microdermabrasion, and B12 shots. The staff is so friendly, they make you feel so welcome. Trista is my favorite! I would highly recommend their services. They've also worked me in the on the day I called for a treatment. I return as often as I can. Great monthly specials and groupons as well.

name: Pamela Beckwith
text: Very pleased with service and the professionalism and kindness the staff offers.

name: Amber Harwell
text: I have received Botox plenty of times. My first experience with Growing Younger was a month ago and I received what they recommended I needed which was twice as much as I normally got at my other doctor. After a month I noticed that it was already wearing off. So I go back in and Dr. Wagner seemed very frustrated and stormed off and came back with Botox to fix the problem. I have never felt such pain while receiving Botox and hours later I still have a terrible headache. I’m pretty sure he took his frustration out on my forehead! Not only did I think their Botox was deluted but they also overcharged me $111.00. They charged me for 10 extra units that I never recieved. When I mentioned my refund they wanted to do a “store credit”. After refusing the store credit Dr. Wagner said “Well what do you want??” I replied my money back on my card! He refunded my money and I nicely said thank you. He replied yep and I walked out. Such a rude and awkward visit! I can’t believe he actually thought I would want to return back to use my $111 of store credit after he acted the way he did.

name: Tim Jordan
text:
Unprofessional treatment, they are nice till they get your money then treat unprofessional.
personal experience without going into much detail, but i would not recommend them to anyone

name: GiGi
text: Really friendly staff & their Groupons make it affordable for me!

name: Jennifer McCoy
text: The staff at the Growing Younger office was great. The specials that are offered are great!

name: Debra Mears
text: Went in because I noticed the Botox walk in Thursday flags and was about to leave in a couple weeks for my 60th Birthday trip. I got Botox and Juvederm done on my face. I would NEVER go back there or recommend them for either treatment. I had to go back a week later because the side of my mouth was caving in and they added more Juvederm. They said they had used a full syringe on me which I don't believe because the last place I had it done only used a half with better results! The BIG problem is  they said they used 40 units of Botox which last time I only got 20, they did not ask how many units I wanted! My eyes are practically closed and I can't open them. You can't see my eyelids at all and I can't raise my eyes up. Instead of looking better for my trip I looked awful with my nearly closed eyes. Everyone that knows me asked what did you do to your eyes??? Thank GOD Botox does not last to long and I'm praying this is a temporary result that will go back to normal. I thought they would be cheaper but they were the same price as my plastic surgeon only faster to walk in. I will wait to get an appointment with a professional surgeon next time. Not worth messing with my vision!

name: Crissy Thompson
text: Horrible customer service and very unfriendly.. I would give them a 0 if I could...

Had three microdermabrasion facials and they were absolutley wonderful,  My felt face soft and refreshed,  Staff members are very professional,
definatley will be back,

I just had my 4th procedure and I feel fantastic. I have recommended Growing Younger and the hormone replacement to many of my friends.

name: Chelsea Rand
text: The place to go for waxes. Manon is INCREDIBLE. She is so sweet and patient. I went here for my first brazilian wax and she made me so at ease. Ever since then I have returned for all my waxing needs. If you are looking for a place to get waxed definitely try Manon!

name: Lauren Rogers
text: I went for the first time to get a Brazilian wax, the woman was very friendly however I have had many Brazilian waxes other places that were great. She did not seem very knowledgeable about what she was doing, she gave me no after care instructions, I’m pretty sure she double dipped the sticks she was using... and worst of all after she was done I was so extremely sticky which has never happened before. She did give me some wax removal lotion to use but honestly it did not really work. I would not recommend this place for waxing as it seemed unprofessional and not to mention unclean. I would recommend European wax center over this place, much more professional, clean, and knowledgeable.

resp.text: Hi Lauren, thank you for taking the time to leave us feedback. We're sorry to hear about your unpleasant experience at our salon. The satisfaction of our guest is our number one priority. We are committed to providing a clean and safe environment. Our therapists have many years of experience. Please reach out to us at (334) 826-3060 and we would be happy to talk.

name: Emily Finck
text: I was very skeptical of waxing until I walked in to very clean spalon, and Manon made me feel immediately at ease.  She walked me through the whole process and now she has been waxing me for over 2 years.  They have a very friendly staff, who are always accommodating to whatever I need done, and now my daughter gets her hair cut there as well!  They offer many services in a relaxing atmosphere, and I would recommend anyone to Ambiance!!

She has also done all of my facials and I can admit that she has helped control my adult acne and calm down irritation. Joe is wonderful if you need a deep tissue massage. He helped work out tension and aches I have from sitting in a chair all day hunched over a computer. Everyone at the spa is nice and welcoming. You wont regret going and will be fully satisfied with the services you receive.

text: The staff is very friendly and it is a very clean place. However, I came in to get my eyebrows done and left VERY disappointed in the results. I had to keep myself from crying after I left. I was asked to begin with if I wanted them to be thinned or if I just wanted them cleaned up and I told her that I did not want them thin. Well, they are now extremely thin and they look terrible. I didn’t complain in person, because there was really nothing that could be done. I will definitely not be back though.

name: Abbie Lane
text: I'm  regular with Manon. She's so fast, and does a great job! I've never had a bad experience! I would not go anywhere else. Customer service is GREAT!!!!

name: Emily Daleo
text: I received a certificate for a massage for Christmas and decided to go ahead and schedule the massage. They made the appointment for 3:00 on a Friday. On Wednesday, they called to tell me that they had double booked my appointment, and ask me to come in at a different time on Friday. I was not able to come in at that time, so I had them schedule an appointment for the next Friday at 3:00. When I walked into the spa, I was told that I was not on the schedule. They don't send confirmations of your appointment, and they don't call to remind you of your appointment. Apparently, they really just have trouble booking your appointment at all. Not exactly the kind of experience I want from a spa, and I won't be trying to reschedule again.

resp.text: This was an unfortunate event that we took very seriously. We issued a complete refund of the gift certificate and offered a free 90 minute massage. All clients who are on our schedule receive either a text message or phone call the day before their appointment. We take pride in giving the very best customer service.

name: Valentina Muzaric
text: Colleen is absolutely great. She is putting a lot of thoughts in how to get desired outcome without damaging your hair. She is the one to go to. Everybody is really nice and outgoing.

name: Brandi Wilson
text: Everyone was very nice. I got a Brazilian wax and she made me feel very comfortable, with such a uncomfortable waxing. 😊

name: Alex Woods
text: love all the staff ! Everyone here is very nice , helpful , and professional . 10/10 would recommend !!!

name: Teresa Butler
text: I went to see Matt because of my neck and shoulder pain. He was able to me to be able to move my neck. I always go see him when my hip acts up. Matt is very professional and listens to your concerns. Thanks Matt for great service!

name: Elizabeth Bailey Matson
text: I went to have a trial of my hair and make up and it took 2 hrs for my hair alone and I was not happy with the outcome. I had scheduled to have my hair and make up done, but they had to rush the make up and would have cancelled the trial if I hadn't persisted that I wanted to see the whole picture before my wedding. They hadn't booked enough time from the beginning. I wanted natural looking makeup, but it is caked on and not flattering. I went here after I saw all the positive reviews, but I did not have a positive experience! I'm so glad I tried before my wedding day as the whole thing stressed me out and it's not even the big day!

resp.text: At Ambiance it's our goal to make every Bride feel and look beautiful on her wedding day! During the consultation we strive to find the best hair and make up style with the client for her Big Day. The trial run is very important to us and sometimes it takes longer than anticipated because we want the client to be happy. Therefore, we offer a second complementary trial run! We regret you were not satisfied and we hope you will come back for your complementary trial run to perfect your look.

name: Marina Schroeder
text: I went in for a wax, the facility gives an outward appearance of being very clean and calming, and the employees are all very pleasant, however they double dip the wax! By this I mean they put the same stick that they've put on your body back into the wax (which is not hot enough to kill bacteria that resides on your skin), and unless they change the wax every time a new customer comes in (unlikely, and very expensive), you're getting everyone else's microorganisms on your body, yuck! Not only is this extremely unhygienic and disgusting, it's also illegal. Will not be returning here.

resp.text: Here at Ambiance Spalon we are committed to offering you the cleanest experience in town. We sanitize every room and every utensil after every service. Double dipping is a No No! When you come to Ambiance we guarantee a safe environment for all our customers.

name: Crazy Christy
text: Very nice service very nice salon keep up the good work

name: Jasmine Williams
text: My first time ever getting a Brazilian wax this is where I decide to go; however I waited until I’d gone a few more times before writing this review. They use a special “wax” called Nufree-Finipil which you can research on your own. The facility is very relaxing & clean. Ms. Manon is EXCELLENT! She’s very friendly & will talk to you throughout the wax to keep you distracted. No bumps, no burns from the wax, & no regrowth for at least 2 weeks! Could not have asked for a better experience!!

name: david baker
text: Ive been getting my hair cut by Matthew since I was about 6 years old. Im 24 now and he's the only person I let cut my hair. My cut is called "the usual?". Hand shakes coming and going and always a smile with a good story to follow. All in all, its a quick, enjoyable and quite relaxing experience everytime I go.

name: Kassie Mink
text: Manon is absolutely wonderful!! She made waxing a relaxing and pain free experience.

name: Jade Dawson
text: Manon is the best! I was so nervous and afraid waxing was going to hurt. She put me at ease and it did not hurt at all. I highly recommend her to everyone!

I had never had a wax before in my life, and Manon was so great! I've also had my hair done by a couple of the girls in the salon and everyone is awesome! i can't wait to try out everything else Ambiance has to offer!

text: My daughter really likes this place. The people there are really nice and they did a great job on her make up for the prom last year.

text: I went to Ambiance Spalon for the first time this afternoon and had an excellent experience. I had an appointment with Manon, who was incredibly sweet and helpful! I would definitely recommend them and plan on returning!

name: Sharon Sparks
text: I made an appointment on Valentines Day, Feb 14, 2013. I had never been to Ambiance Spalon before. However, Laura Beth that is a hair & color stylist had done my hair for 8 years when I lived in Rome, Ga from 2003-2011. I was moving to Charleston, Sc and she was moving to Auburn, Al. Although I was excited to be moving to Charleston I wasn't excited about having to find a new hair stylist. Every time she would do my hair when I would get home my husband would always say your hair looks nice. When she was No longer doing my hair it looked nice but I never got the compliments that I use to get when Laura Beth was doing my hair. Every time I would go get my hair done I would think I sure wish Laura Beth was still doing my hair i missed her. My husband started looking for a new job and we found out we were moving to Newnan,Ga. I started thinking, I wonder how far she is from where I was moving to. I got on Mapquest and it was 76 miles. I didn't care, it was worth every mile I drove for her to be doing my hair again. Ambiance is a very nice place and everyone there is very friendly. I met the owners that day and they are really nice. You won't regret going to Ambiance and getting Laura Beth to do your hair. Best decision I ever made to drive 76 miles to get my hair done. Worth every mile.

name: Lisa Ballew
text: Chassity Bullard is the best hair dresser in town. I have been using her for YEARS. She's worth the 2.5 hour drive from north Alabama!! Thanks girl!! <3

text: Ambiance Salon is the absolute best place to go for hair, nails, and awesome body massages.

text: Very professional and clean. Monan did a great job on my waxing services!

text: I have been coming to Chassity for 7 years and have always leave feeling like a rockstar. I have Puerto Rican hair and very thick hard to manage hair and she always takes the time to make me beautiful! I have been to multiple salons over the years and each time I felt like my hair looked worse coming out than going in until I met her! I will follow her where ever she goes and absolutely love Ambiance Spalon. It is a great place to visit and love the staff and atmosphere. I have and always will recommend Chassity for all your haircutting, coloring and waxing needs. Ambiance also offers other services such as massage, facials, pedicures, and manicures. Making it the perfect one stop shop salon.

text: This is gracie.. im chats cousin and she's been doing my hair and eyebrows forever and I'd never go anywhere else honestly she does such an amazing job!

name: Christina Knight
text: I made an appt. today and everyone was very nice!  I will be back.  Thanks!!!

name: Angie LaBerge
text:
I'm researched hair salons for a month when I moved here and decided to try Ambiance! Wow,, Colleen is amazing!! I love the care, advice and the time she gives to me & more importantly, to my hair. And before you walk out the door you'll feel like you've been her friend for years. She's an amazing stylists and has an awesome personality!!  Unless she relocates,,,Im a client 4ever!!!
I also get brazillian wax & eyebrows! Super job! Everyone is very friendly & I feel comfortable & relaxed everytime I go in for my appts.

name: Shawn Reaves
text:
WORST SPA EXPERIENCE OR LACK THEREOF THAT I HAVE EVER HAD!!!

I made an appointment for a brazilian wax Friday morning because they had a great web special going for $39, upon which I specifically asked the owner did they do guys and was it ok. The owner said not a problem and let the receptionist make the appointment for Tuesday of the following week. On Monday I get a call around noon and informed they do not do guys and that she was "sorry"....Why did she make the appointment in the first place?

Now I tried to call around Auburn but no one has any appointments open for the the next day on such short notice. Now their policy is to deduct half the price of your service if you give them less than 24 hours notice, yet what do I get when they give me less than 24 hours notice....nothing!!! The point is I counted on them to provide a service that they said they would and now Im left having to travel out of town possible to get waxed.

A word of advice to Ambiance Spalon...if your going to advertise you might want to say no guys or girls only on your ad so in the future this doesnt happen!! And how about reimbursing me for the extra money I had to pay someone else for waxing because I relied on your business.

name: Holland Jo
text:
Posting this for someone else.

Do not give these people your business. They will charge you more than advertised and their staff is incompetent. They are deceptive, purposely or not, about what they're actually doing to your hair. They won't give you the right color if you're getting it dyed. They use products that will ruin your hair. Some workers will literally rip some of your hair out trying to brush it. Just woefully incompetent and a terrible business overall. I can't speak for their massages but based on this absolutely terrible experience, these people deserve to go out of business.

text: I strongly advise making sure you know who you are booking with. I saw Ckim’s ig. Loved her work and made the call. The person on the phone said yea we put you down in the books. Again, I called to book an appointment with CKIM (Chanelle) however when I arrived someone else was my stylist. That’s cool as long as my hair is done correctly. Well, it wasn’t. My style of choice was a sleek ponytail. I paid $88 for a beautiful bundle of Barbie curl and $50 for the style. I told her before leaving that I felt insecure and asked her if she could spray more holding spray on the style. She sprayed a tiny bit more. However, the style didn’t last a week. I did tie it down everyday. Didn’t exercise. The ponytail broke in half after 3 days and the swoop moved everyday. The stylist Kierra put glue all over the bundle so, I can’t reuse it. Basically money gone down the drain. Chanelle is very kind and professional. From what I saw she makes sure her clients are satisfied before leaving. Just make sure that when you call, you are booking with Ckim (Chanelle) and not accepting any other stylist.

text: The atmosphere was great,my husband took me here last month for Mother's Day for a 1hr massage.Felt great until towards the end the lady who didn't speak English good think her name was Cici started requesting for a tip before she was done massaging me,and kept assisting about a tip while I was waiting for my husband to pick me up.Although he did give her a generous tip very generous,it just changed my mood after really enjoying myself until the hassle started.Everything turned to just about the tip and made me uncomfortable,not sure if I will be back.

text: Do not let them force you to give them a tip. The lady at the front desk that doesn’t speak good English will try and make it seem like you’re suppose to leave it tip but it is OPTIONAL. One of the ladies who did the massage came out to see what was going on and told us the tip was optional but the lady behind the desk said something to her in their language along the lines of “no no I got it we need to get a tip” but just no it’s optional just like any other place. Will not be coming back!

resp.text: I'm not sure where to start.. we can't apologize enough for our employee.  This is her last warning before being fired.  We try to run a professional therapeutic massage. Asking for tips are not our  protocol. We are sincerely sorry for your experience.  This will not happen again.. Thank you for bringing it to our attention.

I would recommend her to anyone.  Sande and her mother Ginger Laverty are "THE" massage therapists in town.
Also, having several massages from various therapists sande is very willing to adjust to your comfort level so because client/therapist feedback is important if you want her to increase pressure all you do is say increase pressure and she is amazing at Deep tissue.  Thank you.

name: Jeffery Hudson
text: I called ahead and set up an appointment and came in on my scheduled day and did a bit of computer stuff and went on my way to get seen. My chiro came in and examined me and asked me some questions and had me do some twist and turns and gave me their diagnosis, which was confirmed by x-ray! They were knowledgeable about what I was going through and setup treatment. I received relief almost instantly! I would highly recommend this place if you're in pain.

name: Ms. B
text:
Initially, my physician recommended me to a Physical Therapy establishment in Montgomery, AL for a knee injury that was sustained due to an accident.

After 5 weeks of PT at the initial establishment that was referred by my Dr., I had no change in my knee injury.

I was still in constant pain when walking, climbing stairs, prolonged standing, etc.

I thought that my mobility could not be fixed.

When I followed up with my Dr., I explained to him that I was still in pain and my mobility had not improved at all after my first round of PT with the initial establishment that was recommended.

I explained to him that I would like another round of PT but this time with Hart and Spine. My physician stated, “You’re unlikely to respond to PT a second time since it didn’t work for you the first time. “ I stated to him, “I’d still like to have one more round of PT with Hart and Spine.”

After one week and two sessions of PT with Tyson at Hart and Spine, my knee feels amazing. I can walk up stairs pain free, I can stand for long periods of time like I did before my injury. I can exercise and jog a little too. Also, I’ve seen all of the Chiropractors at Hart and Spine for my back and neck and they are all great at what they do as well. Drs. Hart, McMillian and Weber are the best in my opinion. Also, they learn your name during the first visit. Dale is an awesome tech and makes you feel right at home. The ladies and gentlemen at the front desk are ALWAYS nice and professional as well. Overall this establishment is a great place if you are in need of good Chiropractic and PT care.

name: LaDonna Patton
text: Professional, knowledgeable staff. Quick appointment scheduling. Available appointments later on some days. On-time appointments. Use of modern technology for checking in. Providers who LISTEN to help get the relief you need. What else do you need? Both my husband & I use this practice. Highly recommend.

resp.text: So sweet LaDonna :) Thank you!

name: Chris Prickett
text: This practice is very professional and provides impeccable care. Dr. McMillan was very thorough and I regret not going to get checked out sooner.

name: Juanireen “Mamareen” Trahan
text: Dr. Hart, along with his staff, are by far the best chiropractic group I've ever used. Their caring and concerned for your well-being exceeds standards in my book. Thanks for the quality of care you give.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words Juanireen!

name: Brian Barber
text: Simply the best chiropractic/rehabilitative team around. Dr. Hart and staff listen and genuinely care for the people they treat. The work they do is nothing short of miraculous.

name: nickole Edwards
text: Dr.Hart and his staff are amazing and considerate. Dr. Hart takes the time to fully understand what is causing you pain and works out a plan of action to help relieve some if not all discomfort. Thanks Dr. Hart!

resp.text: We are so glad you are feeling better! Thank you for the review!

name: Tara Gibson
text: If you are looking for a chiropractor whose goal is to educate you on the things that negatively impact your situation and educate you on how to incorporate things that will help you so that you keep an active lifestyle doing the things you enjoy, Dr. Hart is the chiropractor for you.  I have a hard time relaxing during an adjustment which impacts how successful it can be.  I feel very comfortable during my adjustments.

name: Helen Carroll
text: Excellent chiropractor  - very thorough, listens to my symptoms, asks questions and is always upbeat and encouraging.  Very  appreciative that he had an opening to see and adjust my daughter who was visiting from out of state. I highly recommend Dr. Hart and his great staff.

resp.text: Thank you Helen!

name: Mint Studios
text: I highly recommend this practice. Very professional, efficient, and thorough. My first experience with visiting a chiropractor and it was a great first experience.

resp.text: Jessica, thank you so much for your kind words! Our patients are our priority and we love knowing that it is displayed in our actions. :)

name: Connor Price
text: Very friendly atmosphere. Friendly and helpful staff. Dr. Hart is very attentive, has a warm and friendly personality. He is gentle and takes the time to find out the needs of his patients! Great people!!

name: Brittany Truitt
text: I have never received such fast, friendly care. From check-in to getting back in my car to leave was a maximum of 20 minutes. You not only leave feeling better than when you came in, but you leave feeling like you are their only patient. One thing I absolutely love is that I can see a chiropractor, physical therapist, and massage therapist all in one place. Dr. Hart & Dr. McMillian are both amazing. They listen to your concerns, walk you through the process, and put your fears at ease. If you are in the market for a great group of providers, this is the place to go!

name: Jessica Prockup
text: I've been seeing Dr. Hart for a long time. He and his staff are always very kind and efficient. The wait is never long, and I'm always greeted with a smile. Dr. Hart is a great doctor and he is compassionate as well.

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) Thank you Adonica!

(Original)
Thank you Adonica!

text: Dr. Hart is amazing. As a child I had bad experiences with a chiropractor that left me very leery of chiropracty as a whole, but after hurting my back this week I felt I didn't have a choice. Before I left my pain had greatly improved.  I would highly recommend him to anyone.

text: Feeling great. After several weeks struggling with some lower back pain, I feel I am finally on the road to recovery. Thanks goes to my super hero chiropractor, Dr. Jason Hart at Hart Spine and Rehab and the Therapeutic Massage Therapist in his office, William (he will make you want to go back every day). If you are in need of some serious help with pain, Dr. Hart is your guy. He is the best chiropractor I have ever been to. Went to Dr, Hart for migraines several years ago but lost track of him when he relocated. So glad to have found him again. He does wonders for my migraines too!

text: Dr. Hart I love how he takes your ailment and alleviate the discomfort. The staff is always happy to help and fun!! ❤❤
