name: Scott Kilpatrick
text: While traveling, I found myself in desperate need of a massage due to stiffness from travel and being tense from the stress of sitting in a conference room all week. I was able to book an appointment with Jenae and she immediately got right to work on my problem areas and even identified some knots and sore spots I was not aware of. After the massage and a good night's rest, I felt restored and balanced. I highly recommend this business.

resp.text: Thank you Scott.  I'm happy I could help.  Hope to see you next time you're in town.

text: I go to Stellar Massage every time I visit my daughter.  It is the highlight of my trip and I'm not sure I'd be up to the drive home if I didn't. They all took time to talk to me and get to know my needs for themselves and I feel like they all tailor the massage to my particular needs and what I like.  If you want a good massage, this is the place to go.

Jenae

name: Tiki Torch
text: Belittling clients and rude customer service from the owner. **upate: I have seen the response from the owner, and I will let the consumer decide what they think* she said "anything that you bring up staff, they think it has been cleared with me" which is (in my opinion) not a good business plan. I asked for a $20 gift card (MY FIRST AND LAST TIME EVER ASKING FOR ONE) expecting to recieve a card that simply had $20 loaded on it, like normal, and her staff chose to give me $40 because of my usual discount. It is not my job as a new consumer to know what is and isn't allowed, and there is a very polite way to go about doing it, coming from a family that owns 3 very successful businesses, I don't think TEXTING ME IN A GROUP MESSAGE AT 1:09 A.M. accusing me of taking advantage of her is the way to do it. But if that's good customer service to you, then I redact my statement. Otherwise, I'd reccomend a massage therapist that brings more relaxation than stress to your life.

resp.text:
This is my daughter-in-law's brother's girlfriend whom I had allowed to come in to receive massage at half price. This is because I let her know that that courtesy did not extend to buying gift certificates to give to others.

Edited... I did not initially say she took advantage, only told her that the courtesy did not extend to gift certificates she gave away. After receiving a defensive reply saying she didn't ask for the discount I explained that she did not come in as a client, but on the same level as family members so the staff assume she has cleared it through me first and to please run it by me first in the future. Yes, I did include her boyfriend in the text because he was the one who asked if I would extend the FAMILY discount to her.

My error was extending the family discount too far to someone I didn't know and allowing this personal drama to cross over to business. I would gladly let it drop, but I feel I have to respond to this public posting.

name: Kaitlyn Long
text: Awesome massage by Kate! Highly recommend the deep tissue massage my sore muscles feel fantastic!

resp.text: Thank you Kaitlyn for sharing, so happy Kate was able to help you.

name: Shauna Hadley
text: Tried to call them to make an appointment and was put on hold for 10+ minutes. I tried calling back and they did it again for a total of over 20+ minutes. Apparently they are doing well enough that they don't need new clients.

resp.text:
**UPDATED 5/13/17. I have signed up for a directory service to give clients direct access to an appointment specialist or to me. Hopefully the recorded options won't just annoy people.

I apologize for the extended hold time.  I understand how frustrating it is to be left on hold and am so sorry you experienced it when calling us.  I contacted my answering service to find out why you were left on hold so long and to find out if this is a regular thing and I'm just now finding out about it.  What I found out is that what you experienced is not common.  I'll try to explain why it happened below.  Please note; it's an explanation, not an excuse.

The answering service was able to determine which number called twice and was left on hold, so I have your number, but I don't want to call you in case the call would be unwelcome.  I'd like to make it up to you by offering 30 minutes free to make up for the hold time.   Once again, I'm terribly sorry and will try to limit the chances of it happening again.

(1) Not all their operators can make appointments for us.  Our answering service does not just take messages,  they give information, make appointments, and take credit card information.  In order to keep errors down, they have certain people who are allowed to make appointments and take credit card info, so when you call and want more than information, and one of those people is on the phone, you will have to wait until one of them is free.

We keep our prices competitive with independents rather than spas by not paying for a receptionist.  Our clients have consistently said they'd prefer to wait 2 min on hold with our service than get my voicemail and have to wait for me to call back (The average hold time when one of our specialists is not available is 1.9 min.  Most of the time someone can take the call right away.)

(2)  They had a couple of our appointment specialists call in sick, so the pool of people who could take your appointment was reduced.

(3)  You called at 5:05:31 and 5:12:05.  Their peak call time is 4:30-5:30 and with several people out sick their hold time was longer than usual. As I said, I will try to make myself available during this time to reduce the likelihood of being placed on hold in the future.

Jenae

name: Chris Needham
text: Just a fantastic business. Well managed !

resp.text: Thank you for you review Chris. We're looking forward to your next visit.

name: Jonathan Floyd
text: First time massage...excellent experience. Very comfortable atmosphere and relieved so much tension...it's unreal.  Will be back and recommnending to others :-)  THANKS AGAIN!!!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the wonderful feedback and the email so I could fix the link to bring you here.  I'm glad I was able to make you feel better.  I look forward to your next visit....Jenae

name: aaron voyles
text: Sally was great. I left feeling much better than I have in a long time.

resp.text: Thank you Aaron for sharing your experience with Sally.  I'm glad she was able to help you and hope we will see you again soon.

name: Alan Moore
text: If you're looking for a team of extraordinarily skilled professionals who will help you feel better, this is the place to go. Whether for the occasional treat or recovering from an injury, they'll go above and beyond to help you.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words.  We're so happy you have had good experienced here and that you are part of our Stellar Massage Club.  We look forward to your next visit.

name: Libby Rogers
text: Very easy to schedule.  My therapist asked specific questions to determine my needs.  She did a combination of myofascial release and deep tissue.  She wa able to target my problem areas, provide relief and education to help me when day to day to decrease pain.  She was very professional. I would definitely recommend to someone new to massage or if you like deep tissue or have pain relief needs.

resp.text: Thank you Libby.  We try very hard to provide the best experience for each person and I really appreciate knowing that you were pleased with Kelly. We rely on feedback like yours to continue to grow our clientele and we greatly appreciate your sharing your experience here.

name: Bo Roper
text: I received a tandem massage from Jenae and April last week, and very much enjoyed it. They both were able to work deep and get to my problem spots that nobody has ever been able to work out before. They were also able to see how I work certain muscles, and the stresses they are under during the massage, which impressed me greatly. Especially April, in knowing the special circumstances with injuries I've had on my legs. I would highly recommend Stellar Massage to anyone, especially for deep tissue and neuromuscular therapy. If you tell them you want deep tissue, you're going to get an intense deep tissue massage. Which is exactly what I enjoy. I haven't tried them for a relaxation massage as of yet, but I plan on doing a couples massage with my wife very soon, and I'm certain it will be equally impressive.

resp.text: Thank you Bo, we were very happy to have you in.  It isn't very often we get to do a deep tissue tandem massage, and you certainly needed it! Feedback like yours is very important to us personally and to our business as it helps people choose a massage therapist and grow our clientele.  So, I'd like to thank you for your contribution in our expansion to a storefront next month!  I hope to see you and your wife very soon.

name: Deja Moore
text: I loved it Kate did.a great job.on me and my best friend we will definitely be going.back!

resp.text: She is quite wonderful.  I'm so glad you were happy.  I'll let Kate know you left her such a great review.  Thank you for letting people know how good she is, it will help her build her clientele here at Stellar Massage.

name: Lucynda Smith
text: I had a great Massage from Mary!!!  I highly recommend Stellar Massage!!!  This was my first visit but I will be back.

resp.text: Thank you for leaving feedback.  I'm so happy that you enjoyed your massage.  Mary is new to Stellar Massage and your letting people know how wonderful she is will be a great help in building her clientele.  It is greatly appreciated.

text: got an appointment right away at a convenient time for ME...Chris gave a great massage and really focused on my problem tension areas.

It always feels good to get a pat on the back and current feedback lets people know that we, and Chris, continue to give excellent service. Thank you so much.

name: Danielle Ledet
text: Patrick was fantastic! Very professional and did a great job. I will def be back!

name: bala chandar
text:
I went to stellar massage couple of times and got an email requesting to give a feedback.

They are very good professional massage therapists.

My first massage session was with Jenae Jeffers and that was excellent(5/5).Also, she taught me few terminologies before and after massage like trigger points,how it functions,what follow ups required at home to make it better(salt bath etc.).Yes,the lessons are free.

I would recommend to opt Jenae for the people who wants a very strong massage and ok to bear a little pain and relax for the entire week.

My second session was with Meredyth as Jenae was busy on that day.I would rate 4/5 as i had a nice massage but not completely satisfied.I was expecting to get stronger massage like the one i got from Jenae. But i know she did her best.
If you are a soft person who expects smooth massage,tranquility,100% relaxation and deep sleep,Meredyth is the right choice.

They are awesome not business oriented and i will visit them again.

-Bala.

resp.text: Thank you Bala for leaving honest feedback for us.  It's feedback like yours that helps people choose who they want to visit for relief or relaxation.  While I hire based on the deep tissue massage a therapist gives, I do not want every therapist to be the same, so it's good for people to know the differences between the therapists they can choose from.  We have more detailed information about each therapist on the about page of our website.  We look forward to your next visit.

name: Kerry Upton

(Later) Of course Google did nothing

name: Amanda Holmes
text:
I was having hip and leg pain and went looking online for a local massage therapist. I found Handz on Therapeuic and met Kathy.  My first massage she made me feel comfortable and was inquisitive as to my symptoms.  When I arrived for my 2nd appointment Kathy had done more research based on my symptoms and was able to pinpoint that I had issues with my lower back and recommended I see a dr.  Turns out she was spot on.
I am forever grateful to Kathy and how she cares for her customers.  She has reached out several times to check on me.   If you are looking for a wonderful Massage Therapist in the Cullman area you will not be disappointed here.
I’m already looking forward to another visit
Thanks Kathy. I couldn’t be happier I found you.

text: Brittini was great!! I truly needed a little bit of magic worked on very short notice and she was able to make time for me. I would highly recommend her to anyone!

text: Brittini is great! Very well versed in what needs to be done for you. That way you get the very best massage results. We will never go anywhere else..

name: Leema Lutfi
text: My friend and I got facial. TiAmber was our esthetician. She did amazing job and explained the process and product.  She seemed knowledgeable and welcoming.  Overall great experience.  Thank you

name: Des
text: I am highly disappointed with this location’s front-office service, specifically Debra. I had an appointment this evening at 5pm, but woke up experiencing illness so wanted to reschedule my appointment, especially in light of the Covid-19 climate we are still in. I called their office first thing (8am) and explained my illness to Debra and informed her I would like to reschedule. She gave me several run-arounds concerning why even though I was sick I could not reschedule. Even so much as stating the owners are the reason why if a patron feels ill they still have to be serviced. She then said half of my Massage Envy points banked for today’s service would be expensed because of the same day reschedule. I asked what concessions are made for feverish patrons. She said they are still required to show up and Massage Envy would take their temperature. I told her I would be going to the doctor’s office today and could provide an excuse. She said a manager would get back with me today, but no one ever contacted me. After having my suspicions proven that I had been lied to and no one would contact me, I called back to ask about what was the current status of my appointment/points. I was then informed the appointment was taken off the records and all of my points for today’s session had been expensed. I am extremely frustrated with their “customer care”. I feel lied to and with their “Covid protocols” that were exhibited today first-hand to me, I will NEVER feel comfortable patronizing them again. There is no telling how many patrons who have been ill (with or without fevers) have received service and unintentionally spread it to others with the help of this location’s policies. So much for this place being a standard of wellness services. I feel more stressed now after dealing with this than I did before. I wish I had NEVER booked anything with this location or had my home membership at this location.

name: Stephanie Hazen
text: I absolutely love coming here. As a single mom, I don’t have lots of money to spend on spa services. Because of massage envy I am able to spend a little time pampering myself. Whitney has done an absolute miracle on my face with products and chemical peels. I am so happy! With only one very light peel, about 75% of the dark spots I had from sun exposure are gone. The receptionist is absolutely wonderful. She works really hard to apply coupons and discounts whenever she can. The place has always been clean and welcoming. The staff is great. I did so a massage as well and it was very very relaxing. I got the membership and plan to make monthly visits.

resp.text: Thank you Stephanie, for your positive review of Massage Envy - Hoover. All Massage Envy locations are owned and operated by local franchisees who work hard to ensure guests and members are happy with the services they receive. We are so happy to hear you have had such a great experience.

name: Evyan Gallegos
text: Great communication with staff, felt really safe going in with all the covid-procedures.

resp.text: Reviews like this are important and it is greatly appreciated that you took the time to leave your positive feedback for Massage Envy - Hoover. Thank you, Evyan!

name: Maria
text:
Just had a massage. My experience was a 3/5 stars for the following:

1. There was a fan on me the entire time... For one hour, I was covered in oil (and naked with only a sheet covering me) with a fan on me in the middle of winter! I was almost shivering. The bed warmer was either not on or not working.... Bummer. Also, the light in the room was on the whole time... I like it dark and relaxing. Rooms need to be vacuumed.😞

2. My MT was clearly sick with something respiratory going on. Being that close and breathing over me sick was a major deterrent on a return visit. Not sure if he kept stopping the massage to wipe his nose or what but I've never had so many pauses in a massage. 😷I'm used to smooth continuous pressure/ touch during a massage except for when its time to turn. Also, no hot towels this time!!!😩

3. I feel like this particular chain is on the downhill... The past few times I've gone, you can never get the same therapist twice. It appears there is a lot of turnover here. It is noisy in the hallway out side of the room. I made sure to use all of my gift card so my friends and family can start giving me new gift cards to use somewhere new.😐

4. The receptionist stated she was going to look up my gift card towards the balance. I had two cards to use. She couldn't get them at first. Luckily, I had them on me.

*Overall, not a terrible experience but in Hoover, I have many other options to choose from for a good massage and I'll start seeking out those places next. For someone that splurges to have a massage 3 times/ year at most, my expectations were not met for the cost of services rendered.  Staff was friendly. MT gave a decent massage with good pressure (minus all the pauses).

resp.text: Hello Maria, thank you for letting us know about your experience at Massage Envy - Hoover franchised location. We encourage you to reach out to the franchised location through the online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW to express your concerns and allow them to help address these issues.

name: Tracy Durrett
text:
Quintette was great and I had a great massage. Debra was very nice and helpful. I also had a facial with Selena. She was late and I was suppose to have an hour and it was only 45 min at best. That included me changing and all. She never discussed products with me other than not to use an abrasive exfoliater on my checks.
She left the headband on and the bed raised up and I slipped getting down since it was still up. I would go back for the massage but would request someone different for a facial.

resp.text: Hello Tracy, on behalf of Massage Envy Franchising thank you for expressing your concerns and bringing this to our attention. Please reach out through the online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so this can be addressed.

name: Empty the Tanks
text: MJ was fantastic ! Great front desk staff!

resp.text: Thanks for your high star rating for Massage Envy - Hoover!

name: Angie Russell
text: Love it, I go for severe back and body pain. It helps tremendously

resp.text: Thanks for your high star rating for Massage Envy - Hoover, Angie!

name: Kameron Bell
text: Do not book an appointment here, I had a session set for my fiancées birthday, they called me the day of and told me that the person who was supposed to be doing the massage had quit and that they are gonna cancel my fiancées appointment, I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS LOCATION AT ALL, they are horrible!

resp.text: Hello Kameron, it’s regrettable to hear that you had a negative experience at your local franchised Massage Envy. We encourage you to reach out to the franchised location through the online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW to express your concerns and allow them to assist further.

name: J J
text: I got a massage for my husband as a gift for his birthday. The environment was comfortable and serene. As far as his his experience, he said his MT did an excellent job. There was one thing I didn't like and it was the young lady who asked about the membership.  No one wants to be asked that after a relaxing experience.  Maybe let the customer inquire about it first.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us a positive rating! We're delighted to hear that your husband had a great experience with our team! We appreciate your providing this information so we can improve upon our services.

name: Angeles Vo
text: I got a mysterious rash on my arms after a massage. I notified the receptionist who put a note in the system. I thought maybe I had a one time bad experience, since the rash seemed to go away, so I went back the following month. I got another rash but this time it spread up and down my arms. My doctor told me it looked like a fungal infection but to be safe she would refer me to a dermatologist. I got a doctors note stating I needed to refrain from massages until the dermatologist could determine what the rash was and if it was safe to go back. I took my doctors note and filled out a membership cancellation form. I noticed my monthly fee was withdrawn after I had submitted the form so I called. I was told my cancellation was denied because I needed a note from the dermatologist. I can’t get a dermatologist note for another month when I have my appointment but even so, why is my doctors note not enough? According to their cancellation policy a note from a doctor stating one cannot be massaged for medical reasons should suffice. The manager didn’t even have the decency to call me! I only found out because I called them. I am out $130 and still have one more month before my contract is up. Not to mention the doctor bills. Do not go here! Find a better place to get a massage.

resp.text: Massage Envy is committed to a safe and therapeutic environment. If you feel you have not experienced this at this franchised location, please reach out to the corporate Guest Relations team at guestrelations@massageenvy.com with the details of your experience for further assistance.

name: Cheryl Brewer
text: Not enough space for all the issues. Charter member. Joined 10 years ago. Decided in May 2019 it was in decline and too difficult to book due to incredible staff turnover. Also, the experience had become totally inconsistent. Still fighting them for my legitimate cancellation. When I requested cancellation in May I had TEN unused sessions (because they are so understaffed). Had to burn through those first. Sent in my paperwork and have the email in my SENT emails to prove it. They deny having any knowledge and are still billing me! Totally unprofessional. Avoid at all costs.

resp.text: Hello Cheryl, on behalf of Massage Envy Franchising thank you for expressing your concerns and bringing this to our attention. Please reach out through the online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so this can be addressed.

text: I read the reviews before coming in and was scared, but I had a gift card so I had nothing to lose. But the therapist, Quinette (not sure if that’s the name), was extremely nice as well as the woman at the front desk. So I had no complaints! She wasn’t pushy about buying a membership either. So I guess I was lucky and avoided those that everyone was complaining about. But I’d come back for Quinette!!

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave Massage Envy - Hoover a positive review! We’re happy to hear that you enjoyed your gift card, Stephanie!

resp.text: Hi Linda, thank you for the kind words and wonderful review! It brings us great joy to see our members and guests happy. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: ovetta morgan
text: I wish I could go every week so relaxing

resp.text: Hi, please do not hesitate to reach out if you have any questions for us! Thanks for rating us so highly!

name: Jennifer R James
text: Love this place. So glad to have found it. Have had a few different therapists & not disappointed with any of them.

name: ByDezire
text: This place is ridiculous! My girlfriend scheduled a day out for my birthday! She didn’t get the reminder phone call that they supposedly do. When she scheduled the appt. the woman told her to arrive A FEW MINUTES before to fill out paper work. We literally pulled up 10 mins late because of traffic. The girl at the desk told us since we were late the paperwork would cut into the massage by 30 mins and said it wouldn’t be worth it! Also they would only charge 50% of the initial price for cancellation! We rescheduled and they charged the FULL price! My girlfriend literally wasted all this money on a massage and no one laid a hand on me! They’re very horrible with communication and policy between they’re employees! So much for having my first massage on my birthday!

resp.text: We're disappointed to hear that this was the experience you two had with us. Please message us through our online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so that we can address this further and try to restore your confidence into our business.

name: Sandy Kimble
text: Scheduled my appointment a few days in advance but when I arrived iwas told my therapist was changed to a female. I prefer male therapist. So I canceled the appointment.  It would have been nice to receive a phone call letting me know the other therapist was sick and had been sick for a few days which means he was sick when I scheduled the appointment.  Total waste of my time.  I won't be returning.

resp.text: Hi Sandy, we regret falling short of meeting your expectations, and we humbly ask for the opportunity to make this up to you. Please message us directly through our online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW. Thank you providing this information so we can improve upon our services. We hope to hear from you soon.

name: Brian Lavett
text: I've read these reviews and frankly I was shocked. I had a great experience! My therapist was not only cordial and professional, she also gave me the best massage I've ever had. I've had no issues with billing, and find the staff curtious and hospitable. My therapist's name was Leigh. I would definitely ask for her. She is great and seems to really know what she's doing. I would and have recommended this place to my friends. My guess is that the other complaints on here, are just unhappy people that find fault in everything.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to let us and others know about your positive view of our business. We are glad that you have found a therapist to your liking and find that our staff, as a whole, is living up the Massage Envy values. Thank you again for being a valuable guest and we look forward to seeing you again.

name: Christopher Michael
text: I'm surprised to read the negative reviews on here.  I've had great massages with Chance and the customer service staff have always been nice to me.  Due to personal circumstances I had to cancel my membership with Massage Envy which was not an issue after my initial 12 months had ended.  Highly recommend!

resp.text: Christopher Michael, thank you for the kind words and wonderful review! It brings us great joy to see our members and guests happy. We look forward to seeing you again!

name: S
text: Wish zero was an option. Had a giftcard and made a 6:00 massage appointment, arrived at 5:45, got checked in by 6:00, waited 20 minutes and met therapist as I was getting ready to leave. She immediately made excuses for being late and blamed it on a computer system and iPad not showing me as being checked in. What she didnt realize was the fact she had been observed coming in at 6:00 with drinks and food, and eating, which was the real reason she was late, and unconcerned. Tried to take the high road, but she was agitated, ranting, cursing about how the rest of the schedule was all of a sudden thrown off. Also said she was sleepy and frustrated. Canceled my appointment because there was no way I could enjoy my massage with that type of unprofessional behavior. I'm still waiting on a call from the manager which I don't expect to receive. On a positive note, the 2 young receptionists were very cordial. I do not recommend this location at all! Sorry my family wasted $$ on a giftcard.

resp.text: Thanks for your honest feedback. We're deeply disappointed to hear that this was the experience you had with us. At your earliest convenience, please message us through our online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so that we can address the details of your review further.

name: Mckinney Chattman
text: Still feel great weeks later and one of the best massages I've had

resp.text: We're excited to hear this! Thank you, Mckinney! We hope to see you again soon!

name: Stephanie Clayton
text: I have been having an issue for 2 months now with this location.   After the desk staff not being trained well enough to handle the request, or just not wanting to, I have asked repeatedly to speak with the manager to no avail and have been transferred to his voicemail, again to no avail.  He will not call me back and he is never in or so they say.  Massage Envy advertises transferring a credit to another member's account (for a fee).  They have charged the fee and have yet to transfer the credit to my sister's membership at another location out of town. Twice now they have set up a guest account for her in Hoover, even after a detailed phone call on May 9, 2016 with a front desk staff to try and rectify this situation because when my sister asked her location if it had transferred and they let her know they had set up a guest account for a half hour in Hoover.  After no help from the Hoover location I called my sister's location out of town and they walked me through how simple the process is to transfer and they themselves cannot understand why I am having issues.  At that point I decided to ask for the manager and I still cannot get any help.  At what point does this surpass bad customer service and become deceptive business practices or fraud because I have paid for a service that they offer but am not getting it?

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to inform us about this situation. We have provided the transfer of your service, as requested. Again, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention.

name: Lena Smile
text: My experience was very good. I enjoyed every moment. My therapist was attentive to my needs and very professional. I've had massages all over the US by licenced therapists from the phenomenal to the absolute worst. Massage envy is not only a good experience but it's a great value!

name: Jeannie Dickerson
text: Bad management. Don't do business here!!  I cancelled my membership back in November 2015 and started getting bank drafts again this month. I didn't freeze my account...I cancelled it!!  I've called twice in the past two weeks with no return phone calls. I went down in person and no manager was there and apparently comes and goes with no set schedule according to the staff. I simply want my account completely cancelled and my money refunded. I don't know if the manager is a coward or a thief. I will NEVER be doing business here again and will never refer anyone here for business. The massages were wonderful but the management stinks.

name: Latoya Cunningham
text: Chris the masseuse was amazing!! This was the best experience I have ever had hands down....I frequent massage parlors often! Sandy the esthetician provided me wi th a 5 star facial!! I didn't want to leave! Great atmosphere!

resp.text: Latoya, we are so happy to read such a great review about Massage Envy - Hoover! You really made our day today.

name: Latoya Cunningham
text: Chris the masseuse was amazing!! This was the best experience I have ever had hands down....I frequent massage parlors often! Sandy the esthetician provided me wi th a 5 star facial!! I didn't want to leave! Great atmosphere!

resp.text: Latoya, we are so happy to read such a great review about Massage Envy - Hoover! You really made our day today.

name: Jenn
text:
Almost impossible to get an appointment here. You must make multiple calls to get someone to answer the phone. There is a voicemail. I have left messages but no one returns the call. When I do get a person to answer they are obviously bothered or confused by my request to make an appointment.
The massage therapists are decent  but I absolutely dread calling to make an appointment. So much so that I don't use my massages like I should or could.
I let them charge my debit card once then found out at my next visit that they automatically added it to my file, without my permission, and can charge it whenever they want to now as evidenced by the receptionist telling me she didn't need my signature she can just charge me whenever I come in. Wow.

resp.text: Jenn, first thank you for taking the time to reach out to us with your review and for your praises about our massage therapists! We take great pride in making sure our therapist are well-trained and customer-service oriented. We are sad to hear that this experience did not carry over with our appointment setting process. We do try to accommodate every member and guest, and at times there can be issues when scheduling appointments. Please know that is not how we like to conduct business and that we are working on making changes to solve these issues. Again, we do apologize for this inconvenience to you and if you would like, please call Caleb at (205) 988-6400.

name: LaDonna Tedder
text: This place is terrible!  The main selling point for purchasing a membership was the extended hours they offer for appointments.  Who knew it is completely impossible to get an appointment during the evening and when you are lucky enough to get an appointment, they call a few hours prior to cancel the appointment stating the therapist had resigned.  I would definitely NOT recommend wasting your money here.

name: Brooke Robinson
text: I called in today in reference to a double charge on my bank account for my membership fee. Hannah answered the phone and was very unprofessional and definitely not helpful. Not only was she not able to adequately explain the reason for the double charge, she was refusing to provide any helpful information to help resolve the issue and disconnected our phone call prompting me to call again. I requested the manager and was told he had been out of the office for a week and she had no idea when he would be back. What a joke of an establishment. I requested the Regional Manager name and number, oh but I was advised there was no number for her to provide to file a complaint. Their employees need to be trained or as Hannah explained they do not get paid to offer customer service. I will definitely cancel this membership and tell everyone I know to not patronize this establishment.

resp.text: Brooke, We are very sorry that your bank account was charged twice. There can be issues with the system at times and would like to discuss this with you as soon as you can. Please know that is not how we like to conduct business and that we are working on making changes to solve these issues regarding customer service. Again, we do apologize for this inconvenience to you and if you would like, please call Caleb at (205) 988-6400.

name: Noah Shrader
text: My massage therapist was very kind, but she started late and ended early. The pre-massage wait wasn't very relaxing (should have had a much more calming waiting experience). Comparing to other experiences, this was pretty lack luster.

name: Joyce Moore
text: They did a really good job with the message on our body

resp.text: We're happy to hear that you had a positive experience with us and we look forward to seeing you again soon!

name: mary logan
text: I have enjoyed every massage here and have been a happy member for almost a year now!

name: Haley Messer
text: I scheduled an appointment at the Massage Envy in Hoover over a week in advance and received a reminder phone call and voicemail the day before my scheduled massage to confirm the time and date. I arrived at the location at the scheduled time and they claimed that my appointment was on a different day. I told them I had received a voicemail confirming that the appointment time was, in fact, when I thought it was. They "apologized" by telling me that they have made the same mistake in the past and there was nothing they can do. They have a policy stating that clients must cancel at least 1 day before the massage to avoid wasting the therapist's time and I find it disrespectful and unprofessional that they don't hold themselves to the same standards. They were unapologetic and appeared unconcerned by the mistake. Don't waste your time on the poor customer service at this Massage Envy.

resp.text: Haley, we’re sorry to hear about your recent experience and thank you for sharing your feedback. Please continue letting us know how we can improve so we can better our services.

name: Champion Deivanayagam
text:
We were members for more than 2 years.  In the last several months, the staff has been very unhelpful (really rude).  They cancel scheduled appointments in a haphazard way, and don't even apologize.  I would stay away until there is some improvement in the front bench staff.  The massage therapists were really good though. Sorry, we will have cancel our membership.
UPDATE:
Spoke with Shelby the Manager.  She is trying to correct the problem, and we are pleased with her initiative at this point.  We continue to be members

name: Callie Cox
text: I spend $54 a month for a membership to this place. It is SO bad that I would rather let them keep the $54 per month. I always consider scheduling, but it's just so bad I would rather not go. I can't wait until the contract I foolishly signed is up. I have not requested to cancel because I understand the terms of the contract.

resp.text: Thank you for writing your review of our business. We apologize for not living up to your expectations for our business. We are happy to work with you in regards to finding you a therapist that would be more in tuned to your massage needs and/or your membership. Please call the clinic (205) 988-6400 and the manager will be happy to assist you. Again, we apologize for you experience.

We were members for more than 2 years.  In the last several months, the staff has been very unhelpful (really rude).  They cancel scheduled appointments in a haphazard way, and don't even apologize. name: Raven Crumbley
text:
This is the second time I've had to deal with management because of mishaps on their end. I cancelled my membership but am still getting charged and I've tried to call them 14 times today with no answer and no callback from the messages I left. Don't go here, it's not worth the hassle.

Update: Finally got someone on the phone but was told management won't be back until Friday. No management there for two days? This place really is garbage and has the worst customer service.

resp.text: Raven, we want to thank you for your past business. In regards to your complaint, we have closed your account and fully refunded the last payment to compensate for the confusion. Again, we apologize for an inconvenience we may have caused you.

name: leslie davis
text: I am a member of massage envy.  I travel for my job so I get massages around the USA and tend to be pretty happy with the experiences at Massage Envy.  I was hesitant to call this location because of the negative reviews.  I just called and the lady that answered was just as rude as the reviews said.  Short, flippant and I did not get an appointment.  I find it hard to believe that they are booked solid for the next three days.  Business must be good despite the negative reviews!

name: Stephen Juneau
text: This place is garbage. Management is terrible and wont answer the phone when he is needed. I do not recommend using this location.

name: Kimberly Williams
text: The staff canceled my reservation on a very busy weekend without my knowledge and never apologized for the inconvenience. After speaking with the manager,Lauren, I realized how this business gets by with such terrible customer service. Lauren is the most rude and unprofessional manager that I've ever had the displeasure of dealing with. She didn't try to fix this problem or take responsibility for the mistake made by her and her staff. She verbally harrassed me over the phone and was EXTREMELY confrontational. I WILL NEVER return!

name: Judy Sandoval
text: THANK YOU FOR THE BEST MASSAGE I HAVE EXPERIENCED,, I WLL BE BACK

resp.text: Judy Sandoval, thank you for taking the time to leave us a review! We are happy to hear about your positive experience!

name: Ashley Hendricks
text: This is one of the most unprofessional places I have ever visited. I canceled my membership but not before I had to wait an entire year to do it. I was attempting to schedule the rest of my unused massages/facials and the people at the front desk are so incompetent that they can't even get the times right! I specifically asked for a certain time for my facial and had my massage cancelled the day before and asked to move my facial up to the time that my massage previously was set at and the lady confirmed the time. I came the next day at the time I arranged only to sit for 10mins after the start time and I walked out to inquire what happened and the lady couldn't even find me on the schedule at first and then she said oh no your at another time which was an hour later! I reminded her that I had changed the time of my facial to an earlier time yesterday and she got an attitude and was like no there's only one person that does the facial and she was already booked, well why didn't you tell me that yesterday!! They are a subpar massage place and I will not be recommending them to anyone! Also the massages aren't even good and they make you pay for an hour but only massage you for 45 mins...just a complete rip off!

resp.text: Thank you for voicing your concerns, Ashley Hendricks. Please message us directly through our online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so we can address this further.

name: Karlstan Wilson
text:
I made an appointment for my wife.... the appointment was set for 5pm. I called to cancel around 130pm. After I called they ran my card for the full amount of the services.
After calling back the saff member (Kalie) or somthing like that was rude and hung up on me.

resp.text: Hi, Karlstan Wilson, thank you for bringing this matter to our attention. Please message us directly through our online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so we can address this further.

name: Ben Victor
text: My massage was ok, but the hard sell at the end, turned me off.  Save your money, and go somewhere else.

name: David Ciaverella
text: Total waste of time and money. Asked to focus on low back and legs for the session as I have a running race coming up. Spent 30 minutes on my shoulders. I am not even sure if these are licensed therapists to ignore the patients primary problems

resp.text: Thank you for voicing your concerns, David Ciaverella. Please message us directly through our online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so we can address this further.

name: Debra Bryant
text: Great place. Best massage therapists.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a positive review, Debra!

name: T C
text: The level of customer service is poor and after talking to management I was very disappointed at how the situation was handled. I will never do business with this company again and do not recommend their services at all.

resp.text: Thank you for voicing your concerns, T C. Please message us directly through our online portal at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so we can address this further.

name: Tina Dickens
text: Nice, clean and friendly staff.

resp.text: We're so happy to see your high rating! We appreciate it!

name: DeAngel Enge
text: Maya is awesome

resp.text: We're happy to hear that you enjoy your sessions with Maya! See you next time, DeAngel!

name: Hartley Moon
text: Ask for Nikia

resp.text: We're happy to hear that you found the perfect therapist for your specific needs! We always love to receive great feedback!

name: Heatherly McGraw
text: Ok

resp.text: We regret that you didn't have a five star experience with us. Please reach out to us at http://bit.ly/2mQKBpW so that we can learn how to improve your experience.

name: Chris Cochran
text: Great!

resp.text: Hi Chris, so many stars! We're happy to have earned it and excited to continue delivering this same exceptional experience! See you next time!

name: William Whitsett
text: Ok

resp.text: Thank you William for taking the time to let us know how we did. We will strive to deliver a five-star experience the next time you come visit us. Have a nice day!

name: Azadeh Hodjat
text: Professional massage center

name: Jeremy
text: Under management of Caleb Matthews this place was run to the ground.

name: Stephanie Froman
text: Horrible management!  They make it impossible to cancel your membership...don't get one!

resp.text: Stephanie, thank you taking the time to inform us of your frustrations. We apologize for any inconvenience that you have had with trying to cancel your membership. We have set procedures that have been put in place by Massage Envy Corporate, if this situation should come up when a client would like to cancel their membership. If you would like to give us a call back, we would be more than happy to discuss these procedures with you. Again, we do apologize and thank you.

name: Marquise Moore
text: Made an appointment a week out and called the day of my appointment tor confirmation. I found out that he  appointment was never made .

name: Toshiba Hampton
text: Please in the name of all that is holy refrain from purchasing a membership from this company!! I have repeatedly asked the staff to cancel my membership and I constantly being put off and lied to with regards to a member of the management team contacting me. Now they have charged my credit card and seem to have every intention of stealing from me. I will be contacting the BBB about this.

name: Joe Cash
text:
(Translated by Google) Grest

(Original)
Grest

resp.text: Thanks for letting us know how we did! We hope to be of service to you again soon, Joe!

name: Tracy Evers
text: So thankful for this awesome chiropractor and staff! Got me in while on vacation when I was in need of an adjustment. I feel so much better. May have to drive down just to see them!

name: Nancy Litch
text: Excellent doctor who also does acupuncture. I highly recommend this practice. The off staff are very friendly and competent too.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind words, Nancy.

name: Pamela Morton
text: Staff was very friendly and helpful right from the first phone call. Dr. Gravely asked questions about my chiropractic care "up north" and was able to gently get me readjusted. Atmosphere was relaxing. Highly recommend.

name: Jeannie Reece
text:
Very warm atmosphere.
And great staff

name: Jim Puckett
text: Even though I told them this was a one time visit as I am from out of state, they started a new patient folder. I was treated but when I asked for his diagnosis and treatment I was told he hadn't written it up. I had my home Dr. Request those records, which I signed off for, but they have not sent them. I was charged for new patient records on that date before my insurance was even contacted. Not happy with this lack of professionalism.

name: Jason Reynolds
text: One slip is all it takes. After a long drive in for a week of vacationing in Orange Beach. I believe part muscle and part alignment became my problem. Gravely got me in quickly. He responded to my email inquiry after hours. He listened to my history and got me straightened out. Thanks! Without this I would not have been able to enjoy the week.

name: Katrina Menzies
text: Love this place.... acupuncture!!

name: Tina Nelson
text: Always makes me feel so much better!!

name: Karen
text: As a winter visitor I was looking for a really good therapeutic massage to soothe my aching back and legs.  I had an appointment at the chiropractic clinic with Audra, who was fantastic.  She really gave my aches a workout which was what I wanted and needed.  The room and massage table were comfortable and the price was perfect for my budget.  The doctor's office was convenient to where I was staying, has a nice parking lot, and is easy to find.  The other people working here were also very friendly.  I wish I had found this massage opportunity sooner, but now have the number saved to my phone for my visit next winter.

name: Tangerine Tundra AG
text: Dr. Gravely was very gentle and great with kids.

name: Melissa Brendtro
text: Easy in and out, great adjustments.

name: Ann McFadden
text: Dr. Steven is awesome

resp.text: Thanks, Ann. I appreciate the kind words.

name: Jacob Kayl, Jr.
text: Wonderful chiropractor and massage therapist

name: B. L.
text: Staff is helpful and friendly. Massage was fabulous. Facility is clean, spacious, beautiful, quiet.  Exceptionally clean and sanitized.  Great products. Great prices.  Highly recommend

name: Rory Blanks
text: I couldn’t be happier with the services that I got. The staff was always kind, courteous, and professional. I’m thrilled with the outcome of my services and would recommend Azia to anyone in the Birmingham area looking for what they provide.

name: Emma Marshall
text: John is one of the best masseuses I have ever been to! He has significantly helped my back and eradicated the day to day pain I was experiencing. I recommend him to everyone I speak to. Come see him, you wont regret it!

name: Savannah Swindle
text: I loved my massage! Nice and professional staff. Highly recommend!

name: Brittany Wilson
text: Love Azia Medical Spa.  I come once a month for the hydrafacial with Dee and I am obsessed!  I love how my skin looks and feels every single time!  Great staff and service for all your beauty needs!

name: Tammy Hyche
text: I absolutely love this place. The staff is so happy and helpful. I love my girl Dee, she is amazing at permanent eyeliner!!

resp.text: Thank you for your support, Tammy! We love hearing how much our clients love their results. If there's anything we can do for you, please let us know. -Lina D., Manager

name: Danielle O'Neal
text: I’ve been going here for a while, and never had a problem. Unfortunately today was very very different as they have had staff changes, today the atmosphere I was used to changed dramatically, I felt as though I was not welcome. Following the same routine for my appt I was scolded and talked down to.  I have no intention of returning they just lost a customer today. It’s a shame because I really enjoyed going there

resp.text: Danielle, we always want our patients to feel welcome. However, we're disappointed to read this review because this doesn't sound like our med spa. If there's anything we can do to welcome our patients back, we'd love to know how we can do that. -Lina D., Manager

name: Jeannine Ahlberg-Glenn
text: I have been going to Azia for years. They never fail to be the absolute friendly & offer the best service!  I have tried to go other places and they fail in most areas. I have lately gone thru Laser facials and Jacklyn has explained the benefits & the number of visits to reach MY satisfaction. Today I saw Dee for permanent eyeliner. This is my second time to have this process done with her. As with any tattoo they fade so I didn’t hesitate to see her again. Prior to ever seeing Dee I had my eyeliner done at another local spa. They did NOT numb and the pain was extreme & unbearable. I recommend this process with Dee HIGHLY. She relaxes me with her humor & bubbly personality. Can’t say enough about this spa on the edge of town.

name: Ashley Lee
text:
Great experience and professional staff!
Wonderful facials!

resp.text: At Azia Medical Spa, our clients will always be properly taken care of, Ashley. It's always a treat to read when our facials and services are enjoyed. Please reach out if you ever need us! -Lina D., Manager

name: Ange Goss
text: I love Azia Spa and the staff.  I've been going there for over 3 years and have never had a bad experience.  The staff are very friendly and informative.  I never feel pressured into doing a procedure I don't want to do.  The facility is very calming and inviting. Will continue to go there for all my spa needs.

name: Deidre Payne
text: They are so nice here. They make me feel good about being a customer. I recommend them to everyone, especially over Santa Fe Day Spa. The owners of Azia are decent people, making me feel better about spending my money here.

name: Ashley L. Spinks
text: The atmosphere is calming, and the staff is great.  Everyone is always friendly and genuine.  I wish it was just a bit closer but it's worth the drive.  The massage is amazing, and the skin products they sell are pretty amazing.  Again, it's far but absolutely worth the drive.  Highly recommend :).

name: Melanie Mann
text: I have been a client a Azia since they opened.  The staff is so friendly and knowledgeable.  The services are outstanding and reasonably priced.  I very rarely have to wait as they keep appointments on schedule and timely.  Krista has worked with me for both medical weight loss and skin treatments.  She is always readily available for questions, extremely concerned with getting the desired result and client satisfaction.  I have also been a patient for Dr. Cox for both botox and dermal fillers.  Krista assists him during my treatments.  Dr. Cox is always most concerned with giving me the proper treatment for the results that I want.  He is very honest and caring and always desires to keep results natural rather than over doing it.  Both Krista and Dr. Cox are caring and professional and I am always pleased with my results.  They are both more than willing to make adjustments if a client is not satisfied, although I have never had to go back for that.  They also call after a procedure to make sure you are satisfied with your results, which is rare for most spas.  I could not recommend Azia more highly due to the staff, the relaxing facility and the wonderful staff and service they provide.  They truly care about the clientele.

name: Alisa Kochergina
text: That was so BAD !!! They destroyed my face!!! Now im looking for a doctor to fix there mass!  I did fillers under my eyes . From first time it didn’t work so i needed to go through that painful Procedure one more time. They did like 8 stitchers under each eye... Almost for one year i have swelled Bruise under my left eye!!! And because of it i start to have one deep wrinkle there.... And it was my mistake to sign the paper that i will not sue them. After i did it they told me i should not come there anymore . And With that my eye problem what they did i should go somewhere else . OWNER WAS SO RUDE TO ME THAT DID NOT WANT EVEN JUST SEE ME TO GIVE AN ADVICE WHAT TO DO AND WHERE TO GO. Even though i was very polite with them all the time. Don’t make mistake i did. DONT GO THERE!

name: Gina Valentini
text:
Marissa, the receptionist, is so sweet, patient, and helpful. I loved being able to communicate with her via text, Azia's online chat feature, and/or in person.
Dee is absolutely amazing! She is so talented! Dee microbladed my brows and applied permanent upper and lower eyeliner for me. I am in love with the results!
Alex and Holly work behind the scenes to make sure all is as it should be at the spa. If you get to meet them, you are in for a treat!
Did I mention the spa is absolutely gorgeous???
If you haven't visited Azia, what are you waiting for???

name: Amanda Andrews
text: I had my first botox injections here, it was a trial run for me. I am more than pleased with the results. I felt at ease with Dr Cox, he answered my questions and his assistant was wonderful. She was professional and caring without being "fake". For everyone who frequents spas....you know what I mean! I am careful with how I spend my money and Azia spa is an investment in myself.

name: R Heffner
text: JASSIM PALMER AND LEDBETTER RUST MY 3 P.M. HONEYWELL AIRIES COMPTYPE SELECTRIC AUTO CORRECT PAT DOBBS

name: David Wakefield
text: I love going to Azia! I would have to say that it is the best spa in the Birmingham area. I have had a massage with Beth and Stephanie, and they are both great at what they do!!! They also have a really nice dream shower and sauna that I like to use after my massage. I always leave there feeling relaxed and refreshed!!!

name: Nameless Faceless
text: Loved every minute of my custom facial and massage. I will definitely be back. The facility is beautiful, peaceful and clean. Excellent customer service.

name: Chris and Tonya MacNicol
text: Marissa and Liz were great at the front desk. They really helped me understand the products and pricing. Jackie is amazing at knowing what my skin. Refs and offering the right solution!

name: Bella Allure
text: I am doing Venus Freeze treatments for loose abdominal skin at Azia and I have been thoroughly pleased with everything!  The Staff is amazing and the treatments are going well.  I have done two so far and will be on my third one soon; there are subtle results but I am sure the end result will be phenomenal from how things are progressing. -SM

name: Brittany King
text: Jackie is just the best! I actually went for hair removal but I had seen 4 different dermatologist to try and remove the dark spots on my face. I had given up hope. She recommended to try laser removal and I’ve had great success with the results. As a woman, to have dark spots on my face was so embarrassing and made me super self conscious. name: Helen
text: While the staff members were nice, I was very disappointed in the results of my visit. I bought a groupon for 100 units of dysport thinking that 100 units instead of 50 would be ample. I was a bit concerned when the nurse tried to confirm that I was a getting 50 units. I asked the doctor's advice about the coverage, and she did not indicate I would need to buy more units. It has been about a month, and I still have movement in all areas injected.  The wrinkles aren't as strong but still there.  Also the areas over the corners of my brows were not treated, and I have this strange Spock look when I raise my brows. Of course, I called after about 2 weeks to let them know that the treated areas still had a lot of movement, and they quickly explained that they do not do any re-treatment with Groupons.  I understand that I  supposedly got a "deal" but I also still paid for a service and was assured when I booked my appointment that I would love the results.. I know Groupons are to get new customers in the door but with this experience, I will not go back. I have used a Groupon at another spa, and they re-treated me to get the results that were expected.  I had an appt with my dermatologist a few weeks after this, and she said that 100 disport units should have taken care of all the areas I had treated. My experience may have been completely different if I had paid full price.  Lesson learned.

name: Keara Norris
text:
I recently had my first (but definitely not last visit) to Azia Medical Spa.  I had a GroupOn voucher & was a little concerned that I may be shortchanged because I was there on a “coupon”.  All my fears were immediately put to rest from the initial phone call to make my appointment.  I had let time get away from me and had less than a week to use my GroupOn voucher or lose the promotional value.  The lady on the phone, Katrina I think, was understanding & made me an appointment for the next day.  Bonus point because I was able to get my appointment on a Saturday.

When I arrived, I was greeted by name & offered a drink.  After paperwork, I was introduced to Jennifer Pyles who explained that she is double licensed and would do both my massage & facial.  I was extremely pleased with this because it allowed me to stay relaxed throughout the treatments and not have to move into a new area.  Jennifer was professional, attentive & through.  Her pressure level was perfect & she checked in occasionally to make sure it stayed that way.  She even surprised me by telling me she could tell I was right handed & spent a lot of time at a computer due to the tension level in certain areas.  That really showed me how skilled she is.  After the massage, Jennifer moved directly into my express facial.  She walked me through the process & gave me a brief skin analysis.  She suggested products & services I could benefit from.  She was also kind enough to suggest some over the counter products when I asked about them.  After the appointment, she left a list of the items & services we discussed at the front desk for me.

After my time with Jennifer, I was allowed to wait in the sauna while the nail technician finished with another client.  The temperature was just right for relaxation and I had to avoid nodding off.

Next, Badri Roshan, the nail technician came to get me for my manicure.  She was a very nice lady with whom I enjoyed talking.  I loved her accent & chatting with her about her background and what drew her to Birmingham.  As a testament to her work. I have received several compliments on my nails.

As I checked out, I neglected to get the name of the lady at the front desk but she was very friendly and helped me run my card to leave a tip for Jennifer & Badri.  I loved that while I was invited back, no services or products were pushed on me.  I am looking forward to all my future visits and spreading the news that Azia Medical Spa is money and time well spent!!!

name: Eric Luffman
text: I am huge on surprises! So I purchased a very expensive perfect package for my girl as a surprise Valentine's day present at this location bc ive sent her here once before and she seemed to enjoy it. Well the lady at the desk inquired on who it was for and apparently submitted the information under her name where as MY email confirmation went directly to my girl, where she called me informing me she knew my plans for her, spoiling the surprise!!! That should have never happened! I then called and explained my irritation and informed them I was coming for a refund. They called me back like it was no biggy like cool we can just refund this over the phone for you rather than saying hey i'm sorry is there any way we can make this right for you! I'm a funny, chill laid back dude, but if you ruin a surprise, that is my one and only immediate heartbreak bc that ruins the joy of spending lots of money to be able to see the expression on your womans face of how happy she is. Presents are for the givers and for the receivers bc we both enjoy feeling the happiness of THE SURPRISE!! Please resolve this issue, bc i'm a man of morality bc now my woman is upset with me bc I refunded the package but I simply can NOT do business with folks that aren't in it for the satisfaction of those spending their hard earned money! So now, I had Valentine's all planned out perfect to the T, I no longer have the "kaboom" gift available, and now there is all this negative energy between me and my woman bc I know she still wants the package but I can not allow it bc the surprise was so important to me i absolutely had to have my money back so that this place would know and preferably remember that they ruined something for two special people! I wouldn't dare ask for something free, I would feel bad for taking anything not earned, but as a man that runs  a business, I make free offers every day to ensure customer satisfaction and that they come back!! Moral of my story, do what is right, and right what you wronged!

text: I've been looking for a massage therapist since I moved to Birmingham, and I'm SO glad I found CR2! Another thing that I noticed is that they are involved in giving back to the community which is always a plus for me. I would definitely recommend going to see them for your massage. I have nothing but great experiences with them.

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming in Shylonda. I hope to see you again soon.

name: Erin Walton
text:
My first experience was fine, but it seemed to lack the "it factor" for me.

I came back for another try and was disappointed. I made mention of a couple of areas that I needed some deeper work on, but I received a very light, inefficient massage. However, the staff is very friendly and accommodating, and the studio is well kept.

Seeing many rave reviews, I think CR2 just wasn't the right fit for me and my particular needs.

resp.text: Hello Ms. Walton we are truly sorry that you found your massage experience lacking. We appreciate you coming in and giving us a try. For future reference, never lie down for therapy and not communicate with whoever your therapist is doing the massage. We usually can appreciate a client communicating that the pressure is "too deep or too light." Our job is to help relieve not irritate you further. We wish you luck with finding a therapist to meet your needs in the future.

text: Best massage I've ever had. Reiko is amazing. Been getting massages for 15 years and wouldn't go anywhere else now

resp.text: Thank you Dawn

text: Connie is always amazing.  Very professional and will adjust the pressure to what I need.  Talking about it makes me want to schedule an appointment now.

resp.text: Thank you so much for coming in Paul. Hope to see you again soon.

name: D Robinson
text: The ladies at CR2 are first class.

name: Mary Hollis
text:
Having Fibromyalgia & back issues has landed me with many different massage therapists & physical therapists throughout the years, with varying degrees of success.  I moved to the Birmingham area 2 years ago from FL and didn't know where to turn for a good MT, so I took a chance on a couple of Groupons.  I'm always sketchy about these, and the first couple didn't do a very good job, but man am I ever glad I found CR2!!  I cannot even begin to say enough wonderful things about Constance!!  She truly cares about helping people.  Contrary to most people with Fibro, anything less than a really deep tissue massage is just useless to me.  Constance makes sure to go deep enough to be effective, but always checks to make sure its not too much.  She makes sure that all of my hot spots are tended to & I always leave there feeling like a new person.  Recently I had issues with jaw/mouth pain after oral surgery.  My dentist, endodontist & an oral surgeon could not figure out how to fix my pain & just kept throwing more medications at the issue.  This went on for MONTHS.  I finally decided to see if Constance could help.  She researched the issues & I had immediate relief with one visit!  Talk about a miracle worker!  She's so good that every time my son comes for a visit I schedule time for him to see her.  He works hard & has back issues as well.  I'm beginning to think that his trips are as much to see Constance as they are to see me!  =)
Bottom line, without any hesitation, I would absolutely recommend Constance & CR2!

resp.text: Thank you so much Mary. I am glad massage has been able to help you. It is our pleasure. I hope to see you again soon.

The nail tech was  apologetic, but didn’t offer anything to make it better. When I was checking out, I wasn’t asked how everything was or anything. I’m only posting so that they can fix the expired nail product issue. Very disappointed, as I expect more from such a nice spa/salon.

Everything she has suggested has been amazing and worth every penny. I will never take my skin anywhere else and I look forward to just looking younger with each procedure! You will not be sorry trying her services BUT be prepared you will be addicted after the first appointment! 💜

name: Destiny Robertson
text: So I had a facial done by Morgan and the facial itself was great. The only complaint I have is that I paid for an hour facial.  I arrived early in case I needed to fill out paperwork. My appointment time was 10:00 AM. I sat in their waiting area for 30 minutes before she called me back. At this point is was after 10:10, she took me to my room then left while I got undressed. I laid there for what felt like forever before she came back in. So she didn’t begin my facial till at least 10:20. When she was done I was getting dressed and looked at my phone for the time and realized it was only 10:48......  I won’t be going back. I paid $95 for an hour facial and only got about 30 ish minutes. Not happy about that. :(

I only wear foundation if I want to!

Unfortunately the bleach started having a strange reaction so she washed it out to prevent damage.  Plan B was to just dye it brown and wait for the henna to grow out for a year.

Allie suggested a cut and violet color that turned out perfect.  My daughter loves her hair so much.  Allie worked on her for over 3 hours.  I can not thank her enough for her patience and care.

name: eternalinctattoos Wayne K
text: Salt cave in my opinion was horrible and very cold. luckily my wife didn't have to pay for any of her stuff. I just had to pay $45 to practically freeze and listen to a repetitive anoying sound  of it running. I feel no different of course. My opinion this place is a gimmick. Overpriced, very boring and just excuses when I said something about the Salt cave not doing a thing. I wouldn't even go back if it was totally free for any of it. Its like a country store with over priced products. Huge waste of time. What a Joke. If my wife liked this place then she will  be going without me and not be dragging me into this lame spa.

resp.text:
We respect your opinion. However, as a Licensed Esthetics Instructor that researched extensively the salt cave benefits prior to constructing our specially designed Salt Cave. I would like to share facts regarding the salt cave with you.
•	Taking wellness to another level, halotherapy (a.k.a. Salt Therapy) is similar to spending time in the salty sea air, which offers many more benefits than “sleeping” on the beach.
•	Ancient Healers and Philosophers recommended salt inhalation for the respiratory system and health problems. Dry salt therapy originates from speleotherapy (cave therapy). This was discovered in Poland where workers exhibited fewer respiratory illnesses.   There are thousands of salt rooms in Europe and beyond.
•	The benefits of Salt Therapy are wide-ranging.  Salt levels affect our cell activity, energy, and blood sugar levels.  A natural disinfectant, salt is antimicrobial, and antibacterial.  Salt comes in empty processed forms or healthier pure sea salts that contain 84 elements and trace elements found in the human body.  Dry salt air is more powerful than moist air.
•	Negatively charged ions in salt improve our health and mood.  Inhaling particles may reduce inflammation and mucus in the lungs, improving respiratory conditions such as asthma, allergies, bronchitis, sinus congestion, and C.O.P.D.   We have seen physical proof of many of these conditions improving through our loyal clients.
•	The calming and detoxifying effects of halotherapy can support the immune, nervous and lymphatic systems.   Additional benefits are reduced stress and headaches, increased energy and better sleep patterns.  Salt ions purify the air and may increase lung capacity and reduce physical ailments for adults, children and athletes.  A series of treatments are recommended to keep the body healthy during flu or allergy season.    So, this is why we offer packages to continue your treatments.
•	A session will last 45 minutes. For mild to moderate respiratory conditions, 10 to 12 sessions are recommended, depending on individual results. For best results, sessions should be 4 to 5 times per week.   Since everyone responds differently to therapy, this is provided as an average upon which to gauge your personal experience.   After the initial set of treatments, you should follow up at least once per week.

The Salt Cave temperature was accurate and is temp and humidity controlled by its individual unit. Blankets were provided in the salt cave for your comfort in the temp controlled room.   To be freezing in there, it was your decision not to use the provided amenities.

While your wife enjoyed her massage that was paid for via gift certificate, you chose to participate in a service as well.    Our company policy states that Gift Certificates are only used for the person that they were purchased for.  Therefore, your salt session could not be added to her gift certificate.   The remainder of her certificate will be for her to relax and enjoy other services.

We have been in business over 25 years, and our reputation speaks for itself. Our moto has always been “Where You Come To Get Away”.  We strive to maintain an environment and technology free zone that offers an opportunity for our clients to get away from the stresses of everyday life. It is your opinion that you found this “boring”. Following your treatment yesterday, you enjoyed our front porch swing, while on your cell phone. You expressed to me, that you understood the concept of the salt, because while you were living in Florida you “spent many nights sleeping on the beach”.

In response to your review, We pray that you will take this reply positively and learn the facts of the salt cave and our business rather than negatively portraying our business.

God Bless,
Penny Ogle,
Licensed Esthetics Instructor
Owner

name: Lysee Baughman
text: Myself and a friend went today for our first visit trying to find a nail salon in town that we liked in our area outside of our regular place that has become so popular it’s stays booked weeks in advanced. We did our research and saw it had a 4.7 star rating so we decided to check it out. Upon entering they were very friendly and the building was very nice and clean. I just needed a fill in for my pink and white and my friend needed a whole new set. Things were great at first but the lady upset my friend a little when she told her she wanted short stiletto nails and she said no they are long I can show you and my friend said I understand but I have had them that short before and she said there going to be ugly that short and so my friend was like ok can you just do square then because she felt as if the lady was trying her best to discourage what she as the customer wanted done. The lady moves to my seat to work on my pink and white fill in and I have been to several salons enough to know how I want them done and how I expect them to be done so instead of starting with shaping the pink power first then working to the white so the white powder could have a rounded shape like I want instead of a straight across shape I started to get a little upset and my friend spoke up for me and said I’m sorry but I thought normally you use the silver tool to shape in the round form of the white and the lady said you can do it that way but we do it this way so finally I got the courage to speak up and point out that the nails she had done looked nothing like that he nails I already had and I wanted them like I had my originals and I didn’t scream or yell at her my voice got a little high tense because at this point I was getting very stressed out and she just stood up and said you need to just leave your to picky I will just charge you a small fee so it will be cheaper and her husband was working on my friends nails and he said yeah that’s best you made her feel bad and I think you need to leave and I was like what I already asked her if she could just quit and paint them a color so your going to charge me for something that’s half done and not even finish the job and he said yes you need to just leave so my friend was my ride and she obviously wasn’t going to make me wait while she finished hers so she told him that she would have to leave also because she was my ride and he said ok that’s fine y’all can both go and don’t worry about paying just don’t ever come back because y’all are obviously to picky for us. WE HAVE NEVER been treated this way before we always leave a nice tip and never been told we were too picky but when you are PAYING for a service you get what you asked for and you let them know what you want. Needless to say they don’t have to worry about us coming back anyways so we went to PERFECT NAILS on south parkway and when we went in we told them a short story about how we were made to leave a nail salon for being to picky and they wouldn’t finish our nails and as soon as we sat down the most awesome girl ever Linda sat down and was like ok let me see and soon as she saw them she said “omg what happened to your nails” she had to totally reshape them because the lady at revive had them all different lengths and shapes. I encourage anyone thinking about coming to this place BEWARE THEY DO NOT LIKE PEOPLE WHO ARE TO PICKY ABOUT THE SERVICE THEY ARE PAYING FOR. But I do recommend with a 5 star rating LINDA AT PERFECT NAILS on south parkway.

resp.text: We are sorry you were never satisfied when we try many ways to meet your likings and we were sure you were not going to be pleased when we finish with your nails. Plus you can't treat people ugly and raise your voice for not getting the same exact matching work of your other salon. We didn't charge you and your friend on what we spend almost close to complete service. We are glad you find someone that meet your needs.

First,  let me say I've been here multiple times and I'll continue to go. The services are great, the environment peaceful and clean, the therapist thorough. This place is busy,  so they will leave the room to answer the phone etc, but will usually compensate the service time.
Secondly,  you should be very clear about the services you want because I think I just got hustled.
I asked for the "60 minute herbal...", and  couldn't finish my sentence because she said "yes". There's only 1 service with Herbal in the title. She led me to a massage room instead of reflxology, so I asked again for the herbal. I couldn't finish my sentence because she said yes.
Went to pay at the end, she charged me for the massage (more $). She was able to fluently negotiate the price, although it's not what I intended on spending.
I also asked for Nicole and was again told "yes", but that didn't happen.  I still would have went if she wasn't available,  whatever.
I didn't get this chic's name but great massage and hell of a hustle! 😄 I will definitely be back, but will be clearer about the service I want.

text: Astonishing results after just two visits. I move around a lot as a working Mom of twins. My lower back has always given me issues, and has been nearly inflexible at times,  but after one appointment with Brice I felt my back muscles soften and loosen. After 2 massages I can feel a complete difference in my posture. I've had massage therapy in the past, but nothing like I have experienced at CR2.  If you want to feel unquestionably healthier go see Brice. My husband gave me a gift certificate to get a massage and it's the best gift he's ever given me!

text: The entire team is very skilled and knowledgeable in the art of massage therapy. They did a great job at explaining which massages work best for certain injuries and which worked best for other things like helping one de-stress. I highly recommend these guys!

text: I had such a wonderful experience at Birmingham Wellness Massage. The therapist I worked with was so professional and knowledgeable. I highly recommend Birmingham Wellness Massage and will absolutely be going back very soon!!
