text: Brice is an amazing massage therapist. I recommend him not only on here but to my friends when they mention aches and pains. I go monthly to get all of the stress I hold on to in my muscles. It is the most relaxing part of my month and worth every penny!

name: Tori Quinn
text: Brice has been my personal massage therapist for a while now, and he is hands down the best therapist I've ever been to. He does more than just a "feel good" massage but takes the time to really help you therapeutically. Brice will stretch you out and will pay close attention to the pressure level you can stand and/or want. His attention to the small things is the best. The cooling eye pillow, the fluffy neck pillow, these kinds of things I've never gotten from another therapist. This will absolutely be one of the best, if not THE best, massage you've ever had.

text: Brice has been my best therapist.  I've been going to him for years now, and I like how he listens to you.  He is willing to make adjustments in the session to focus on any tight areas. text: Brice and his team are the best! His therapists are highly skilled and treat you just like you’re  family. I wouldn’t even consider recommending my family and friends to anyone else.

text: Very kind staff, treated us like family at first.  However the prices are much too high and after a couple weeks of treatment they get pushy. They try to get you to pay for months of treatment upfront. Very uncomfortable had to start blocking their calls.

resp.text: We try very hard to give every patient 5 star service apparently we failed you. We will try harder next time.

name: Lisa Hazard
text:
I can’t recommend this office, the doctor, the staff and the quality of services enough. If I were to attempt to do this, I might end up with a thesis.

I’ve been seeing the chiropractor, Dr. Brown, here for a few months. Originally, I sought out chiropractor help for a foot disorder which surgeons recommended surgery for, but it’s a brutal surgery. I already tried surgery once for this issue and it came back 10 years later.

While seeking surgical advice this time around, I told the surgeons I felt like my back and hips couldn’t take the recovery from the Achilles’ Tendon surgery because Ow! They did MRIs and found 4 compressed discs, 3 compressed nerves in my back.

It’s been 3 months and no surgery so far! He’s willing to try different things and learn more about treating all of the conditions in each visit. I just got home from my 14th trip. When I went in, it had been over a week and Ow! I walked out of there 45 minutes later feeling a lot younger than 46. Key word in that sentence is “walked.” Now that I’ve been home a while, I could skip! I will sleep well tonight!

I’m in Decatur and dislike driving, but travel to this office is worth it and I look forward to the visits so much that I even enjoy the drive.

The staff treats everyone like friends and the place is full of healing energy and good vibes. The doctor is easy to talk with and explains everything perfectly. Medical experiences ~ not many are good. Every time I’ve been to this office, it IS a good experience.

Thank you, Dr. Brown and staff, for everything you do to help! I appreciate you guys more than you know!

resp.text: Thank You Lisa

name: Toni Rose
text: I can now go down stairs WITHOUT having knee pain!!!   No more back pain either!  Thank you to Dr. Brown for your skill and dedication in what you do.  Thanks also to the great staff.  They are truly encouraging, knowledgeable  and caring.  I feel like I am visiting friends.  Keep up the great work!  Five stars for this group.

resp.text: Thank You

name: Keith Williams
text:
My experience and treatment at Millar Chiropractic in Madison has been excellent. All the staff members; Jessica, Lucy, Ashley, Madison, Shannon, and Alex have been exceptionally kind, caring, professional, and are very knowledgeable of their profession. Not only this, but they have shown a great deal of compassion given the pain that I was in.
I have gotten to know all of them and have grown to like and respect each and everyone of them. Never have I looked forward to any of my medical appointments like I do to Millar Chiropractic. Each time I walk into their office I am welcomed with a very friendly greeting; they make me feel at home with their first words. It is indeed a pleasure to be one of their patients.
Dr. Justin beyond any doubt, is the most knowledgeable and professional Chiropractor I’ve ever been to; and I’ve been to many. His methods and standard practices have been very effective, and I feel like I’m well on my way to recovery.
One thing that you don’t find in most medical practices these days is a Doctor who will sit down with you and discuss every detail of your treatment. Dr. Justin will spend as much time with you as you need to ask questions, so that you fully understand how your treatment will progress.
I highly recommend Millar Chiropractic

text: I get quality care at Millar but one thing does bother me.  I think they must severely underpay staff.  I have been a patient there for almost 3 years and the number of turnover they have with office staff and assistants who provide the therapies is extremely high.  I go in every 3-4 weeks for treatment and there is a new face every time I go in.  It makes it hard to get to know anyone and just when an assistant gets to know me and how I prefer my treatments/therapies, they are gone.

resp.text: We're glad you continue to get quality care at the Madison clinic. Please know we pay our staff very well. What you may not realize is some of our staff at Madison have been with us for over 5 years. Over the last year, we've have had a rash of pregnancies and promotions. We've had three staff pregnancies and one promotion. For instance, our front desk recently went out on pregnancy leave and has decided to not return and be a stay-at-home mom. Our Doctor's Chiropractic Assistant was promoted to the office manager at another one of our clinics. Yes, we have lots of new faces; but, all are high quality team members well trained to do their job.  Thanks for your concern. Dr Greg Millar

name: Anita Mintz
text:
Caring Doctor and staff. Been coming to this location for years.

Update: I fell and injured my back (herniated discs) which brought on sciatica pain the likes I could have never imagined. Dr. Justine and Dr. Christian have gone above and beyond! Everyone has been great at getting me in, helping with work issues, and genuinely concern for my well being. When my MRI results came back, Dr. Greg Millar went over them with me and explained what was needed. There was no pressure for me to agree to treatment. I was encouraged to bring my husband in, so they could go over the results with him, since my  insurance would not cover part of treatment. Dr. Justine went over everything with my husband and myself the following day, took time to answer all questions. I can't  say enough great things about these doctor's.  I have been going to Millar's in Madison for 10 years or so and they have made my life better. I have other health issues so a quick "adjustment " is not my norm!! So when one thing does not work, they try something else until we find the right formula.  My sciatica was unbearable in February, but I am seeing the light at the end of the tunnel, with hope that the worst is behind me. I can not recommend this office highly enough!

resp.text: Thank You

text: Dr. Justin is a great and dependable chiropractor. The whole staff are welcoming and hard-working. From the first visit Kristen was very warm and accomadating. She made sure to remember us by name and she always makes us laugh.

His staff at Millar Chiropractic are top notch as well, THANKS to you all!!!!  Lastly, in the first week I was there, I saw 3 of my own personal friends... how cool is that!

resp.text: Thank you Haydee for your kind words. Dr Justin and his team do a great job of helping people find solutions to their problems while being kind, considerate and compassionate. And your right, it's cool to find your friends are going to the same Doctor. Thanks Again. Dr Millar

Dr. Justin knows what he is doing.  I won't be going anywhere else but here from now on.  The team at Millar Chiropractic-Madison has been very caring and accommodating to all of my needs.  I look forward to the rest of my visits and highly recommend this clinic.

resp.text: Thank you Nick. Thanks for the kind words. Experience and know how is something your Doctor either has or doesn't have. Dr Justin and his team do a great job of diagnosing and treating many different kinds of problems. I agree the team at the Madison clinic is wonderful.  I hope the rest of your treatment goes well. Thanks Again. Dr Greg Millar

name: Michael G
text:
I've been dealing with moderate to severe nerve pain in my neck and shoulder since 2013 when a door hatch shut on my shoulder while deployed. Dr. Christian Voran has over the span of just over a month has not only reduced my overall pain level (6-9 depending on the day to 5-2 for some time after the initial adjustment) with my neck/shoulder significantly with the therapies, decompression,  and adjustments, but also listened and has been compassionate throughout all of the appointments. His enjoyment from seeing my pain levels shed off each time makes me look forward to coming in for the next appointment. Would highly recommend Dr. Christian every time!

Would also like to mention all the staff have been awesome with booking appointments and setting up therapies!

Update: Despite my great time with the rest of the staff, my last appointment with Dr. Justin was unprofessional, briefly listens, and refused to shake my hand as I was leaving. I understand people have bad days, but it is about patients at the end of it.

resp.text: We strive for 5 star reviews with every patient sometimes we fail. We are glad you got some relief.

I decided to give his treatment a chance and after just three visits I could already tell a difference,  I still have a couple months of my rehab (as I call it) but my pain level has already dropped significantly to almost no pain.  I would highly recommend this clinic to all my family and friends.

resp.text: Thank you very much for your kind words Debbie. Dr Justin is a wonderful doctor. So many people just like you are skeptical of Chiropractic from all the miss-information that is out there. I only wish we could show them just how much we can help them. We appreciate your willingness to refer family and friends. We have  thousands of wonderful loyal patients just like you that we have been able to help over the years. Enjoy the rest of your treatment.  God Bless. Thanks Again.   Dr. Greg Millar DC CCEP

name: Eldar Krueger
text: I recently retired from the Marine Corps after 22 yrs, and have been seeing a chiropractor since 2001.  Well we move to Huntsville in August 2018 and it had been about 5 months since my last visit to a chiropractor.  I noticed one morning that my right arm had numbness and tingling.  This exacerbated to my fingertips over a period of a week.  I went into Fox medical on base; of course, they gave me pain medication and sent me on my way with a referral to pain management.  I made an appointment with Millar Chiropractic because I knew there was something wrong with my spine.  By this time, (around Thanksgiving 2018), I was in excruciating pain and on the verge of wanting my arm amputated to just get rid of the pain.  Dr. Justin sat down with me and listened to my story with great patience and intrigue.  He recommended an MRI, which I got done a few days later at Crestwood Imaging & Diagnostic Center.  Come to find out my cervical disc’s were both compressed and herniated causing the pain and discomfort.  My entire career it was my lower back that had issues, never my neck.  Dr. Justin immediately got me into therapy consisting of cervical decompression, cold laser, and TENS, along with spinal adjustments.  TRICARE does not cover chiropractic care, so working with his AWESOME Staff, they were able to set up a financial plan that fit my budget.  It’s Feb 2019 and I am back at 100%, if not better!  If it were not for Dr. Justin and his amazing staff, I would probably be on heavy narcotics only masking the pain and creating a worse situation for my spinal cord.  I would like everyone to come in for at least one visit and see what he can do or help out with in your spinal health.  I am a firm believer in chiropractic care and how it can help in all aspects of your life and daily functions.

resp.text: Thank You Eldar for those kind words. Knowing what to do and knowing what not to do is very important in the treatment of patients with disc problems. The entire Millar team tries to practice with excellence every patient visit. We are happy for your success and thank you again for sharing your experience. Dr Millar

name: Kathy Hall
text: My problems with my back and leg started back in 2013 and kept escalating year after year. I was seeing a neurologist tying to get my migraine headaches under control and seeking relief for my back. Of course the first thing he ordered was physical therapy which only complicated the problem. Next step was medication which only turned me into a zombie. Next step I was recommended to a surgeon for consultation. The doctor  walked in the exam room without speaking, looked at my films and simply said nothing here I can help you with and stared to walk out. I stopped him and ask what I was supposed to do? He shrugged his shoulders and left. At this point I was   tears.  My primary doctor sent me to another surgeon. Another extensive schedule of physical therapy. This was before we moved here to Athens last year. I was desperate for relief.  I was looking for doctors on line and came across Millar Chiropractic. I thought after a neurologist, injections, two surgeons and extensive physical therapy it was time to try this approach.  I know this is a lengthy post but I felt I had to go through this first to give a reason for for my sincere recommendation. I made an appointment and so thankful I did. At the end of my consultation Dr. Walbom sent me for ex rays. A plan was made for treatment. The a office staff couldn't be more friendly, they make you feel welcome when you walk through the door. The people that set you up for treatment are always checking on you to make sure you are comfortable and relaxed. I am into my sixth treatment and have already experienced relief. Dr. Walbom talks with me after each session and I couldn't be more confident that I will come out of this office feeling like a new person. I can't say enough good words to encourage you to know this office staff and Dr.  Walbom  will actually listen to you and they care about your pain. name: Brandon White
text: When I visited Dr. Klein for the first time I had never been to a chiropractor before. I was honestly really skeptical but my neck was hurting bad enough that I was willing to give it a try. I felt much better after the first visit and continued to get adjustments over the course of a couple of months. Throughout the process I felt heard, informed, and like I was in the driver’s seat. Dr. Klein and Amanda were always super friendly and helpful. Its nice to go somewhere where people know who you are and connect with you as a person - not just a patient chart. My wife has been there as well and gets massage therapy regularly. Couldn’t ask for a better experience and I’ll be a long time patient as long as we live in Hoover. Highly recommended.

name: Colleen Maxwell
text: I have been seeing Dr. Klein for about 2 1/2 years and had been under chiropractic care for a number of years. When I started seeing Dr. Klein there had been a long gap in treatment and I was suffering pain at all levels in my spine, in my left leg, neck, and left shoulder. Early in treatment I saw Dr. Klein regularly on a semi-weekly basis. As my body healed and has retained muscle memory from the adjustments, the time between visits has increased. I am amazed at the physical changes I have noticed since I began treatment. My posture is straight and I am relatively pain free! Dr. Klein is very conscientious. He listens and makes recommendations that are easily affordable. His knowledge of the body and nutrition are remarkable. He is a very skilled chiropractor. I highly recommend Dr. Klein to my friends and family. The atmosphere at LakeCrest is relaxing. All of the staff has been accommodating and eager to please. Finding LakeCrest Chiropractic has been a true blessing in my life.

resp.text: Thank you, Colleen! We absolutely love having you as part of the LakeCrest Chiropractic family---you are a blessing in our life as well!

name: Krista Dickinson
text: I can't say enough GREAT things about Lake Crest Chiropractic!  They are WONDERFUL!!! Jasmine and Amanda do a great job in scheduling and greeting clients on the phone and in person.  Dr. Drew is wonderful!  I can't imagine going anywhere else.

name: Kari Osborne
text: Dr. Klein is an absolutely wonderful chiropractor. I've been going to him for a few years, and he's done wonders for my back and neck pain.  His support staff is also wonderful and will do whatever they can to help accommodate their patients.

name: Emily Pentecost
text:
I first began seeing Dr. Klein for a foot injury as well as lower back pain. He was very patient with the process and tried everything within his power to help me avoid foot surgery. Unfortunately, my injury was a torn tendon that warranted surgical repair but through my recovery, Dr. Klein was there giving me tips, keeping the rest of my body as comfortable as possible through a prolonged period of casts and nonweightbearing requirements, and being incredibly supportive every step of the way.

After a short time of visiting him, my lower back pain was resolved as well. I work a stressful job where I stand long hours and wear heavy safety equipment, but he keeps my lower back in check.

I am so happy that I stumbled upon this chiropractic office over a year ago. Amanda and Dr. Drew make an amazing team and create a welcoming and professional environment. They're also incredibly personal and make it a point to know each of their clients. Speaking of which, when I walk into their office, I don't feel like a client, I feel like a member of a family. I think what I appreciate most is that they aren't here to waste your time. If he doesn't think there is anything he can do to help you, he will let you know. I always appreciate their honesty and their compassion for their patients. It's no surprise they were voted #1.

resp.text: Thank you, Emily! We have so enjoyed getting to know you---you are such a sweet person and we are so thankful that you're with us!

name: John Russell
text: Very good. Best neck guy around!

name: DeAnna Hadnot
text:
Not only is Dr. Klein a skilled chiropractor, he is a WEALTH of knowledge on all things regarding health and wellness including nutrition and exercise. He genuinely cares and is glad to share and help.

As I expected, I saw Dr. Klein two, sometimes three times a week in the beginning. My neck pain was severe and was radiating down my arm. I wanted to avoid surgery at all costs. Within two weeks, the pain was gone but due to my desk job, I was prone to drift back out of alignment. Dr. Klein treated my neck and back pain but also took the time to advise me on the most ergonomic set-up for my job to prevent neck and back pain in the future. As I progressed, my visits were spaced farther apart. As things stand now, I am feeling great and plan to maintain regular maintenance visits to stay on this path. If only I'd found him 7 years ago!

On the wellness side, I have a few medical issues and Dr. Klein has been a tremendous help to me in understanding what the issues mean, what my body may be trying to tell me and what I can do to combat the issue. I've also relied on him for referral advice on physicians because I value his opinion and trust his judgment.

LakeCrest Chiropractic is certainly a place you can expect quality care and not fear being placed through a series of expensive tests just for the sake of making money. Dr. Klein has proven to me time and time again that he is in this business to HELP people. I highly recommend LakeCrest Chiropractic.

resp.text: Thank you, DeAnna! You are an absolute blast to work with --- we always look forward to you coming in!

name: Cheryl Brewer
text: Just another hack pushing orthopedic shoes.

resp.text:
Hi Cheryl -- We hate to hear that you feel this way. We are a small family business who strives to treat our patients like family, with the upmost care and respect. We have seen amazing results through chiropractic for many of our patients, but it is very true that if we feel something else might benefit them to achieve their healthcare goals (like orthotic inserts, physical therapy, or referring to a medical specialist), we will encourage our patients to seek those treatment options. We wholeheartedly believe in chiropractic care, but we also believe that it isn't the answer for every case that comes in our office---which is why we often recommend orthotic inserts, etc. We do not sell nor are we affiliated with any sort of orthotic insert, we have just seen so many patients respond really well (especially folks whom are quite active or on their feet all day) to shoe inserts which is why we will often recommend folks to try them out — so sorry if we ever came off as pushy, it was never our intention. If you would like to reach out, my email is: drdrew@lakecrestchiropractic.com
We wish you all the best in all that you do! - Dr. Drew & Amanda Klein, owners.

text: To be perfectly honest, if I could give Lakecrest Chiropractic & Wellness 10 stars, I would. Dr. Klein, his wife and office manager, Amanda, and the massage therapist, Crystal, are the most compassionate as well as professional people I have ever met. Amanda is always so friendly and remembers everything about me when I come in, even conversations that we have had sometimes months ago! Crystal is a miracle worker as a massage therapist and I always feel better when I leave her services. Dr. Klein is the absolute best chiropractor I have ever worked with and his treatment plans are progressive with the intent on bring you to maintenance- not draining your wallet. I am a long distance runner; the work with referrals and services Lakecrest Chiropractic and Wellness have provided have made me a faster runner with a much healthier quality of life! You owe it to yourself to make an appointment with this team!

name: Rhonda Bryant
text:
My journey began with another chiropractor about 4 months ago. Was told that my pelvis was tilted one way on one side and a different way on the other, subluxations were present in several places, and my kneecaps were not in the proper place. Realizing this treatment plan was going to be a sizeable investment both in time and money I decided to seek out a second opinion. (Honestly, felt kind of like I was at a cattle call with the first guy.) This is how I met Dr. Drew. His diagnosis jived with the first one, but his approach was so much better! First of all, he did not want to do duplicate XRays. He tried to save me money and exposure to radiation by having by having me pick up my first set of XRays from the other place. Secondly, he was quick to say that he did not work miracles but did believe he could help me. His estimation of treatments required was fewer than the other guy, but we were still in for months of multiple treatments per week. I gladly started treatment immediately.

After about 3 weeks Dr. Drew advised that I was not getting the kind of relief he expected and ordered an MRI. Kind of freaked me out and I tried bargaining with him explaining that I had actually not been resting and icing like he recommended. He was supremely patient and convinced me to have the MRI. The test showed that I had a congenital condition called Diastematomyelia which had never been diagnosed. My spinal cord was split and tethered. Apparently the condition is rare and we began a frantic search for a neurosurgeon who had actually performed the surgery before. Dr. Drew was with me every step, answering questions, sending referrals, and calming my nerves. This condition left untreated could eventually have caused more loss of strength and coordination, incontinence, and paralysis.

Today I am 3 weeks post op. 2 surgeons operated on me for 8 hours. All signs as of now indicate that the surgery was a complete success. Dr. Drew, through his unwavering commitment to patient care, got this journey started and I owe him a debt of gratitude. The only argument that I have with him is that I believe he is a miracle worker in getting this condition diagnosed.

btw - Mel is awesome and keeps the office running like a well oiled machine!

resp.text: Thank you, Ms. Rhonda! We really appreciate your kind words!

text: Gorgeous and awesome
